A malicious attacker may use this vulnerability to trigger a buffer overflow by accessing the Apache proxy with a specially crafted URI.

NAME: Microsoft Index Server 2.0 File Information and Path Disclosure Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Index Server is prone to a path disclosure vulnerability while parsing certain crafted http requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on request on shtml.exe. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted http request. A successful attack could lead to path disclosure.

NAME: Galan File Format Parsing Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Galan 0.2.1 is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted files. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on certain values passed in a galan file format. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted galan file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: HP OpenView Network Node Manager rping Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in HP Network Node Manager that could allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on a vulnerable system. The flaw is due to a boundary error when processing crafted packets sent to the server. Remote attackers could exploit this vulnerability by sending a HTTP request to the affected TCP port. In a sophisticated attack where code injection is successful, the behaviour of the target is entirely dependent on the intended function of the injected code.

NAME: Multiple Softwares include_dir Parameter PHP File Include Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Multiple Softwares are prone to a kine of PHP file include vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP requests, leading to an exploitable file include vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer CDF Cross Domain Scripting
DESCRIPTION: There exists a flaw in Microsoft Internet Explorer's security restriction implementation. A specially crafted Channel Definition Format (CDF) file can allow remote code execution in the Local Machine security zone. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability can allow for code execution with the privileges of the currently logged in user.

NAME: Skype Technologies skype4com URI Handler Remote Heap Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Skype is prone to a code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted http responses.The vulnerability is caused due to a boundary error in Skype4COM.dll within the "skype4com" URI handler when processing short strings.A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: McAfee VirusScan Security Center ActiveX Control Arbitrary File Overwrite Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: McAfee VirusScan Security Center is prone to a Arbitrary File Overwrite vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in startLog method in the ActiveX control.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to arbitrary file overwrite within the security context of the currently logged in user.

NAME: Mozilla Firefox PLUGINSPAGE Remote Script Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Mozilla Firefox PLUGINSPAGE is prone to a script execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted http responses.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the http response, leading to an exploitable script execution. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted http response. A successful attack could lead to remote script execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: ClamAV AntiVirus cli_check_jpeg_exploit Function Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the ClamAV AntiVirus product. The vulnerability can be triggered when the application processes malformed JPEG files. An unauthenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability by delivering a malformed file to the scanning service resulting in an unchecked recursion which consumes the stack and causes a denial of service condition.

NAME: BitDefender Antivirus PDF Processing Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a memory corruption vulnerability in multiple BitDefender products. The vulnerability is due to boundary errors within the BitDefender PDF Scanner plugin pdf.xmd. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by delivering a crafted PDF file to the vulnerable system, potentially causing arbitrary code to be injected and executed in the security context of the current user.

NAME: Mozilla Firefox Browser nsPref Changed Notification Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Mozilla Firefox is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted nsPref call in HTML pages.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on nsPref handing in the HTML page, leading to an exploitable remote code execution vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: RealNetworks RealPlayer SWF Frame Handling Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: There exists a heap buffer overflow vulnerability in the RealNetworks RealPlayer product. The vulnerability is due to a design error within the handlingof frames in Shockwave Flash (SWF) files. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to create a heap overflow condition in the target application. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution with the privileges of the currently logged in user.

NAME: Microsoft Office Excel BRAI Record Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Office Excel is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability while parsing certain crafted EXCEL files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on FORMULA Record in the EXCEL file, leading to an exploitable code execution.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted EXCEL file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Mozilla Browser/Firefox Chrome Page Loading Restriction Bypass Privilege Escalation Weakness
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in the Mozilla and Firefox web browser's privilege enforcement mechanism. The browser may be tricked into loading high privileged chrome pages from an unprivileged "about:" page. Combined with other vulnerabilities, this vulnerability may be exploited by a remote attacker to inject arbitrary code into a vulnerable target browser.

NAME: Microsoft ASP.NET ViewState Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft ASP.NET 1.x is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerabilityis present in the __VIEWSTATE functionality, when not cryptographically signed, and is due to the improper parsing of deeply nested markup. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request and cause denial of service condition on the server.

NAME: Numark CUE m3u File Parsing Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Numark CUE 5.0 rev2 is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted M3U files. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on certain paths passed in an M3U file. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by hosting a crafted M3U file and enticing the victim to open the file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the user running the Numark software.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer COM Object Instantiation Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer COM Object is prone to code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTML document. The vulnerability is due to a error when processing a webpage scripts. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML document. A successful attack could lead to code execution within the security context of the currently logged in user.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer COM Object Instantiation Memory Corruption
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer COM Object is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTML pages.When instantiation of such COM objects is attempted by Internet Explorer, the application memory can be corrupted as a result.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by building a malicious HTML page. A successful attack could lead to denial of service of the target application.

NAME: Adobe PDF Reader and Acrobat JS Media NewPlayer Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Adobe PDF Reader and Acrobat is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted PDF files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on JS fucntion in the PDF file, leading to an exploitable remote code execution.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted PDF file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Excel Formula Parsing Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Excel is prone to a overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted protocol requests/responses.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on field in the protocol request/response, leading to an exploitable overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted protocol request/response.A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server/current logged-in user.US-CERT has an advisory that reported a trojan that exploits this vulnerability in Microsoft Excel. This trojan is transferred viaemail messages with Excel files attachments, common names are OLYMPIC.XLS and SCHEDULE.XLS.

NAME: Microsoft IE CreateTextRange Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability has been identified in Microsoft Internet Explorer. The vulnerability is created by an error in the processing of scripts that calls the createTextRange method on invalid HTML elements. An attacker can potentially exploit this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary code on a vulnerable host in the security context of the currently logged in user.

NAME: Internet Explorer COM Object Instantiation Memory Corruption
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to an exploitable memory corruption vulnerability.The vulnerability exists in Internet Explorer when certain COM objects are instantiated asActiveX controls, which could corrupt the memory.An attacker can exploit this issue by crafting a webpage using the vulnerable COM objects. A successful exploit could lead to arbitrary code execution in the context of the currently logged-in user, or could lead to a denial-of-service condition.

NAME: Mozilla SOAPParameter Integer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in several versions of the Mozilla and Netscape browsers' implementation of the Simple Object Access Protocol (SOAP). A specially crafted HTML page containing script code that leverages this vulnerability can allow an attacker to crash a client's browser application, or potentially introduce arbitrary code into the process flow, compromising the system.

NAME: HP Web Jetadmin Printer Firmware Update Script Arbitrary File Upload Weakness
DESCRIPTION: There are multiple vulnerabilities within HP Web JetAdmin, a web based software program developed by Hewlett Packard. It is possible, through the use of multiple vulnerabilities, for the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the remote server running HP Web JetAdmin in a ROOT level context.

NAME: GNU Tar PAX Extended Headers Handling Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the GNU Tar archive utility. The flaw is specific to processing PAX archives which contain extended headers. An attacker may leverage this vulnerability to cause a vulnerable version of the affected program to terminate by enticing a user to download and process a malicious archive file.

NAME: Mozilla Firefox Layout Frame Constructor Memory Corruption
DESCRIPTION: Mozilla Firefox is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTML responses. The flaw is due to the improper handling of certain HTML and CSS elements in the layout component, leading to an exploitable memory corruption.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by hosting a HTML page on a web server and persuading a victim to open the malicious webpage. A successful exploit could allow for arbitrary code injection and execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Excel Malformed Graphic Code Execution
DESCRIPTION: There exists a code execution vulnerability in Microsoft Excel. The vulnerability is caused by improper sanitization of EXCEL graphic records in Excel spreadsheet files. An attacker may exploit this vulnerability by enticing a user to open a crafted Excel file, which will enable the attacker to inject and execute arbitrary code within the security context of the target user.

NAME: Microsoft Malware Protection Engine Disk Space Exhaustion Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Malware Protection Engine is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input field in some files, leading to a denial of service.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted file. A successful attack could lead to denial of service.It will cause false positive by many PE files who were packed by compress program.

NAME: Sun Java Runtime Environment Pack200 Decompression Integer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists an integer overflow vulnerability in Sun Java Runtime Environment software. The vulnerability is due to insufficient validation while decompressing Pack200 (jar.pack.gz) files. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing a target user to open a crafted HTML file. Successful exploitation may lead to arbitrary code execution on the target.

NAME: HP Mercury Quality Center ActiveX Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: HP Mercury Quality Center is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in NAME property in the HTML file, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow vulnerability.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer CSS Property Method Handling Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exist a memory corruption vulnerability in Microsoft Internet Explorer product. The vulnerability is due to the way that Internet Explorer handles CSS property method calls. Remote attackers can exploit this vulnerability by persuading target users to visit a specially crafted web page. Successful exploitation may allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable client system, in the context of the logged in user.

NAME: Microsoft Office Malformed BMP Filter Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Office Image Filter is vulnerable to a buffer overflow condition while parsing certain malformed BMP files. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a malformed BMP file. A successful attack could result in remote code execution with the privileges of the current user.

NAME: ScozBook auth.php adminname Parameter SQL Injection
DESCRIPTION: ScozNet ScozBook BETA 1.1 is prone to a SQL injection vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is present in the auth.php script and is due to the lack of proper checks on adminname parameter. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request with SQL injection characters. A successful attack could lead to remote command execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Mozilla Firefox use-after-free vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Mozilla Firefox is prone to a use-after-free vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP responses.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP responses, leading to an exploitable use-after-free vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP responses. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Apple QuickTime MOV File String Handling Integer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in the way Apple QuickTime handles MOV media files. Specifically, the processing of crafted string values embedded in a MOV file is prone to a buffer overflow. This vulnerability may result in arbitrary code being injected and executed on the target host.

NAME: Microsoft Excel Workbook Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Excel is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability while parsing malformed Excel files. The vulnerabilityis due to the lack of sufficient checks on fields indicating the start of a workspace designation, leading to an exploitable memorycorruption. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by enticing a user to open a crafted excel sheet, hosted on a website, or sent through e-mail. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution in the context of the currently logged-in user, or lead to a denial-of-service condition.

NAME: Microsoft HTML Help ActiveX Control Cross Domain Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft HTML Help ActiveX Control is prone to a cross-domain bypass vulnerability.The vulnerability can be triggered with the usage of "Related Topics" parameterof the control, which can be used to open web content from a different security domain.Thus, using the control the security checks related to domains could be bypassed.An attacker can exploit the vulnerability by crafting a web page using the vulnerablecontrol, and convincing the user to download the page.A successful attack might result in arbitrary code execution, installation of malicious files,and thereby complete compromise of the victim machine.

NAME: Microsoft Windows Explorer Saved-search File Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows Explorer is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted saved-search files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input field in the saved-search file, leading to an exploitable remote code execution vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted saved-search file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Hylafax Faxsurvey Remote Command Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Hylafax Faxsurvey is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted http requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on HylaFAX package in the faxsurvery CGI, leading to an exploitable remote code execution vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted CGI request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: IBM eGatherer ActiveX Control RunEgatherer Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: IBM eGatherer is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in RunEgatherer method in the HTML file, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow vulnerability.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: KDE Konqueror ReplaceChild Denial Of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: KDE Konqueror 3.5.1 and earlier is prone to a Denial of Service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted html pages.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on replaceChild  method on a DOM object, leading to a null dereference denial of service vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to denial of service.

NAME: WordPress Cookie Data PHP Code Injection Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: WordPress versions lower than 1.5.1.4 are prone to a PHP code injection vulnerability.The vulnerability exists in the functions.php code, which does not performproper sanitization of user-supplied input in the cache_lastpostdate cookie.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by crafting a HTTP request and executingarbitrary PHP commands in the context of the web server.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer Uninitialized Object Access Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted html pages. The vulnerability is due to an error in access an object which is uninitialized or has been deleted, leading to an exploitable code execution vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft IIS .printer ISAPI Extension Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Information Server (IIS) version 5.0 installed on Microsoft Windows 2000 is prone to a buffer overflow while handling certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability exists in the Internet Printing Protocol (IPP) ISAPI extension, which doesnot perform proper boundary checks while handling user input passed through HTTP requests. An attacker could exploit the vulnerabilityby passing a crafted request to the server, and cause remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Symantec Scan Engine Authentication Bypass
DESCRIPTION: There exists an authentication bypass vulnerability in the Symantec Scan Engine product. The vulnerability is due to a design flaw that lets a remote client alter the administrative password without supplying proper credentials. An unauthenticated remote attacker may leverage this vulnerability to gain administrative access to the vulnerable product, effectively bypassing the authentication mechanism.

NAME: Microsoft Windows win.ini access attempt
DESCRIPTION: There is a Microsoft Windows win.ini access attempt has been detected while parsing certain crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could allow an attacker to access sensitive information that could  launch further attacks.

NAME: BerliOS Docpile:we templates.inc.php INIT_PATH Parameter PHP File Include Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: BerliOS Docpile:we templates.inc.php is prone to a PHP file include vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP requests, leading to an exploitable file include vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer DHTML Object Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A memory corrupt vulnerability exists in Microsoft Internet Explorer web browser. The vulnerability is due to the way Internet Explorer displays a web page that contains unexpected method calls to HTML objects. The attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute code in the context of the current logged-on user.

NAME: Microsoft IIS HTR Chunked Encoding Transfer Heap Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft IIS is prone to a heap overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted http requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on chunked data in the http request, leading to an exploitable heap overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted http request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server

NAME: Microsoft IIS WebDAV Search Server Denial Of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Information Server (IIS) version 5.0 is prone to a denial of service vulnerable while parsing certain crafted WebDAV request. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the WebDAV request, leading to a denial of service vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted WEBDAV request. A successful attack could lead to server to restart automatically, which disconnects any active sessions.

NAME: IBM Lotus Domino PresetFields Parameter Overflow
DESCRIPTION: IBM Lotus Domino Web Server before 6.0.1 is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of boundary checks on the s_ViewName option in the PresetFields parameter, leading to an exploitable overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer HTML Object Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A memory corrupt vulnerability exists in Microsoft Internet Explorer web browser. The vulnerability is due to the way Internet Explorer handle XMLHttpRequest calls. The attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute code in the context of the current logged-on user.

NAME: Microsoft IIS Server Name Spoof Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft IIS 5.1 and 6 are prone to information leak vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is because certain ASP scripts display source code when an error occurs if the SERVER_NAME variable is "localhost". In this case the script assumes the request is coming from the local web server and displays sensitive script code. Thus, an attacker could spoof the SERVER_NAME variable through crafted HTTP requests to retrieve sensitive information from the web server.

NAME: AstonSoft DeepBurner DBR Compilation Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Astonsoft DeepBurner Pro and Free 1.8.0 and earlier are prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted DBR files. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on filename tag supplied in a DBR file. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted DBR file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the user running the compilation software.

NAME: Microsoft Agent ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Agent ActiveX control is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted URLs passed to the functionsof the control. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper length checks on URLspassed to the control, leading to an exploitable overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by crafting awebpage using the Agent Control characters, which when visited could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current user.

NAME: Gateway CWebLaunchCtl ActiveX Control Command Execution and Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Gateway CWebLaunchCtl ActiveX Control is prone to a buffer overflow and directory traversal vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on DoWebLaunch method in the CWebLaunchCtl ActiveX Control. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Apple QuickTime Image Description Atom Sign Extension Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Apple Quikctime is prone to a heap overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted MP4 movies.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on image description atom data in the MP4 files, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted MP4 movie. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Oracle Web Cache HTTP Request Parsing Heap Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Oracle Web Cache service is prone to a buffer overflow while handling certain crafted HTTP requests to the server. The buffer overflow occurs in the component that handles HTTP requests and does not require the attacker to have credentials for exploitation. The vulnerability could allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on vulnerable systems.

NAME: Microsoft Office Web Components Heap Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Office Web Components are a collection of Component Object Model (COM) controls for publishing spreadsheets, charts, and databases to the Web, and for viewing the published components on the Web. The Spreadsheet object in the Office Web Components Library 10/11 contains a vulnerability which allows remote attackers to execute malicious code. A user's machine can be infected when browsing a malicious site that invokes the OWC functionality.

NAME: HP Virtual Rooms hpvirtualrooms14.dll ActiveX Control Multiple Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
DESCRIPTION: HP Virtual Rooms is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on some methods in the WebHPVCInstall.HPVirtualRooms14 ActiveX control,, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: PHP Ads new helperfunction.php include_dir Parameter PHP File Include Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: PHP Ads new helperfunction.php include_dir Parameter is prone to a PHP file include vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP requests, leading to an exploitable file include vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Adobe Acrobat and Adobe Reader U3D RHAdobeMeta Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Adobe Acrobat and Adobe Reader are prone to an overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted .pdf file.  The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on U3D RHAdobeMeta in the pdf file, leading to an exploitable overflow.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted .pdf file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer Position CSS Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted CSS tags in html file.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in CSS content, leading to a denial of service.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to web browser crashed.

NAME: ACal Cookie Based Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: login.php in ACal Calendar is prone to a  authentication bypass vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP request.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in cookie field in the HTTP request.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to authentication bypass.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Information Server ISAPI Extension Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Information Server (IIS) is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain malformedHTTP requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of boundary checks in the idq.dll ISAPI extension while parsing long HTTPrequests for Internet Data Administration (.ida) and Internet Data Query (.idq) files. An attacker could exploit the vulnerabilityby passing a crafted HTTP request that could cause code execution on the victim server. This vulnerability has commonly

NAME: Webmin Arbitrary File Disclosure vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Webmin before 1.290 and Usermin before 1.220 are prone to an arbitrary read access vulnerability while handling certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper filtering on certain URLs containing "..%01" sequences, which bypass the removal of directory traversal sequences. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted URL to the server, and thereby access arbitrary files on the victim server.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer HTML Decoding Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a heap buffer overflow vulnerability in Microsoft Internet Explorer. The flaw is caused by improper decoding of UTF-8 encoded HTML files. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing a user to open a crafted HTML file, resulting in possible injection and execution of arbitrary code on the target system with the privileges of the currently logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft PowerPoint NamedShows Record Parsing Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft PowerPoint is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability while parsing malformed PowerPoint (PPT) files. The vulnerabilityis due to the improper parsing of certain fields in the NamedShows record, leading to an exploitable memorycorruption. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by enticing a user to open a crafted ppt file, hosted on a website,or sent through e-mail. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution in the context of the currently logged-in user, or leadto a denial-of-service condition. This vulnerability has been famously exploited by Trojan.PPDropper.F.

NAME: Adobe AcroPDF ActiveX Control Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Adobe AcroPDF ActiveX object is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTML document. The vulnerability is due to improper handling of arguments passed to certian methos and properties exposed by the control. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML document. A successful attack could lead to a denial of services against the target host.

NAME: MailEnable HTTP Authorization Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: MailEnable Enterprise 1.04 and earlier and Professional 1.54 and earlier are prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability whileparsing certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is present in the HTTPMail component, and is due to the lack of boundary checks on the length of HTTP Authorization header, leading to an overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerabilityby passing a HTTP request with a long Authorization header, causing the overflow. A successful exploit could lead to remotecode execution, or lead to a denial of service condition on the server.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer HtmlDlgSafeHelper ActiveX object DOS Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: IE HtmlDlgSafeHelper is vulnerable to denial of service while parsing malformed ActiveX method calls. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the fonts property in the HTML file. A successful attack could lead to a denial of service condition.

NAME: Oracle Secure Backup Administration Server login.php Command Injection Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a command injection vulnerability in Oracle Secure Backup. The vulnerability is due to lack of sanitation of user supplied parameters when processing HTTP requests sent to CGI program login.php. Remote unauthenticated attackers can exploit this vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request to the target host.

NAME: Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird/Seamonkey Multiple Remote Vulnerabilities
DESCRIPTION: There exists a memory corruption vulnerability in Mozilla Foundation's family of browser products. The flaw is caused by a heap-based buffer overflow when parsing crafted regular expressions. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code in the security context of the target browser.

NAME: Microsoft Windows Media Playback Memory Corruption Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Windows Media component is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted MP3 files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on use input data in the MP3 files, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted MP3 file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Word for Windows 6.0 Converter Font Conversion Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a vulnerability in the WordPad application shipped with the Microsoft Windows family of operating systems. A crafted Word 6.0 for Windows document could trigger a buffer overflow when it is opened with the affected software. A remote attacker could leverage this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the target by persuading a remote user to open a crafted document.

NAME: Cisco IOS Router Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Cisco IOS HTTP server is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted http request.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in URI field in the http reuquest.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted http request. A successful attack could lead to denial of service for the Cisco device.

NAME: IncrediMail IMMenuShellExt ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: IncrediMail IMMenuShellExt is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in DoWebMenuAction method in the HTML file, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow vulnerability.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Excel WorkSpace Record Parsing Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Excel is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability while parsing malformed Excel files. The vulnerabilityis due to the lack of proper checks on certain record fields in Excel sheets, which is later used for memory operations. An attacker couldexploit the vulnerability by enticing a user to open a crafted excel sheet, hosted on a website, or sent through e-mail.A successful attack could lead to remote code execution in the context of the currently logged-in user, or lead to adenial-of-service condition.

NAME: Microsoft Windows GDI Integer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows GDI is prone to a heap overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted WMF files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on the user intput data in WMF file, leading to an integer overflow, in some case, it could be a exploitable heap overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted WMF file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: SAP GUI EAI WebViewer3D ActiveX Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in SAP GUI EAI WebViewer3D ActiveX Control. The vulnerability is due to boundary error in the implementation of a function exposed by the said control. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the user to open a crafted HTML file.

NAME: Misrepresent URLs bugs in Mozilla Firefox
DESCRIPTION: Mozilla Firefox 3.x before 3.0.5 and 2.x before 2.0.0.19, Thunderbird 2.x before 2.0.0.19, and SeaMonkey 1.x before 1.1.14 does not properly parse URLs with leading whitespace or control characters, which might allow remote attackers to misrepresent URLs and simplify phishing attacks.

NAME: Symantec NAVComUI.AxSysListView32 ActiveX Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Symantec NAVComUI.AxSysListView32 is prone to a code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in AnomalyList property in the HTML file, leading to an exploitable code execution vulnerability.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Windows Messenger ActiveX Control Information Disclosure Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows Messenger is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability.An attacker can exploit these issues by enticing an unsuspecting victim to visit a malicious HTML page.

NAME: Microsoft Visual Studio WMI Object Broker ActiveX Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Visual Studio is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability, caused by an errorin the WMI Object Broker ActiveX Control. The vulnerability is because this control's methodcan be used to create other ActiveX controls, in an unsafe manner. Thus the control couldbe used to bypass any security checks on the other unsafe controls, to download arbitrary code and execute on the victim machine. The vulnerability could be exploited while visiting a malicious webpage. As a workaround,

NAME: Microsoft Office 2003 Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Office and IrfanView version 3.99 is prone to a denial-of-service condition when the malformed WMF file is viewed in the Microsoft Office application or with IrfanView version 3.99. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the WMF files.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted WMF file. A successful attack could lead to denial of service.

NAME: ContentKeeper Web Interface Remote Command Execution
DESCRIPTION: ContentKeeper is prone to an arbitrary file access vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests sent to the web interface. The vulnerability is present in the mimencode application and is due to the lack of proper filtering of command line arguments sent the admin interface. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Microsoft Office Malformed EPS Filter Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Office is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted office files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data, leading to an exploitable remote code execution.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted office file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft PowerPoint PPT Document Parsing Code Execution
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft PowerPoint is prone to a code execution vulnerability while parsing certain ppt file.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks within certain field of the PPT file, leading to a code execution condition.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted PowerPoint file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution within the context of the current logged-in user.

NAME: PHPLiveHelper global.php abs_path Parameter PHP File Include Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: PHPLiveHelper global.php abs_path Parameter is prone to a PHP file include vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP requests, leading to an exploitable file include vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: HTTP Response Content Length Too Long
DESCRIPTION: This signature detects too long content length in the HTTP response and prevents buffer overflow.

NAME: Microsoft ASP.NET Remote Unauthenticated Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There is a vulnerability in ASP.NET v2.0 and above when run on IIS 7 and above which allows an attacker to force ASP.NET to stop processing requests by sending a small number of malformed requests. On a certain error code path, ASP.NET does not decrement a counter used to determine how many requests and concurrently being processed. After this counter reaches 12 * NumberOfCPUs, ASP.NET stops processing requests. By sending 12 * NumberOfCPUs malformed requests, the attacker can ensure ASP.NET won't answer additional requests until IIS is restarted.

NAME: Yahoo Messenger YVerInfo.dll ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Yahoo Messenger YVerInfo.dll ActiveX Control is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability when parsing certain function parameters.The vulnerability is due to the lack of boundary checks on certain parameters passed to fvcom and info functions, which are copiedto finite stack buffers, leading to a stack overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by hosting a HTML page with thecontrol and crafted function parameters. A successful exploit could cause code execution in the context of currently logged-in user.

NAME: Crystal Reports EnterpriseControls.dll ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: The Crystal Reports XI is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on SelectedSession() in the EnterpriseControls.dll object, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: WordPress RSS Feed Generator self_link HTTP_HOST Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a cross-site script insertion vulnerability in WordPress. The vulnerability is due to lack of sanitization for data supplied in the HTTP Host header. Remote attackers can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary HTML and script code in the users' browser sessions in the context of the vulnerable web site.

NAME: Alt-N WebAdmin USER Parameter Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Alt-N WebAdmin is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is dueto the lack of boundary checks on the USER parameter passed to the WebAdmin.dll through a HTTP request. An attacker could exploit thevulnerability by passing a crafted HTTP request to WebAdmin, exploiting the overflow and thereby lead to remote code execution.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer Image Download Filename Extension Spoofing Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is reported susceptible to a filename extension spoofing vulnerability when utilizing the 'Save Image As' feature.Reportedly, this vulnerability is only possible when Internet Explorer is configured with 'Hide extension for known file types' enabled. This is the default configuration.This vulnerability may facilitate the spoofing of filename extensions, resulting in malicious content being inadvertently downloaded to vulnerable Web users.

NAME: RealNetworks RealPlayer MP3 Files Processing Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: A remote buffer overflow vulnerability exists in RealNetworks RealPlayer application. The vulnerability is due to boundary errors when processing Lyrics3 v2.00 tags in MP3 files. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to open a crafted MP3 file. Successful exploitation would cause a heap-based buffer overflow that may lead to arbitrary code execution in the security context of the logged in user.

NAME: Palo Alto Networks Firewall VPN Login Authentication Attempt
DESCRIPTION: This alert indicates that a user is trying to login to Palo Alto Network's firewall VPN or global protect service.

NAME: Microsoft FrontPage Server Extensions Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft FrontPage Server Extensions 2002 and SharePoint Team Services are prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability while parsingcertain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of filtering on certain HTTP request parameters, which could be used to inject script code. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by passing a crafted HTTP request with injected script code, which couldbe executed in the context of the web server.

NAME: Microsoft Windows ANI File Parsing Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain craft packet ANI file.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in some field of the ANI file, leading to an exploitable overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted ANI file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution within the context of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer Uninitialized Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability while parsing certain crafted html pages.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input field in the html page, leading to an exploitable memory-corruption vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Adobe Reader JavaScript getAnnots Method Memory Corruption
DESCRIPTION: A memory corruption vulnerability exists in Adobe Reader and Acrobat. The vulnerability is due to insufficient input validation in the implementation of the getAnnots JavaScript method. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to open a malicious PDF file.

NAME: HP OpenView Network Node Manager Accept-Language Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: HP OpenView Network Node Manager is prone to an overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on Accept-Language in the HTTP request, leading to an exploitable overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: VideoLAN VLC Media Player RealText File Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a vulnerability in VideoLAN VLC Media Player. The vulnerability is caused due to a buffer overflow when playing a specially crafted RealText (.rt) subtitle file. An unauthenticated remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by enticing a user to play a specially crafted RealText subtitle file. Successful exploitation would cause a stack buffer overflow allowing the attacker to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the logged in users.

NAME: Microsoft Office PowerPoint Heap Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Office PowerPoint is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted PowerPoint files. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks when parsing some Atom structure, leading to an exploitable remote code execution. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted PowerPoint file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft JScript Scripting Engine Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Microsoft Internet Explorer web browser. The vulnerability is due to JScript when handling certain JScript code. The attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute code in the context of the current logged-on user.

NAME: Internet Explorer DHTML Methods File Drag and Drop Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a drag and drop vulnerability, when parsinga web page containing certain DHTML methods, which could facilitate droppingcertain malicious files. The vulnerability is due to the lack of validity checkson the type of files that could be dropped to local computer folders from Internetzone. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by crafting a webpage, and enticingthe victim to click on the webpage to install malicious content on the victim's machine.

NAME: Microsoft SQL Server CONVERT Function Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in Microsoft SQL Server. The vulnerability is specifically caused by insufficient data validation when processing parameters passed to CONVERT function in an SQL statement. A remote authenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with System privileges on the target system.

NAME: Nullsoft Winamp Midi File Header Handling Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in the MIDI file parsing component of Nullsoft Winamp. The vulnerability is caused by the improper handling of the header of a MIDI media file. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the user to open a crafted MIDI file, thereby creating a denial of service condition or potentially injecting and executing arbitrary code on the target system.

NAME: Gedit PySys_SetArgv Remote Command Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: GNOME's gedit, Dia and several packages are prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while handling certain crafted python files. The vulnerability is because gedit,Dia are using the current working directory as part of the module search path. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by tricking a victim into executing gedit/Dia in a directory containing a Python file named like one of the modules gedit/Dia uses.

NAME: Microsoft Visual FoxPro FPOLE.OCX ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: he Microsoft Visual FoxPro ActiveX control is prone to a stack-based overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted COM Method call. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on data passed to FoxDoCmd method in the activex request, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Word Document Stream Handling Code Execution
DESCRIPTION: A stack buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the way Microsoft Word processes files. The vulnerability is a result of insufficient boundary checking while processing the WordDocument (or Main) stream. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to open a crafted Word file, potentially causing arbitrary code to be injected and executed in the security context of the current user.

NAME: Microsoft Office PICT Filter Parsing Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Office is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted PICT files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data, leading to an exploitable remote code execution.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted PICT file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: SoftArtisans XFile FileManager ActiveX Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: SoftArtisans  is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX control requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on "GetDriverName" method in the XFile FileManager ActiveX control request, leading to a buffer overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft IIS ASN.1 Bit String Overflow Vunerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows ASN.1 library is prone to a heap overflow vulnerability while parsing the ASN.1 BER encoding string. The vulnerability is due to lack the proper checks on the length field in the ASN.1 encoding, leading to an exploitable integer heap overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending crafted SMB request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the administrator.

NAME: Microsoft Tblinf32 ActiveX Control Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Internet Explorer is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX control requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on "TypeLibInfoFromFile" method/property in the TypeLib Information Library ActiveX control request, leading to a buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft SQL Server 2000 Client Components ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft SQL Server 2000 Client Components is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX control requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on ".Connect" method/property in the Microsoft SQL Server 2000 Client Components ActiveX control request, leading to a buffer overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Sophos Anti-Virus Reserved Device Name Handling Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability in Sophos Anti-Virus may allow malicious code to evade detection. The vulnerability is caused by a design issue concerning the scanning of special device file names on the Windows platforms. This flaw can be exploited by malicious users as a method of bypassing the Sophos virus detection.

NAME: Microchip MPLAB IDE mcp File Handling Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Microchip MPLAB IDE 8.30 and lower are prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted mcp files. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on certain field values such as FILE_INFO, CAT_FILTERS. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by hosting a crafted mcp file on a webpage and enticing the victim to download the file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the user running the MPPLAB IDE.

NAME: Apache SSI Error Page XSS Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Apache SSI Error Page is prone to a cross site script vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on Host field of HTTP request.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to script execution in the security context of an affected web server.

NAME: Microsoft IIS Webdav Directory Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft IIS is prone to a authentication bypass vulnerability while parsing certain crafted WEBDAV requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on URL in the WEBDAV request, leading to a bypass on some IIS directoryAn attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted WEBDAV request. A successful attack could lead to access the restriction directory.

NAME: Microsoft IIS WebHits.DLL Source Disclosure Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft IIS web server is prone to an information disclosure vulnerability while handling certain crafted requests.The vulnerability is present in WebHits.dll and is due to the improper handling of requests sent by appending a spaceat the end of CiWebHitsFile parameter value. This vulnerability could disclose ASP file source used as the parameter value.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request to the server, which couldreveal sensitive information.

NAME: Microsoft  Excel Global Array Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Excel is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted XLS files .The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the XLS file, leading to an exploitable remote code execution.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted XLS file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: MS IE eCentrex VOIP Client UACOMX.OCX ActiveX Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: MS IE eCentrex VOIP Client UACOMX.OCX is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in ReInit method in the HTML file, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow vulnerability.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Malicious Websites Compromised by Massive SQL Injection Attacking
DESCRIPTION: Multiple website is prone to SQL Injection vulnerability and being exploited. Users who browse these websites would be infected while parsing certain crafted HTTP responses.The attacker exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP response. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Visual Studio Msmask32.ocx ActiveX Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Heap-based buffer overflow in the MaskedEdit ActiveX control in Msmask32.ocx 6.0.81.69, and possibly other versions before 6.0.84.18, in Microsoft Visual Studio 6.0 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long Mask parameter, as exploited in the wild in August 2008.

NAME: COWON America jetAudio JetFlExt.dll ActiveX Control Insecure Method Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: JetAudio is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX control requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on "DownloadFromMusicStore" method/property in the JetAudio.Interface ActiveX control request, leading to a buffer overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Mozilla Firefox XSL Parsing Root XML Tag Parsing Memory Corruption
DESCRIPTION: Firefox XSL is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability while parsing certain crafted XSL Template files. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on XSL Template value in the xml file, leading to an exploitable remote code execution vulnerability. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted XML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Mozilla FireFox Sidebar Bookmark Persistent Denial Of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: HTTP Mozilla FireFox is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP responses.The vulnerability is due to an malicious bookmark in the HTTP response.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML response. A successful attack could lead to denial of service against user's internet browser.

NAME: Mozilla Firefox Integer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: The layout engine in Mozilla Firefox 3.x before 3.0.5 and 2.x before 2.0.0.19, Thunderbird 2.x before 2.0.0.19, and SeaMonkey 1.x before 1.1.14 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) and possibly trigger memory corruption via vectors related to (1) a reahable assertion or (2) an integer overflow.

NAME: OpenOffice RTF File Parsing Heap Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the OpenOffice software suite. The vulnerability is due to the way OpenOffice parses specially crafted Rich Text Format (RTF) documents. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by persuading a user to open a specially crafted RTF file, potentially causing arbitrary code to be injected and executed in the security context of the logged in user.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer Print Preview Cross Zone Script Injection Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a script-injection vulnerability vulnerability while parsing the table when printing a table of links.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input field in the html page, leading to an exploitable cross-zone script-injection.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: VideoLAN VLC Media Player WAV Processing Integer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: There exists a vulnerability in VideoLAN VLC Media Player. The vulnerability is due to an integer overflow during the calculation of the size of a heap buffer. An unauthenticated remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by enticing a user to play a specially crafted Wave (WAV) file. Successful exploitation would cause a heap buffer overflow allowing the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system.

NAME: SteamCast User-Agent Parsing Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Steamcast 0.9.75 and earlier is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while handling certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is an off-by-one error caused due to the improper handling of long User-Agent HTTP headers. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request to the server. A successful exploit could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Mozilla Suite And Firefox Favicon Link Tag Remote Script Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Mozilla Suite And Firefox is prone to a code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted http responses.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the http response, leading to an exploitable code execution. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted http response. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Green Dam URL Parsing Overflow Exploit
DESCRIPTION: Green Dam 3.17 is prone to an overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted URLs in a HTTP response. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on URLs sent in a HTML page, leading to an exploitable overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP response. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Cart32 Clients Information Disclosure Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Cart32 is prone to a information disclosure vulnerability while parsing certain crafted http request.The vulnerability is due to an embedded password in Cart32 could allow a remote attacker to gain unauthorized access to a list of shopping cart clients. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information, including passwords and customer information, such as credit card numbers.

NAME: Microsoft Agent URL Parsing Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Agent control is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability while parsing certain crafted URLs passed to the functions of the control. The vulnerability is due to the failure of the control to properly check the format of URLs passed to the control, leading to an exploitable memory corruption. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by crafting awebpage using the Agent Control characters, which when visited could lead to remote code execution with the privilegesof the current user.

NAME: Microsoft Windows Media Player File Information Disclosure Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in the way the Microsoft Windows Media Player ActiveX Control accesses local files. A script embedded in an HTML page could use the ActiveX control to disclose information about arbitrary local file. This vulnerability may be leveraged by a remote attacker to obtain size and type information of local files.

NAME: Novell iPrint nipplib ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Novell iPrint Client 4.x before 4.38 and 5.x before 5.08 is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP responses. The vulnerability is present in the IppCreateServerRef function in nipplib.dll. It is due to the lack of proper checks on certain arguments sent to the GetPrinterURLList, GetPrinterURLList2, or GetFileList2 function. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by creating a crafted webpage and enticing the victim to visit the page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Windows Media Player ASX PlayList File Heap Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in Microsoft Media Player. The flaw is due to a lack of boundary protection during the parsing of ASX playlist files. By persuading a user to open a malicious web page, a remote attacker may inject and execute arbitrary code on the target host with the privileges of the currently logged on user.

NAME: PHP File Upload GLOBAL Variable Overwrite Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: The RFC1867 file upload feature in PHP 4.x up to 4.4.0 and 5.x up to 5.0.5 is prone to a variable overwrite vulnerability while parsing certain crafted http mime requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on "GLOBALS" fileupload field in the http response request. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted "GLOBALS" fileupload request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Microsoft IIS nsiislog.dll ISAPI Extension Stack Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Information Server (IIS) is prone to a stack overflow vulnerability while parsing certain malformedHTTP requests. The vulnerability exists in the Internet Services Application Programming Interface (ISAPI) nsiislog.dllextension, while parsing large POST requests leading to a stack overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerabilityby sending a large malformed POST request, which could cause remote code execution.

NAME: NCTsoft NCTAudioFile2 ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: NCTAudioFile2.AudioFile ActiveX control (NCTAudioFile2.dll), used by multiple audio data manipulation products, is prone to abuffer overflow vulnerability. The vulnerability is triggered when long parameters are passed to the SetFormatLikeSample function, leading to an exploitable overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by crafting a webpage, which when visited couldlead to code execution. Setting the kill bit on the ActiveX could mitigate the attack.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer Transition Handling Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted html pages. The vulnerability is due to an error in transition handling when navigating between Web pages in the html page, leading to an exploitable code execution vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: VMware COM API ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: VMware COM API is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP response.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in GuestInfo method in the HTTP response, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP response. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution within security context of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Move Media Player Quantum Streaming IE Player ActiveX Buffer Overflows Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Move Media Player Quantum Streaming IE Player is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in Play method in the HTML file, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow vulnerability.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Windows GDI+ PNG Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows GDI+ system is prone to a heap overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted PNG files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the PNG file, leading to an exploitable heap overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted PNG file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer Marquee Object handling Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted html pages. The vulnerability is due to an error in handling marquee object, leading to an exploitable code execution vulnerability. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: HP LoadRunner XUpload ActiveX Control Arbitrary File Download
DESCRIPTION: Hp LoadRunner is prone to a arbitrary file download vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP responses. The vulnerability is present in the XUpload.ocx active control and is due to the exposure of certain unsafe methods that could allow file download to arbitrary locations. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by hosting a crafted webpage and enticing the victim to visit the page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Mozilla Firefox JavaScript Engine Information Disclosure
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in the JavaScript interpreter of the Mozilla web browser and its derivatives. The flaw is triggered when a specially constructed web page calls the replace() function. This vulnerability can be exploited to retrieve arbitrary information from heap memory.

NAME: Microsoft Windows Universal Plug and Play Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Universal Plug and Play service is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while handling certain malformed HTTP requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of boundary checks while parsing certain HTTP headers before copying the data to finitestack buffers, leading to a stack overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request, causingremote code execution on the victim server.

NAME: StreamAudio ProxyManager InternalTuneIn ActiveX Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: StreamAudio ProxyManager InternalTuneIn is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in InternalTuneIn method in the HTML file, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow vulnerability.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: ADODB.RecordSet ActiveX Control Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft ADODB.RecordSet ActiveX Control is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability.The control could be invoked through Internet Explorer and is scriptable. The vulnerability is due to aninvalid memory access error in the SysFreeString function while accessing the NextRecordset functionrepeatedly with long arguments, leading to an exploitable memory corruption.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by crafting a webpage and enticing a victim to visit thewebpage. Successful exploitation could lead to a code execution on the victim machine, or cause a denial-of-service condition.

NAME: Pi3Web ISAPI Directory Access Denial Of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Pi3web is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is due to the improper handling of requests containing non-DLL files in the ISAPI directory. Since, the server tries to load such files in memory, it crashes on failure. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request, and thus crash the server.

NAME: Adobe Acrobat Reader eBook plug-in Format String Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists within the EBX Transfer Data (ETD) file parser of the eBook plug-in component of Adobe Acrobat Reader. The ETD file parser contains a flaw where user input can be used as the format string in an output function, potentially causing memory corruption. This vulnerability can be leveraged by an attacker to remotely inject and execute code on a target system with the privileges of the currently logged in user.

NAME: VLC Media Player SMB Module Win32AddConnection Buffer Overflow using XML
DESCRIPTION: VideoLAN VLC media player 0.9.9 on Microsoft Windows is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain tags in an XML file. The vulnerability is present in the Win32AddConnection function and is due to the lack of proper length checks on SMB URLs, leading to an exploitable stack overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by hosting a XML webpage containing the crafted URL and entice the victim to visit the page. A successful exploit could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Excel Calendar Object Validation Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Excel is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability while parsing certain crafted EXCEL files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on calendar object in the EXCEL file, leading to an exploitable code execution vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted excel file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Adobe Reader AcroPDF.DLL ActiveX Control DoS Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Adobe Reader AcroPDF.DLL is prone to a Deny of Service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls.
