The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in src property in the HTML file, leading to an exploitable Deny of Service vulnerability.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Windows Search Parsing Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Explorer is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted Microsoft windows search URL in the web page..If a user is logged on with administrative user rights, an attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system. An attacker could then install programs; view, change, or delete data; or create new accounts with full user rights. Users whose accounts are configured to have fewer user rights on the system could be less impacted than users who operate with administrative user rights.

NAME: Microsoft XML Core Service XMLHTTP ActiveX Control Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: MS XML is prone to a code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in some method in the ActiveX control, leading to an exploitable code execution vulnerability.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Apple QuickTime STSZ Atom Parsing Heap Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Apple Quicktime Player is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted MP4 H264 files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on H264 Data in the MP4 file, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted MP4 file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: eEye Retina WiFi Scanner rws File Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: eEye Retina WiFi Scanner used in Retina Network Security Scanner is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted rws files. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on a RWS010 field value, leading to an exploitable overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by enticing a victim to open a crafted rws file with a long RWS010 entry. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the user running the retina scanner.

NAME: AtomixMP3 M3U File Path Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: AtomixMP3 2.3 and earlier are prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted M3U files. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on long pathname supplied in an M3U file, leading to an exploitable stack overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted M3U file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the user running the atomix player.

NAME: Mozilla Firefox HTML Parsing Null Pointer Dereference Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Mozilla Firefox is prone to a denial-of-service condition when parsing certain malformed HTML content. Successful exploitation will cause the browser to fail or hang.

NAME: Lyris ListManager Read Message Attachment SQL Injection Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Lyris ListManager 5.0 through 8.9a are prone to a SQL injection vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP URLs. The vulnerabilityis due to the lack of sanity checks on the input provided through a HTTP request after /read/attachment URL path. Since the URL is usedto execute SQL queries in the backend database, an attacker could craft a request that could execute arbitrary SQL queries. Asuccessful attack could allow an attacker to modify the database such as adding a user, and thus gain access to the victim server.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer Table Column Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the Vector Markup Language (VML) implementation in Microsoft Windows. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted Web page or HTML e-mail. When a user views the Web page or the message, the vulnerability could allow remote code execution.

NAME: GD Graphics Library PNG Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: There is a vulnerability in the way GD Graphics Library parses PNG image files. A malicious file with specially crafted fields can trigger a heap-based buffer overflow. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to create a denial of service condition or execute arbitrary code.

NAME: Apache Win32 DOS Batch File Arbitrary Command Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a code execution vulnerability in Apache for Win32. The flaw is due to lack of validation in test-cgi.bat when handling HTTP requests. An unauthenticated remote attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execution command on target application.

NAME: Alt-N MDaemon/WorldClient Form2Raw Raw Message Handler Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: MDaemon/WorldClient mail server may be prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability when handling messages with a long 'From' field. This issue may allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the vulnerable software.

NAME: MS IE EDraw Office Viewer Component ActiveX File Overwrite Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: MS IE EDraw Office Viewer Component is prone to a code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in HttpDownloadFile method in the HTML file, leading to an exploitable code execution vulnerability.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: NaviCOPA Web Server Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: NaviCOPA Web Server is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTML request.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the HTTP request.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to buffer overflow against the target HTTP server.

NAME: BEA WebLogic Admin Console Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A cross site scripting vulnerability exists in the Admin Console program of BEA WebLogic products. By persuading a WebLogic administrator to follow specially crafted Admin Console links, an attacker can inject arbitrary HTML content into pages returned by the WebLogic server. Successful exploitation can disclose privileged credentials of the targeted WebLogic server to the attacker.

NAME: Internet Explorer Frameset Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability when parsingmalformed frameset HTML tags.An attacker can exploit the vulnerability by crafting a web page using the vulnerableHTML tags, and convincing the user to download the page.A successful attack might result in arbitrary code execution, installation of malicious files,and thereby complete compromise of the victim machine.

NAME: Apple QuickTime PictureViewer GIF Rendering Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in the Apple QuickTime PictureViewer GIF processing component. The vulnerability is a result of a failure in the application to properly validate the LZW code size parameter of the GIF image. A remote attacker can exploit the vulnerability by enticing the target user to open a malicious GIF file, causing a denial of service.According to customer reports, it happens that normal gif file might meet such condition.

NAME: IBM WebSphere Application Server Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in IBM's WebSphere Application Server. The vulnerability is caused by improper validation of user-supplied input in the application authentication process. A successful attack can terminate the server process. It is also possible to inject and execute arbitrary code on the target.

NAME: QuickSoft EasyMail AddAttachment Method ActiveX Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Quiksoft EasyMail is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while handling certain crafted HTML pages containing the activex control. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on parameters passed to the AddAttachment method of the control. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by hosting a crafted webpage containing the activex and enticing the victim to visit the webpage. A successful exploit could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft SharePoint Server Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows SharePoint Services 3.0 and Microsoft Office SharePoint Server 2007 are prone to a cross-site scriptingvulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper sanitization ofURL-encoded HTTP requests to the Sharepoint site. The vulnerability could allow an attacker to run arbitrary script that can result in elevation of privilege within the SharePoint site. The vulnerability could also allow an attacker to run arbitrary s

NAME: Oracle Character Conversion Restriction Bypass Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Oracle HTTP Server using the PL/SQL module in Oracle Application Server in versions 10g and below, is prone to acharacter conversion vulnerability while parsing certain malformed HTTP URLs. The vulnerability manifests when the serveruses the WE8ISO8859P1 character set, improperly converts certain encoded character sequences to certain characters. When theseconverted characters are fed into the PL/SQL module, it could lead to certain dangerous procedure execution, leading to a remotecompromise of the victim server. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability through a crafted HTTP request to bypass the restrictionsof the dangerous procedure's execution.

NAME: Microsoft Windows Media Malformed AVI  Parsing Integer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows Media parsing engine is prone to a heap overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted AVI files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the AVI file, leading to an exploitable overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted AVI file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: ACDSee Products Plugins ID_X.APL and IDE_ACDSTD.APL Multiple Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
DESCRIPTION: ACDSee Products are prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted image files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the image file, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted image file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Trend Micro OfficeScan Client ActiveX Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Trend Micro OfficeScan Client is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in "param name=""serviceModel"" value=" method in the HTML file, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow vulnerability.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Windows Media Player Plugin Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: The Microsoft Windows Media Player plugin for non-Microsoft browsers is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability. The application fails to do proper boundary checks on user-supplied data before using it in a finite-sized buffer.An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code on the victim user's computer in the context of the victim user. This may facilitate a compromise of the affected computer.This issue is exploitable only through non-Microsoft browsers that have the Media Player plugin installed. Possible browsers include Firefox .9 and later and Netscape 8; other browsers with the plugin installed may also be affected.

NAME: InterWoven WorkDocs XSS Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: InterWoven WorkDocs is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper filtering on parameter values passed to the compnrtid parameter ofUserOptions.asp script. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted request to the server. A successful attack could lead to script code execution in the context of the server.

NAME: Orbit Downloader URL Processing Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in Orbit Downloader. The vulnerability is caused due to insufficient boundary checking when the application processes the URL string. An attacker may exploit this vulnerability by enticing a target user to open a malicious long URL. Successful exploitation might lead to injection and execution of arbitrary code in the security context of the currently logged in user.

NAME: OpenOffice EMF File EMR_BITBLT Record Integer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: An integer overflow vulnerability exists in the OpenOffice software suite. The vulnerability is due to the way OpenOffice parses EMF images. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by persuading a user to open a malicious EMF file, potentially causing arbitrary code to be injected and executed on the target system in the security context of the logged in user.

NAME: Trend Micro OfficeScan Server cgiRecvFile Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Trend Micro's OfficeScan is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability is due to a boundary error when handling HTTP requests.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to code execution with system level privileges on the target system.

NAME: Mozilla Products Overflow Event Handling Memory Corruption
DESCRIPTION: Mozilla Products are prone to a memory corruption vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. This vulnerability exists due to insufficient input validation in the HTML data. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted request to the server. A successful attack could lead to denial of service of the target application.

NAME: VideoLAN VLC Media Player XSPF Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a memory corruption vulnerability in VideoLAN VLC Media Player. The flaw is due to insufficient data validation when processing XSPF playlist file. An attacker may entice the target user to open a crafted XSPF file to exploit this vulnerability. Successful attack may allow for arbitrary code injection and execution with privileges of the currently logged on user.

NAME: RealNetworks RealPlayer rmoc3260.dll ActiveX Control Memory Corruption
DESCRIPTION: RealNetworks RealPlayer ActiveX control in rmoc3260.dll is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability.The vulnerability is due to boundary error in the set/get mechanism of the Attribute Console of the ActiveX control.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: InterSystems Cache UtilConfigHome Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: InterSystems Cache 2009.1 is prone to a stack overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper boundary checks on arguments passed to the UtilConfigHome.csp in a HTTP GET request. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: FlashGameScript index.php func Parameter PHP File Include Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: FlashGameScript is prone to a PHP file include vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP requests, leading to an exploitable file include vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Microsoft Office Publisher Invalid Memory Reference
DESCRIPTION: There exists a memory corruption vulnerability in Microsoft Office Publisher. The vulnerability is due to improper handling of user-supplied data without sufficient validation. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to open a crafted PUB file, potentially causing memory corruption and arbitrary code to be injected and executed in the security context of the current user.

NAME: Symantec AntiVirus RAR Archive Decompression Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Multiple Symantec products are prone to a  buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted RAR files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on header length in the RAR file, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted rar file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Help Workshop HPJ OPTIONS Section Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Help Workshop is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HPJ (Help Project) files. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper boundary checks on strings supplied in HPJ files. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HPJ file that will result in the diversion of the process flow of the vulnerable application. A successful exploit could lead to code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Research In Motion BlackBerry Application Web Loader ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability in BlackBerry Application Web Loader ActiveX Control "AxLoader.ocx" or "AxLoader.dll". The vulnerability is a unbounded format string error while processing user input. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the user to open a crafted web page. Successful exploitation may lead to arbitrary code execution in the security context of the logged in user.

NAME: Winamp XM File Heap Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: There is a buffer overflow in the .XM file type decoded within Winamp, a popular media file player for the Windows Operating System developed by Nullsoft Corporation. The exploitation of this buffer overflow can lead to the execution of arbitrary code on the remote machine in the context of the user running Winamp.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer and Mozilla Firefox URI Handler Command Injection Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Mozilla Firefox is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing "FirefoxURL://" URI.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on malicious arguments passing to registered URI handler, leading to an exploitable code execution vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted web page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer OnUnload Null Pointer Dereference Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Mozilla Browsers is prone to a integer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. This vulnerability exists due to insufficient input validation in the HTML data. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted request to the server. A successful attack could lead to code execution in the context of the server.

NAME: SAP DB WebTools Remote Stack Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: SAP DB Web Server in SAP DB (waHTTP.exe) is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsingcertain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of boundary checks on certain parameters passed through a HTTP request. Since the user-supplied parameter is copiedto finite memory buffers, it could lead to an exploitable buffer overflow. An attacker couldexploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request with long URI parameters. Asuccessful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the web server.

NAME: Microsoft Outlook MAILTO URI Parsing Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Office Outlook is prone to a command execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted mailto URI information. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on mailto URI in HTML file, leading to an exploitable command execution. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to execute command with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: VMware Server ISAPI Extension Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a vulnerability in the ISAPI extension provided by VMware Server to extend support to IIS for running Perl scripts. By supplying overly large data to the ISAPI extension iisperl.dll in a POST request, a remote attacker can terminate the IIS service and create a Denial of Service condition.

NAME: Adobe Download Manager AOM File Section Name Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Adobe Download Manager application is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the component responsible for parsing of the AOM file format, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow vulnerability. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the the currently logged in user.

NAME: Mozilla Firefox SVG Element Processing Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A memory corruption vulnerability exists in Mozilla Firefox. The flaw is due to an implemention error while handling SVG elements. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by persuading a target user to open a malicious webpage.

NAME: Hidden Iframe For Drive-By Download Web Exploitation
DESCRIPTION: This alert indicates the presence of a hidden iframe in a webpage. The use of a hidden iframe is popular for drive-by downloads in web-based attacks. Typically, a popular website is hacked and hidden iframes are inserted into the webpages. These webpages when visited would retrieve remote pages using the links from the hidden iframes. The remote pages could then use various techniques to download malware.

NAME: Sun Java Runtime Environment Abstract Windowing Toolkit Module Memory Corruption
DESCRIPTION: Sun Java Development Kit (JDK) and Java Runtime Environment (JRE) 5.0 Update 7 and earlier, Java System Development Kit (SDK) and JRE 1.4.2_12 and earlier 1.4.x versions, andSDK and JRE 1.3.1_18 and earlier Prone to an overflow vulnerability, which allows attackers to develop Java applets that read, write, or execute local files.

NAME: Microsoft Jet Database Engine Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Jet Database Engine 4.0 is prone to a code execution vulnerability while parsing crafted database queries. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks of user input through HTTP URLs, which could allow arbitrary commands to be executed. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request, which could lead to remote code execution.

NAME: VideoLan VLC Media Player Format String Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: VLC Media Player is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while handling certain crafted M3U files. The vulnerability is due to a format string error when handling "udp://" URIs. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by enticing the user to visit a crafted HTML page or M3U file containing a crafted udp:// URI with format string specifiers as the file name. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged in user.

NAME: Free Download Manager .torrent File Parsing Multiple Buffer Overflows Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted .torrent file. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on some filed in the .torrent file, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted .torrent file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: HTTP BrowseDialog ActiveX Control CCRPBDS6.DLL DoS Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: BrowseDialog is prone to a Deny of Service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in IsFolderAvailable and RootFolder method in the HTML file, leading to an exploitable Deny of Service vulnerability.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Baofeng Storm ActiveX Multiple Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
DESCRIPTION: BaoFeng2 storm ActiveX control in Mps.dll is prone to multi buffer overflow vulnerabilities.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on a long argument to method isDVDPathand rawParse; or property value for URL, backImage, titleImage leading to an exploitable buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Windows Media Encoder ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows Media Encoder product is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP response.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in GetDetailsString method in the HTTP response, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP response. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution within security context of the current logged-in user.

NAME: RhinoSoft.com Serv-U 9.0.0.5 WebClient Remote Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: RhinoSoft.com Serv-U 9.0.0.5 is prone to an overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on session in the HTTP request, leading to an exploitable overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Microsoft Outlook mailto URL Parsing Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Outlook is prone to a cross-domain security bypass vulnerabilitywhile parsing crafted "mailto:" URLs. The vulnerability is due to improperfiltering of certain characters such as quotation marks in the URL, beforepassing as an argument. It is thus possible to inject script code by crafting a URL with the unfiltered characters, which would allow script code executionin the local domain security zone.Internet Explorer is also an attack vector, since it in turn invokes Outlook witho

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer Location Property Cross-Domain Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a cross-domain security-bypass vulnerability because the application fails to properly enforce the same-origin policy.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the HTML file, leading to an potential remote code execution on IE6.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user or lead information disclosure.

NAME: Microsoft Windows GDI Heap Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows GDI is prone to a heap overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted WMF files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on the user intput data in WMF file, leading to an integer overflow, in some case, it could be a exploitable heap overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted WMF file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Adobe Reader and Acrobat util.printf Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in Adobe Reader and Acrobat. The vulnerability is due to insufficient input validation in JavaScript function util.printf. A remote attacker can exploit thisvulnerability by enticing the target user to open maliciously constructed files, potentially causing arbitrary code to be injected and executed in the security context of the logged-in user.

NAME: AXIS Communications Camera Control Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in the ActiveX Camera Control by AXIS Communications. The vulnerability is due to a boundary error in the handling of image_pan_tilt property of the control. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Windows Media Malformed AVI Header Parsing Heap Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows Media parsing engine is prone to a heap overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted AVI files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the AVI file, leading to an exploitable overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted AVI file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: IBM WebSphere Faultactor Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: IBM WebSphere Application Server is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on FAULTACTOR element in the HTTP request, leading to a cross-site scripting vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted http request. A successful attack could lead to remote script code execution with the current-user and zone.

NAME: RealNetworks RealPlayer Error Message Format String Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A format string vulnerability exists in the RealNetworks RealPlayer and Helix Player products. A remote user may exploit this flaw by supplying a crafted RealPix multimedia file to a vulnerable target. The vulnerability may be exploited to divert process flow of the vulnerable application and execute arbitrary code in the security context of the current user running the vulnerable product.

NAME: Microsoft PowerPoint PPT File Parsing Memory Corruption
DESCRIPTION: There exists a memory corruption vulnerability in Microsoft PowerPoint. The flaw is caused by insufficient checks of a malformed Record contained within a PowerPoint file. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary code in the security context of the currently logged in user.

NAME: Browser Network Scanning Without Javascript
DESCRIPTION: Several browsers including Firefox are prone to a intranet network scanning vulnerability while handling certain crafted webpages. Firefox is prone to a flow while using the link tag referencing an IP on the intranet of the victim. By using subsequent img tags on the webpage, and calculating the time between the requests, the attacker could see if a particular IP is up. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by hosting a crafted webpage containing a link tag to a local IP. A successful attack could help the attacker in performing scanning of a local network.

NAME: ClamAV UPX Compressed Executable Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: ClamAV anti-virus product is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted UPX  compressed PE files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on section number in the UPX PE file, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted PE file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Juniper SSL-VPN Client ActiveX Control Stack Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: JuniperSetup activex control used by the Juniper SSL-VPN client is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability. The controlis loaded by the SSL-VPN Client to connect to a Juniper NetScreen IVE device from Internet Explorer. The vulnerability is due to the lack of boundary checks on the ProductName parameter, which is copied to finite stack buffers, leading a stack overflow. An attacker couldexploit the vulnerability by crafting a webpage, which when visited could lead to remote code execution, or a denial-of-service condition.

NAME: Invisionix Roaming System pageheaderdefault.inc.php Parameter PHP File Include Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Invisionix Roaming System is prone to a PHP file include vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP requests, leading to an exploitable file include vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: America Online SuperBuddy ActiveX Control Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: America Online SuperBuddy ActiveX Control is prone to a code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in LinkSBIcons method in the HTML file, leading to an exploitable code execution vulnerability.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Opera Browser History Search Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Opera web browser is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability while handling certain crafted HTML pages. The vulnerability is because opera does not properly escape certain constructs while storing history search results. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by enticing a victim to visit a crafted webpage under the attacker's control. A successful exploit could allow injection and execution of arbitrary script content.

NAME: DX Studio Player Firefox plug-in Command Injection
DESCRIPTION: DX Studio Player Firefox plug-in is prone to a command injection vulnerability while parsing certain crafted dxstudio files. The vulnerability is because dxstudio player does not restrict access to the shell.execute JavaScript API method. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by crafting a dxstudio file containing arbitrary commands and enticing the victim to open the file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Apple QuickTime STSD JPEG Atom Heap Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a heap buffer memory corruption vulnerability in Apple QuickTime. The vulnerability is due to lack of boundary checks while processing the JPEG atoms embedded in the STSD atom in QuickTime movie files. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to open a crafted QuickTime movie file. Successful exploitation may lead to arbitrary code execution in the security context of the logged in user. In an attack case where code injection is successful, the behaviour of the target is entirely dependent on the intended function of the injected code. The code in such a case would execute within the security context of the current user. In an attack case where code injection is not successful, the affected Apple QuickTime process will terminate abnormally.

NAME: Microsoft IIS Server Crafted ASP Page Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A buffer overflow vulnerability has been identified in the Microsoft Internet Information Services product. The flaw is contained in the component responsible for processing Active Server Pages (ASP) scripts. This vulnerability may be exploited by a user who has the ability to publish ASP pages on a vulnerable host. A successful exploitation may lead to execution of arbitrary code on the target host with limited privileges.

NAME: Oracle Application Server Reports Arbitrary System Command Execution
DESCRIPTION: Oracle Application Server Reports service is prone to a command execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of sanitization on the CGI parameter 'desname' passed in a HTTP request. A successful attack could corrupt arbitrary files on the server, leading to the execution of arbitrary commands. The vulnerability could also be used to write arbitrary files on the remote server. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request.

NAME: NVR nvUnifiedControl ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: NVR nvUnifiedControl is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in SetText method in the HTML file, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow vulnerability.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: PhpBB XS Remote File Include Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: PhpBB XS 0.58 and lower are prone to a remote file include vulnerability while parsing certain crafted requests. The vulnerability is present in several PHP scripts in the include directory suchas bb_usage_stats.php and functions.php, when passed a URL containing a crafted phpbb_root_path parameter. An attack could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted URL to the server. A successful attack could execute arbitrary PHP code on the server.

NAME: Apple Safari DHTML setAttributeNode DoS
DESCRIPTION: Apple Safari is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTML pages. The vulnerability is due to a NULL pointer dereference error when parsing a crafted DHTML "setAttributeNode" method with zero arguments. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by enticing a user to visit a webpage containing the crafted DHTML function call. A successful attack could crash the browser, thus leading to a DoS condition.

NAME: Oracle Secure Backup Server Command Injection
DESCRIPTION: Oracle Secure Backup is prone to a command execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP request. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the rbtool parameter in the login.php page, leading to an arbitrary shell command execution. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote shell command execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: AOL AmpX IWinAmpX SavePlaylist ActiveX Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: AOL AmpX IWinAmpX SavePlaylist is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in IWinAmpX_SavePlaylist method in the HTML file, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow vulnerability.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: NOD32 Anti-Virus ARJ Archive Handling Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: NOD32 Anti-Virus is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain craft ARJ archive file.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the ARJ archive file, leading to an exploitable overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted ARJ archive file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution within the context of the current logged-in user.

NAME: MySpace Uploader MySpaceUploader.ocx ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: MySpace Uploader ActiveX contro is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted params to some com method.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user supplied data on activex com call, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow vulnerability. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by building some crafted HTML pages. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current user.

NAME: Various IP Security Camera ActiveX Controls url Attribute Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Various IP Security Camera ActiveX are prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on URL property in some ActiveX request, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer 7 Popup Window Address Bar Spoofing Weakness Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a weakness that allows attackers to spoof a popup window and address bar. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on non-breaking spaces(%A0) in the http response, leading to a address-bar spoofed vulnerability.A successful address spoofing vulnerability can cause the address bar to omit some characters from the URL.

NAME: Microsoft Office PowerPoint Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Office PowerPoint is prone to an remote code execution while parsing certain crafted Power Point files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the Power Point file, leading to an exploitable overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted Power Point file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer CreateTextRange Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability when certain DHTML methods are used in a malicious manner. The vulnerability exists with the usage of CreateTextRange DHTML method, which if used to call certain DHTML objects, could corrupt memory. An attacker can exploit the vulnerability by crafting a web page using the vulnerable DHTML methods, and convincing the user to download the page.A successful attack might result in arbitrary code execution, or might result in a denial-of-service condition.

NAME: Sun Java Runtime Environment Pack200 Decompression Integer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: There exists an integer overflow vulnerability in Sun Java Runtime Environment software. The vulnerability is due to insufficient validation while decompressing Pack200 (jar.pack.gz) files. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing a target user to open a crafted HTML file. Successful exploitation may lead to arbitrary code execution on the target.            In an attack case where code injection is successful, the behaviour of the target is entirely dependent on the intended function of the injected code. The code in such a case would execute within the security context of the logged in user.            In an attack case where code injection is not successful, the affected process will terminate abnormally.

NAME: Generic HTTP Cross Site Scripting Attempt
DESCRIPTION: This signature detects suspected attempts to locate and/or exploit cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in a web application. XSS vulnerabilities are created by a lack of proper checks on HTTP requests. An attacker could exploit XSS vulnerabilities by sending a crafted HTTP request that executes arbitrary javascript in user's browser, leading to cookie theft and other data leakage. This signature specifically checks the HTTP request path for an attempted javascript alert dialog box call. This is commonly used to test URI paths for javascript injection vulnerabilities.

NAME: ImageMagick SGI File Handling Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in the ImageMagick SGI decoder component. The flaw is created due to insufficient checks of data contained in SGI files during processing. An attacker may exploit the flaw in order to divert the flow of vulnerable application process.

NAME: Internet Explorer Vector Markup Language Recolorinfo Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to an integer overflow vulnerability while parsingweb pages using Vector Markup Language (VML). VML is a set of XML tags for drawing vectorgraphics. The vulnerability exists in vgx.dll due to the lack of an overflow check of aninteger multiplication result. Since the value is later used for a memory copy operation, itcould lead to an exploitable buffer overflow.An attacker can exploit the vulnerability by crafting a web page using the vulnerableVML tags, and convincing the user to download the page.A successful attack might result in arbitrary code execution, or mightresult in a denial-of-service condition.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer Element Tags Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a a remote memory-corruption vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTML files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on some javascript methods in the HTML file,leading to an exploitable memory-corruption. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by building a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer HTML Tag Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability whilehandling certain malformed HTML tags in web pages.An attacker can exploit the vulnerability by crafting a web page with malformedHTML, and convincing the user to download the page.A successful attack might result in arbitrary code execution, or mightresult in a denial-of-service condition.

NAME: Novell QuickFinder Server Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A cross-site scripting vulnerability exists in Novell QuickFinder Server. The flaw is due to lack of validation of the user supplied input data. The flaw may be exploited by malicious users to execute arbitrary HTML and script code on target user's web browser, within the context of a trusted web site. An attack targeting this vulnerability can result in the injection and execution of script code.

NAME: Husdawg System Requirements Lab Activex Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Husdawg LLC is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX control requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on "Init" method in the System Requirements Lab ActiveX control request, leading to a buffer overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: VLC Activex Bad Pointer Initialization Vulnerability Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: VLC is vulnerable to remote code execution while parsing certain malformed ActiveX method calls. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the getVariable method in the HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current user.

NAME: Microsoft Word Document Parsing Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: There is a vulnerability in the way Microsoft Word parses a specially crafted Word document. An error in the conversion of a length value leads to a heap buffer overflow. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to create a denial of service condition or execute code.

NAME: Microsoft IIS HTR ISAPI Extension Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft IIS is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the HTTP request, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request to HTR ISAPI. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Microsoft Office Word Malicious Index Memory Access Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Office Word is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability while parsing certain crafted DOC files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on a index value in the DOC file, leading to an memory corruption.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted DOC file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: ProShow Gold PSH File Parsing Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Photodex ProShow Gold 4.0.2549 is prone to a stack overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted PSH files. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on values passed to the cell[n].images[m].image field. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted PSH file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Excel Style Record Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Excel is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability when parsingmalformed STYLE records in an Excel document. An attacker can exploit the vulnerability by crafting an excel file with a malformedSTYLE record, and convincing the user to download and open the file.A successful attack might result in arbitrary code execution, installation of malicious files,and thereby complete compromise of the victim machine.

NAME: Mozilla Firefox SVG Data Processing Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in Mozilla Firefox. The vulnerability is due to insufficient validation when handling SVG data. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to open a crafted web page.

NAME: AskJeeves Toolbar Settings Plugin ActiveX Control Remote Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: AskJeeves Toolbar Settings Plugin ActiveX Control is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTML document. The vulnerability is due to boundary error when processing a malformed ShortFormat method call. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML document. A successful attack could lead to code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: ADODB.Connection ActiveX Control Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft ADODB.Connection ActiveX Control versions 2.5, 2.7 and 2.8 are prone to a double free memory corruption vulnerability.The control could be invoked through Internet Explorer and is scriptable. The vulnerability is because the control's Execute method frees memory for certain arguments, which is accessed later by the script interpreter, leading to a double free memory corruption vulnerability. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by crafting a webpage and enticing a victim to visit thewebpage. Successful exploitation could lead to a code execution on the victim machine, or cause a denial-of-service condition.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer Content Advisor File Handling Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsft Internet Explorer is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted Content Advisor files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on name field in the Content Advisor file, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted Content Advisor file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer Table Frameset Denial Of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX objects.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on "appendChild()" when cappending a "frameset" element to a "table" objet , leading to an denial of service vulnerability. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to denial of service.

NAME: Winamp ID3v2 Tag Handling Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in Winamp. The vulnerability is caused due to a boundary error in the handling of ID3v2 tags. A remote attacker can exploit the vulnerability by enticing the victim to add a malicious MP3 file to the playlist and play it. The exploitation of the vulnerability can cause a denial of service or the execution of arbitrary code with privileges of the currently logged in user.

NAME: Adobe RoboHelp Server Arbitrary File Upload and Execute Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Adobe RoboHelp Server is prone to an arbitrary file upload and execute vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP request, leading to an exploitable arbitrary file upload and execute.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Mozilla Browsers CSS moz-binding Cross Domain Scripting
DESCRIPTION: There exists a Cross Site Scripting vulnerability in Mozilla web browser and its derivatives. The flaw is caused by a validation error when processing malicious CSS or HTML documents containing a specially crafted "-moz-binding" property. A remote attacker may exploit this issue to execute arbitrary scripting code in the target's browser session in the context of an arbitrary site.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer ASFSourceMediaDescription Stack Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is vulnerable to stack buffer overflow while parsing malformed ActiveX objects. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on dispValue property in NMSA.ASFSourceMediaDescription. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a malformed HTML page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current user.

NAME: Yahoo Webcam ActiveX Control ywcvwr.dll Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Yahoo Webcam is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in server property in the HTML file, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow vulnerability.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Hyperlink Object Stack Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Hyperlink Object Library (hlink.dll) is prone to a stack overflow vulnerability when parsingoverly long hyperlinks. The vulnerability is due to the library's failure to check bounds when parsinglong hyperlinks, thereby leading to a stack overflow. The vulnerability could be exploited through any of the applications using hlink.dll such as Microsoft Office.A successful attack might result in arbitrary code execution, installation of malicious files,and thereby complete compromise of the victim machine.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer MSWebDVD Object Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft MSWebDVD Class is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTML pages.The vulnerability is caused due to the lack of proper checks in some properity/method.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by building a malicious HTML page. A successful attack would cause denial of service vulnerability of the target application.

NAME: HP OpenView Network Node Manager HTTP Request Parsing Command Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: HP OpenView Network Node Manager 6.2 through 7.50 is prone to a remote command execution vulnerability. The vulnerability isdue to the lack of proper sanitization of shell metacharacters passed through the node URI parameter to connectedNodes.ovpl script. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by crafting a URL, passing arbitrary commands to the script. A successful attackcould allow complete control of the victim server, as the attacker could gain privileges through the execution of the commands.

NAME: Microsoft Windows GDI+ WMF Integer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows GDI+ system is prone to a heap overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted WMF files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the WMF file, leading to an exploitable heap overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted WMF file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: IBM Installation Manager iim URI Handling Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: IBM Installation Manager is prone to a code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted iim URI sent in a HTML page. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper filtering on iim URIs allowing arbitrary commands to be injected in the URI. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted iim URI in a webpage and enticing the victim to click on the link. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Adobe Flash Player JPG Embedded SWF Processing Heap Overflow
DESCRIPTION: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in the way Adobe Flash Player processes SWF files embeds JPG images. The vulnerability is due to lack of input validation while parsing height and width field in the JPG header. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to open malicious SWF files, potentially causing arbitrary code to be injected and executed in the security context.

NAME: HP OpenView Network Node Manager HTTP Header Parsing Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: HP OpenView Network Node Manager is prone to an overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on OvAcceptLang cookie in the HTTP request, leading to an exploitable overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP requests. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Windows Visual Studio Crystal Reports Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Visual Studio Crystal Reports version 11.0.0.1994 is prone to a stack overflow vulnerability while parsing malformed RPTfiles. The vulnerability is due to the improper handling of certain fields in the RPT file which are used as values for memorycopy operations to finite stack buffers. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by enticing a user to open a crafted RPT file, hosted on a website, or sent through e-mail. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution in the context of the currently logged-in user, or lead to a denial-of-service condition.

NAME: Microsoft Windows LoadImage API ANI Chunk Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows is prone to a remote buffer overflow vulnerability. The vulnerability exists in the LoadImage API function that is used by several graphic applications to load images. The vulnerability is due to an API fails to check for a chunk data length supplied in user data. When the result of this integer overflow is used for a memory copy operation, it could result in an exploitable buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted image file. A succe

NAME: Apple Mac OSX Archive Metadata Command Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Safari on Apple Mac OS X is prone to a command execution vulnerability while handling certain crafted zip files. The vulnerability can be manifested when the "Open 'safe' files after downloading" option is enabled. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by enticing the victim to download a __MACOSX folder that contains metadata (resource fork) that invokes the Terminal. A successful exploit could allow arbitrary code to be executed with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Winamp Skin File Arbitrary Code Execution
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in Winamp's lack of imposed restrictions on the execution of XML and HTML code in skin (.wsz) files. Winamp implements the XML based skinable toolkit API, used to define its appearance, which allows references to HTML documents included in a Winamp skin archive. Due to insufficient restrictions placed on the HTML code, an attacker may include and execute arbitrary files on the vulnerable system.

NAME: Microsoft Windows URI Handler Command Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There is a commoand-execution vulnerability in Internet Explorer 7 in Microsoft Windows XP and Server 2003 which fails to do the proper check for theinput.  Successfully exploiting this bug will allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands in the context of users that followmalicious URIs.

NAME: Microsoft Office File Converter Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Office is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted WPS files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the WPS file, leading to an exploitable code execution.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted WPS file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Sun Java Calendar Deserialization Arbitrary Command Execution
DESCRIPTION: The Java Runtime Environment (JRE) for Sun JDK and JRE 6 Update 10 andearlier is prone to a command execution vulnerability while handling certain crafted applets. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks during deserialization of ZoneInfo objects. This allows remote attackers to run untrusted applets and applications in a privileged context.

NAME: Internet Explorer CSS Import Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability, due to the improper parsing of certain malformed Cascading Style Sheets (CSS).The vulnerability is two-fold as IE fails to impose security checks on the domainof the imported CSS, and also fails to check that the imported style sheet confirms to the CSS format.The vulnerability could thus be exploited to import HTML files from other domains and accesstheir contents using script functions. This vulnerability has been famously used against googledesktop, for retrieving sensitive content from any user's desktop.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer iepeers Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTML pages.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on dom elements in the html page, leading to an exploitable remote code execution. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page response. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Novell NetMail WebAdmin Username Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Novell NetMail WebAdmin is prone to buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP request.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP request.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request.  A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the target application.

NAME: PlayList FileName Too Long
DESCRIPTION: Too long playlist file name has been found in the HTTP response packet. It may cause some buffer overflow to your music player.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer DirectAnimation.DAUserData Denial Of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX objects.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on "Data" property on DirectAnimation.DAUserData ActiveX object.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to denial of service.

NAME: Microsoft Excel BIFF File Format Named Graph Record Parsing Stack Overflow
DESCRIPTION: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the way Microsoft Excel processes files. The vulnerability is a result of insufficient boundary checking while processing Named Graph Record. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to open a crafted Excel file, potentially causing arbitrary code to be injected and executed in the security context of the current user.

NAME: AOL Picture Editor YGPPicEdit.dll ActiveX Control Multiple Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
DESCRIPTION: AOL Picture Editor YGPPicEdit.dll ActiveX Control is prone to multiple buffer overflow vulnerabilities while parsing certain crafted HTML document. The vulnerability is due to design error when processing a webpage scripts. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML document. A successful attack could lead to denial of service of user internet browser.

NAME: Microsoft Visio Packed Object Parsing Memory Corruption
DESCRIPTION: A remote code-execution vulnerability exists in Microsoft Visio. The vulnerability is due to incorrectly handling the parsing of a packed object. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to open a crafted Microsoft Visio file, potentially causing arbitrary code to be injected and executed in the security context of the current user.

NAME: Novell iPrint Client Target Frame Parameter Buffer Overflow Vulnerablity
DESCRIPTION: Novell iPrint Client is prone to an overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP responses.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP responses, leading to an exploitable overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP responses. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer Pop-up Window Title Bar Spoofing Weakness
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in the way Internet Explorer displays content in the title bar for script-initiated popup windows. With a DNS server that supports wild-card resolving, a trusted hostname can be displayed as the starting part of a malicious hostname in the popup window's title bar. This can be used to mislead a user into thinking that a trusted site is visited, while the page is loaded with attacker-supplied content.

NAME: Mercantec SoftCart CGI Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Mercantec SoftCart 4.00b is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability ispresent in SoftCart.exe, and is due to the lack of boundary checks on the length of parameters passed through certain GET requests.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by passing a long crafted GET request that would overflow the buffer to which the parameteris copied. A successful exploit could lead to remote code execution, or lead to a denial of service condition on the server.

NAME: DD-WRT Web Management Interface Command Injection Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: DD-WRT web management interface is prone to a command injection vulnerability while handling certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper filtering of shell metacharacters in a request to a cgi-bin URI. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request to the server. A successful exploit could lead to remote command execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Sun Java Web Start Splashscreen GIF Processing Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in Sun Microsystems' Java Web Start (JWS). The flaw is due to a boundary error when displaying a customized splash screen GIF image. A remote attacker may exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to visit a malicious web page. Successful attack may allow for arbitrary code injection and execution with privileges of the target user.

NAME: Gif Image Malicous Imagedescriptor Width and Height Anomaly
DESCRIPTION: Some Image Viewers are prone to remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted GIF image files.The vulnerability is due to the improper handling of GIF files and leading to an exploitable memory corruption. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by enticing a user to open a crafted image file,hosted on a website, or sent through e-mail. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution in the context of the currently logged-in user, or lead to a denial-of-service condition.

NAME: Apple iTunes ITMS URL Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Apple iTunes 8.1.1.10 is prone to a stack overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP pages. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks while parsing long ITMS URLs, leading to an exploitable overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by enticing a victim to visit a crafted webpage. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: MiniShare Server HTTP Request Parsing Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: MiniShare 1.4.1 and earlier versions are prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTPrequests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of boundary checks on the length of GET requests passed to the server,leading to an exploitable buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a large GET request which could overflow the buffer. A successful exploit could lead to remote code execution, or lead to a denial ofservice condition on the server.

NAME: Adobe Coldfusion  XSS Vulnerabily
DESCRIPTION: Adobe Coldfusion is prone to a XSS vulnerability while parsing certain crafted QUERY_STRING requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on QUERY_STRING field in the HTTP request, leading to an exploitable XSS.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote JS code execution with the current context of the browser.

NAME: Winamp IN_CDDA.dll Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in the way Winamp parses playlist files and CD audio files. If a playlist file contains an overly long reference to a file in CD audio format (with a .cda extension) or a CD audio file has a long filename, a buffer overflow can occur in the component IN_CDDA.dll. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on a vulnerable system by enticing a user to open a specially crafted playlist file or CD audio file.

NAME: Logitech VideoCall ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow bind shell Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Logitech VideoCall is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in Start method in the HTML file, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow vulnerability.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: RealNetworks RealPlayer rjbll.dll ActiveX Control Multiple Memory Corruption Vulnerabilities
DESCRIPTION: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in RealPlayer rjbdll.dll ActiveX Control. The vulnerability is caused due to in the rmoc3260 ActiveX control when handling the "Controls", "Console", or "WindowName" properties with a specific timing. An attacker may exploit this vulnerability by enticing a target user to open a malicious web page. Successful exploitation might lead to injection and execution of arbitrary code in the security context of the currentlylogged in user.

NAME: VLC Media Player RealText File Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a vulnerability in VideoLAN VLC Media Player. The vulnerability is caused due to a buffer overflow when playing a specially crafted RealText (.rt) subtitle file. An unauthenticated remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by enticing a user to play a specially crafted RealText subtitle file. Successful exploitation would cause a stack buffer overflow allowing the attacker to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the logged in users.

NAME: Symantec Altiris Deployment Solution Multiple Remote Vulnerabilities

A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Mozilla Firefox Sidebar Panel Script Injection Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a vulnerability in the Mozilla Firefox sidebar panel feature. A web page may evade security restrictions imposed by the Firefox browser when it is bookmarked as a Firefox sidebar panel. A remote attacker may exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on a target system through enticing a target user into saving a malicious page as a Firefox sidebar panel.

NAME: PHPSimpleShop header.php abs_path Parameter PHP File Include Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: PHPSimpleShop is prone to a PHP file include vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP requests, leading to an exploitable file include vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. NAME: HP Info Center HPInfoDLL.DLL ActiveX Control Registry Read
DESCRIPTION: HP Info Center HPInfoDLL.dll is prone to a remote code execution vulnerabilitywhile parsing certain crafted activex methods.The vulnerability is due to the lack of check insecure GetRegValue() methodcalling, leading to an exploitable remote code execution vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by persuading a victim to visit oropen a website or a HTML file. NAME: Jive Software Openfire Jabber Server Authentication Bypass
DESCRIPTION: An authentication bypass vulnerability exists in Openfire Server product by Jive Software. The vulnerability is due to an insecure design in the Tomcat filter where all functions in the admin web-interface are not protected from unauthorized access. Remote attackers could exploit this vulnerability to access functions in the admin web-interface without supplying valid credentials.

NAME: Cart32 authentication bypass vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Cart32 is prone to a authentication bypass vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP request.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the c32web.exe CGI component of Cart32 which could allow remote attacker to change the administrator password to an arbitrary value without knowledge of the original password. By exploiting this vulnerability, a remote attacker can gain access to the Cart32 Administration program.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer Status Bar URL Spoofing Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer Status Bar is prone to a url spoofing vulnerability while parsing certain crafted http response.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the http response.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted http response. A successful attack could lead to url spoofing vulnerability.

NAME: CUPS and Xpdf PDF JBIG2 Symbol Dictionary Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: CUPS and Xpdf products are prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing crafted PDF documents. The vulnerability is due to a boundary error while decoding JBIG2 symbol dictionary segments, leading to an exploitable heap-based buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by hosting the file on a website and enticing the victim to download and open the file. A successful exploit could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Adobe Shockwave Player ActiveX Control ShockwaveVersion DoS Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Adobe Shockwave Player is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls. NAME: Apple QuickTime MOV File HREFTrack Cross-Zone Scripting Vulnerability

NAME: AOL Instant Messenger Away Message Buffer Overflow Vulnerability

NAME: Microsoft Outlook MHTML Handling Information Disclosure Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: The MHTML protocol handler in Microsoft Outlook Express 6 and Windows Mail in Windows Vista is prone to an information disclosure vulnerability while parsing mhtml: URLs. The vulnerability is because Outlook, which is the default handler for mhtml URLs, ignoresthe content-disposition in HTTP headers, and treats the HTTP response as MHTML formatted as per RFC 2557. As a result, any web application checks for scripting within the response are ignored, and the script is executed without user

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer JavaScript Window Function Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is vulnerable to memory corruption when handling certain requests to mismatched DOM objects. Specifically, IE does not handle a window() object. When used in conjunction with a JavaScript 'onLoad' handler, this could lead to an exploitable memory corruption. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by hosting a malformed web page using the vulnerable DOM objects, and convincing the user to view the page. NAME: iPlanet Web Admin Server Cross Site Scriting Vulnerability

NAME: Novell eDirectory iMonitor HTTPSTK Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Novell eDirectory 8.8.x before 8.8.1 FTF1, and 8.x up to 8.7.3.8 is prone to a stack overflow vulnerability while parsing certaincrafted HTTP requests. Since this value is copied to finite stack buffers, it could lead to an exploitable stack overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by crafting a request with a long Host header and send it to the victim server. NAME: Microsoft Office Excel Could Allow Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

A directory traversal value could be supplied to retrieve arbitrary files on the server.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request to the server, which couldreveal sensitive information.

NAME: Windows 95/98 UNC Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
