The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on "InitParam" method in the GpcContainer.GpcContainer.1 ActiveX control request, leading to a denial of service. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to denial of service, client browser may be crashed.

NAME: Microsoft Windows Modal Dialog Domain Bypass Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a cross-domain security bypass vulnerability, when parsing a webpage using malformed usage Modal Dialogs.The vulnerability is due to the lack of validity checks on the domain of the frame, which is directedto a local page (considered as local domain, which created elevated privileges). If a modal dialog box is opened from the frame, IE considers the security zone of the modal dialog as that of the redirected page(local zone). Using the cached object of the modal dialog with the elevated privileges of local zone, can downloadarbitrary files to the local machine.An attacker can exploit the vulnerability by crafting a web page and enticing the user to downloadand click on the webpage.A successful attack might result in arbitrary code execution.

NAME: Oracle Weblogic Server HTTP Cookie Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Oracle Weblogic server is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on JSessionID cookie value passed to certain JSP scripts. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Borland StarTeam Multicast Service HTTP Handling Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Borland StarTeam Multicast Service is prone to buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP request.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP URI.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request.  A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the target application.

NAME: Internet Explorer Security Zone Bypass Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Internet Explorer is prone to a security zone bypass vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP responses.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP responses, leading to an exploitable security zone bypass.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP responses. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Mozilla Firefox JavaScript Engine Information Disclosure
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in the JavaScript interpreter of the Mozilla web browser and its derivatives. The flaw is triggered when a specially constructed web page calls the replace() function. This vulnerability can be exploited to retrieve arbitrary information from heap memory.

NAME: IBM Lotus Domino Web Service Denial of Service
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in IBM's Lotus Domino Web Server. The flaw is triggered when a specially constructed HTTP GET request is sent to the server. This vulnerability can be exploited to terminate the Lotus Domino Web Server, creating a denial of service condition.            Note that the vendor, IBM, states that the vulnerability is not reproducible in all versions of the Domino server.

NAME: Microsoft IIS Malformed DLL Request Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft IIS 5.1 is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is due tothe improper deallocation of an object memory which is in use based on a reference counter, leading to an exploitable memory corruption. The reference counter is decremented each time the crafted request is parsed by IIS. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability bysending a crafted request multiple times. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution, or lead to a denial of service on theIIS server.

NAME: ActiveCampaign 1-2-All Admin Panel Username Parameter SQL Injection
DESCRIPTION: ActiveCampaign 1-2-All is prone to a SQL injection vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is present in the admin/index.php script and is due to the lack of proper checks on username parameter. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request with SQL injection characters. A successful attack could lead to remote command execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: McAfee Remediation Client ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: McAfee Remediation Agent 4.5.0.41 is prone to a stack overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTML responses. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on parameters passed to the DeleteSnapshot method. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by hosting a crafted webpage and enticing the victim to visit the page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: HP eSupportDiagnostics ActiveX ReadTextFile Information Disclosure Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: HP eSupportDiagnostics is prone to a information leak vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in ReadTextFile method in the HTML file, leading to an exploitable information leak vulnerability.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: MySQL MaxDB Webtool HTTP Request Parsing Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: MySQL MaxDB before 7.5.00.26 is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain malicious HTTP requests. The vulnerability is due to lack of boundary checks on the URL length of a GET request after the percent (%) sign. An attacker could send a long URL string starting with the percent sign (%) that could exploit the vulnerability and overflow the stack buffer. A successful exploit could lead to remote code execution or lead to a denial of service attack.

NAME: Vulnerability in Microsoft Office Could Allow Remote Code Execution
DESCRIPTION: Unspecified vulnerability in MSO.dll in Microsoft Office 2000 SP3, 2002 SP3, 2003 SP2, 2004 for Mac, and 2007 allows user-assisted remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a malformed drawing object, which triggers memory corruption.

NAME: Microsoft Excel Cell Length Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: A buffer overflow vulnerability has been reported in the Microsoft Excel application. The vulnerability is triggered when a specially crafted spreadsheet file (containing a malformed length field) is opened and parsed by the application. This vulnerability can be exploited by a remote attacker to crash the vulnerable product and create a denial of service condition. It may also be possible for an attacker to exploit this vulnerability for code execution.            FSC VRS research has discovered that, although the vendor has reported this as a single vulnerability, in fact there exist a family of closely related vulnerabilities in Microsoft Excel. Each of these vulnerabilities closely matches the description given in MS04-033, although each of these vulnerabilities remains exploitable after installation of the MS04-033 patch.            Further detail is provided below in section 12.1, "Open Questions to Resolve".

NAME: NoMoKeTos functions_nomoketos_rules.php Parameter PHP File Include Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: NoMoKeTos is prone to a PHP file include vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP requests, leading to an exploitable file include vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Windows Media Player Code Execution Vulnerability Parsing Skins
DESCRIPTION: This vulnerability allows attackers to execute arbitrary code onvulnerable installations of Microsoft Windows Media Player. Userinteraction is required to exploit this vulnerability in that thetarget must visit a malicious page or open a malicious file.The specific flaw exists during the parsing of malformed skin files(WMZ). A size compressed / decompressed size mismatch can result in anunder allocated heap buffer which can be leveraged by an attacker toeventually execute arbitrary code under the context of the currentuser.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer WebDav Pathname Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP response.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the WebDav Pathname in HTTP response.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP response. A successful attack could lead to arbitrary code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Excel Indexing Validation Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Excel is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted excel files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data, leading to an exploitable remote code execution.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted excel file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Macromedia JRun 4 mod_jrun Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There is a vulnerability in the way Macromedia JRun mod_jrun writes log messages in verbose mode. Specific, overly long headers can cause a buffer overflow. A remote attacker could leverage this vulnerability to perform arbitrary code execution on the target system.

NAME: Microsoft Windows MSHTA Script Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows is prone to a code execution vulnerability, while handlingcertain malformed file types. The vulnerability lies in the manner in whichWindows Shell determines the file type based on the CLSID embedded in thefile format. Thus, changing the CLSID to an executable type CLSID such as HTA, wouldallow the file to be masqueraded as another file type, which when openedcould cause code to be executed on the victim machine.A successful exploit could allow an attacker to install malicious content on a victim's machine,thereby taking complete control of the system.

NAME: DivX Web Player NPDIVX32.DLL ActiveX Control Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: DivX Web Player is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX control requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on GoWindowed method in the DivXBrowserPlugin ActiveX control request, leading to a denial of service.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to denial of service.

NAME: Oracle BEA WebLogic Server Apache Connector Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Oracle BEA WebLogic Server Plugins for Apache Connector is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on URI in a HTTP request. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: HTTPDX Server Handlepeer Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: HTTPDX HTTP server is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is present in the h_handlepeer function and is due to the lack of proper checks on a GET request. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Microsoft Office Excel Formula Parsing Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Excel is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted EXCEL files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on Formula parsing in the excel file , leading to an exploitable buffer overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted EXCEL file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Windows Media Player ASX PlayList File Heap Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in Microsoft Media Player. The flaw is due to a lack of boundary protection during the parsing of ASX playlist files. By persuading a user to open a malicious web page, a remote attacker may inject and execute arbitrary code on the target host with the privileges of the currently logged on user.

NAME: Ipswitch WhatsUp Gold prn.htm Denial Of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in the way the web server component of Ipswitch WhatsUp Gold processes a request that contains a special device name. An unhandled exception occurs when an HTTP request containing a reserved DOS device name is processed. An attacker exploiting this vulnerability can cause the web server component to terminate, causing a denial of service.

NAME: Novell ZENworks Patch Management Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
DESCRIPTION: There are several user input validation vulnerabilities in the Novell ZENworks Patch Management product. After authentication, a malicious user can submit crafted HTTP request to the affected product to exploit the flaws. The attacker may inject and execute arbitrary SQL commands on the vulnerable host.

NAME: ACTi Network Video Recorder ActiveX DeleteXMLFile File Deletion Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: ACTi Network Video Recorder is prone to a code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in DeleteXMLFile method in the HTML file, leading to an exploitable code execution vulnerability.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: RealNetworks RealPlayer RAM File Processing Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in the way RealNetworks' RealPlayer products handle the parsing of URLs. A heap-based buffer overflow can occur when parsing a URL with a large number of period characters ("."). Using a specially crafted URL, an attacker can exploit this vulnerability to remotely execute arbitrary code.

NAME: Clever Internet ActiveX Suite CLINetSuiteX6.OCX File Download Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Clever Internet is prone to a code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in GetToFile method in the HTML file, leading to an exploitable code execution vulnerability.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Sun Java JRE AWT setDifflCM Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Sun Java JRE is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted java files. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on parameters passed to the setDiffICM function, leading to an exploitable stack overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted jar file to the victim. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: LaunchP2PShare function buffer overflow in ActiveX of Tencent QQ
DESCRIPTION: Tencent QQ  is prone to a stack-based overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method call. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on the argument of LaunchP2PShare in the ActiveX request, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer Cross-Domain Information Disclosure Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A Cross-Domain Information Disclosure vulnerability exists in Microsoft Internet Explorer web browser. The vulnerability is due to the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before it is rendered to other users. This could allow the attacker to perform actions on behalf of the victim, such as spoofing content or hijacking their session.

NAME: OpManager ping.do Cross Site Scripting

The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper filtering on parameter values passed to the name parameter of ping.do and traceroute.do scripts. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted request to the server. A successful attack could lead to script code execution in the context of the server.

NAME: Microsoft PowerPoint Picture Index Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft PowerPoint is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted PPT files.The vulnerability is due to the improper parsing of malformed picture index in a specially crafted PowerPoint file.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted PPT file. NAME: phpnuke Search Module Query variable SQL Injection

An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by crafting a HTTP request and injecting SQL commands,in order to retrieve or modify sensitive database information.

NAME: IBM WebSphere Application Server WebContainer HTTP Request Header Security Weakness Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: IBM WebSphere Application Server is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on "Expect" headerin the HTTP request, leading to a cross-site scripting vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted http request. A successful attack could lead to remote script code execution with the current-user and zone.

NAME: Metasploit PDF Exploit Evasion Sample
DESCRIPTION: Metasploit has complex evasion technology for building PDF exploits. This signature indicated a PDF file which was crafted by Metasploit.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer COM Object Instantiation Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a vulnerability in the way Microsoft Internet Explorer instantiates certain COM objects that are not designed to be used as ActiveX controls. When such a COM object is instantiated by Internet Explorer, the application memory can be corrupted. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability can allow for arbitrary code execution within the privileges of the currently logged in user.

NAME: Mozilla Firefox Plugin Access Control Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a vulnerability in the way the XPCOM implementation in Mozilla and Mozilla Firefox performs security checks. The vulnerable XPCOM implementation does not properly enforce a reduced privilege security context to remote content loaded via certain plug-ins. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the target user by enticing the target user to visit a specially crafted web site.

NAME: Internet Explorer Unsafe Scripting Misconfiguration Exploit
DESCRIPTION: Internet Explorer is prone to a cross-domain restriction bypass vulnerability while handling certain crafted web pages. The vulnerability could be manifested when the "Initialize and script ActiveX controls not marked safe for scripting" is enabled in IE. When this setting is misconfigured, certain activex controls such as WScript.Shell could be allowed to access the file system without restrictions. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by enticing a victim to visit a crafted webpage and thereby drop malicious files to known locations. A successful attack could allow an attacker to drop and run arbitrary executables on the vulnerable machine.

NAME: Microsoft Excel Version Information Parsing Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Excel 2000 SP3, 2002 SP3, 2003 SP2, 2003 Viewer, and Office Excel 2007 does not properly validate version information, which allows user-assisted remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted Excel file, aka "Calculation Error Vulnerability".

NAME: SupportSoft ActiveX Controls Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
DESCRIPTION: SupportSoft is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in EnableExtension method in the ActiveX control.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to code execution within the security context of the currently logged in user.

NAME: Internet Explorer IsComponentInstalled Stack Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer prior to XP SP1, and 2000 prior to SP4, is prone to a stack overflow vulnerability, when parsinga web page containing certain Javascript methods. The vulnerability is due to thelack of length checks on the parameters passed to theIsComponentInstalled Javascript method, before copying them onto stack buffers.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by crafting a webpage, and enticingthe victim to click on the webpage to execute arbitrary code on the victim machine.

NAME: Oracle Single Sign On Vulnerability

NAME: Norton Internet Security 2004 ActiveX Buffer Overflow

A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer Frame Injection Vulnerability

NAME: JOnAS Server Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerability

The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on values passed to the j2eeType variable. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by passing script values to the j2eeType variable and enticing another victim to visit the webpage. NAME: Microsoft Visio Packed Object Parsing Memory Corruption

The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on pathnames supplied in a crafted M3U playlist. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted M3U file. NAME: Norton Internet Security Command Execution
DESCRIPTION: Norton Internet Security is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX control requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on "LaunchURL" method/property in the WrapNISUM Class ActiveX control request, leading to a buffer overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Apache HTTP Server mod_proxy_ftp Wildcard Characters Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exist a cross-site scripting vulnerability in Apache mod_proxy_ftp module. The flaw is due to lack of sanitization of user supplied input data. The flaw may be exploited by malicious users to execute arbitrary HTML code on target user's web browser, within the context of a trusted web site.

NAME: MySQL MaxDB WebDBM Server Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: MySQL AB MaxDB is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is dueto the lack of boudary checks on the database name provided to the server, leading to an exploitable overflow. An authenticatedattacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code executionwith the privileges of the Database WebDBM server.

NAME: Apache Tomcat Host Manager Servlet Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Apache Tomcat is prone to a cross site scripting attack vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP request.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the ""host-manager/html/add"" script within the Host Manager Servlet when processing the "aliases" parameter.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to script execution in the user's browser.

NAME: Sun Java JRE getSoundBank file URL Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Sun Java JRE is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP responses. The vulnerability is present in the getSoundBank function and is due to the lack of boundary checks on file:// URIs passed in a file. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by hosting a crafted applet file and enticing the victim to visit the page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: mIRC IRC URL Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: mIRC 6.1 is prone to a stack overflow while handling certain crafted URLs. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on IRC URLs passed in a crafted HTML webpage. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the running program. It could also crash the mIRC program.

NAME: Simple PHP Blog Arbitrary File Upload Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Simple PHP Blog (SPHPBlog) versions lower than 0.4.0 are prone to a remote arbitrary file upload vulnerability. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on the type of file being uploaded by any logged-in users. An attacker could thus upload script files, and cause code execution of the attacker's choice with the privileges of the server.

NAME: CA eTrust PestPatrol ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Computer Associates eTrust PestPatrol is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTML responses. The vulnerability is present in the ppct.dll and is due to the lack of proper checks on parameters passed to the Initialize property. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by hosting a crafted webpage and enticing the victim to visit the page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Novell eDirectory HTTP Headers Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A resource exhaustion vulnerability exists in Novell eDirectory. The vulnerability can be triggered by a crafted HTTP request. A remote unauthenticated attacker can create a denial of service condition on the affected service by leveraging this vulnerability.

NAME: nginx URI Parsing Buffer Underflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: nginx is prone to a buffer underflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability is present in the ngx_http_parse_complex_uri function and is due to the improper handling of certain crafted URIs. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request with a crafted URI. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server or could crash the server.

NAME: HP Power Manager Web Server Login Parameter Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: HP Power Manager web server is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on login parameter value passed in a HTTP request. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: XMPlay Playlist Files Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A stack overflow exists in XMPlay 3.3.0.4. The vulnerability is caused due to a boundary error within the parsing of playlists containing an overly long file name. This could be also triggered via IE or other browsers.

NAME: AINS function.inc.php path Parameter PHP File Include Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: AINS function.inc.php path Parameter is prone to a PHP file include vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP requests, leading to an exploitable file include vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: HTTPDX Server Tolog Function Format String Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: HTTPDX HTTP server is prone to a format string vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is present in the tolog function which does not properly sanitize format string specifiers passed in a GET request. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: RealNetworks RealPlayer Malformed RM File Heap Overflow
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in the way that RealNetworks RealPlayer products handle specially crafted media files. An RM media file containing a very large data segment length, when opened by a vulnerable player, can cause a heap-based buffer to be overrun . An attacker exploiting this vulnerability can execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service.

NAME: Mozilla Firefox IFRAME Style Change Handling Code Execution
DESCRIPTION: There exists a memory corruption vulnerability in Mozilla Firefox products. The flaw is due to improper handling of changes to style elements of IFrame objects. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by persuading the target user to open a malicious webpage. Successful attacks could allow for arbitrary code injection and execution with the privileges of the currently logged on user.

NAME: Macrovision InstallShield Update Service Agent ActiveX Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A memory corruption vulnerability exists in Macrovision InstallShield Update Service ActiveX controlimplemented in isusweb.dll. The vulnerability is due to a design error while processing calls to a methodof the ActiveX control. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to opena malicious webpage, potentially allowing arbitrary code to be injected and executed in the securitycontext of the currently logged in user.

NAME: Squid HTTP Version Number Parsing Denial of Service
DESCRIPTION: Squid 2.7 is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while handling certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is triggered while parsing malformed HTTP version numbers in a request, which triggers an assertion in HttpMsg.c and HttpStatusLine.c. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted request, and crash the service.

NAME: Adobe Flash Player Video File Parsing Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Adobe Flash Player 9.0.45.0 and earlier are prone to an integer overflow vulnerability while parsing crafted flash video (FLV) files. The vulnerability is present in Adobe Flash interpreter and is due to lack of boundary checks on certain field length values parsedfrom FLV files. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by enticing a user to open a crafted FLV file, hosted on a website.A successful attack could lead to remote code execution in the context of the currently logged-in user, or leadto a denial-of-service condition.

NAME: Squid Proxy Invalid HTTP Response Status Code Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a denial of service vulnerability in the way Squid handles HTTP responses. The vulnerability is due to a error when handling malformed HTTP responses. Remote attackers can exploit this vulnerability by accessing a malicious web server via the target Squid proxy. Successful attack could create a denial of service condition to the target server.

NAME: Microsoft Word Crafted SmartTag Record Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A memory corruption vulnerability exists in Microsoft Word. The vulnerability is due to a memoryhandling error while handling MS Word smart tags. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerabilityby enticing the target user to open a crafted Microsoft Word document, potentially causing arbitrarycode to be injected and executed in the security context of the currently logged in user.

NAME: Snapshot Viewer for Microsoft Access ActiveX Control Arbitrary File Download Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Access is prone to an arbitrary file download vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on SnapshotPath method in the Snapshot Viewer ActiveX request, leading to an arbitrary file download.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Kaspersky Antivirus Library Heap Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: There exists a heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability in the Kaspersky Antivirus Library. The vulnerability is caused by insufficient boundary checks of user supplied data when processing CAB format archives. This issue can be remotely exploited to execute arbitrary code on the target system.

NAME: VeryPDF PDFView ActiveX Heap Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: VeryPDF PDFView ActiveX control is prone to a heap overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTML pages containing the control. The vulnerability is due to the lack of boundary checks on parameters passed to OpenPDF method, which is later copied to finite memory buffers. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by enticing the victim to visit a crafted webpage containing the control. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Adobe Acrobat Reader Plugin Crafted URL Double Free Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exist a double free vulnerability in the Adobe Acrobat Reader Plugin. The vulnerability is caused due to a memory corruption that happens inside the Adobe Acrobat Plugin for Netscape browsers upon processing a URL for a PDF file. A remote unauthenticated attacker may leverage the vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary code in the security context of currently logged in user.

NAME: Over Long HTTP Host Header
DESCRIPTION: Over Long HTTP Host Header has been found which could cause buffer overflow or denial of service against your http srever.

NAME: Sun Java Web Start JNLP Stack Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a stack based buffer buffer overflow vulnerability in Sun Java Web Start. The vulnerability is due to improper bound checking while handling XML based JNLP files. A remote unauthenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to open a crafted JNLP file, potentially causing arbitrary code to be injected and executed in the security context of the current user.

NAME: Microsoft Office Word Large SPRM Records Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Office Word is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted DOC files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the DOC file, leading to an exploitable code execution.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted DOC file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Publisher Memory Index Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Publisher is prone to a code-execution vulnerability while parsing certaincrafted publisher files. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on data user supplied in the publisher file,leading to an exploitable code execution vulnerability. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted publisher file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Negotiate SSP Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Negotiate Security Support Provider (SSP) interface is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certainauthorization requests sent through a HTTP request. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper validation of certainvalues sent during the authentication protocol selection. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a craftedHTTP authentication request. A successful exploit could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Google Search Appliance ProxyStyleSheet Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Google Mini Search Appliance, and Google Search Appliance, are prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability while parsing certainmalformed search requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on the value supplied to the "proxystylesheet"in a search URL request. An attacker could supply a HTTP link hosted on the attacker's server as the parameter to the proxystylesheetvariable. The attacker could create a proxystylesheet with javascript embedded, which could allow code e

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer Event Handle Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTML pages.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on DOM element event handler in the HTML response, leading to an exploitable code execution.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Citrix Program Neighborhood Agent Arbitrary Shortcut Creation
DESCRIPTION: There exists an arbitrary shortcut creation vulnerability in the Citrix Program Neighborhood Agent. The problem can be triggered by sending a crafted XML response to an affected client. Successful exploitation can allow creation of arbitrary shortcuts which can result in code execution with the privileges of the current user.

NAME: Microsoft PowerPoint Picture Index Variant Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

NAME: Apple Mac OS X Terminal X-Man-Path Input Validation Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Apple Mac OS X Terminal is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted http response.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on x-man-path URI in the http response, leading to a remote code execution. NAME: Sun Java Web Start System Property Tags Remote Unauthorized Access Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Sun java is prone to a remote command execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted jnlp parameter contents.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on the value passing to javaw.exe in the JNLLP response, leading to an exploitable program execution. NAME: DTOA and GDTOA Libc Array Index Handling Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Mozilla Firefox 3.0.x is prone to an array index vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP response.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP response, leading to an exploitable index vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP response. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft DirectShow AVI Decoder Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in the Microsoft Windows Media Player AVI movie codec. The flaw is created by a lack of validation of certain values contained in AVI movie files. An attacker may exploit this vulnerability to divert the process flow of the vulnerable program.

NAME: SAP GUI for Windows sapirrfc.dll ActiveX Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: SAP GUI for Windows sapirrfc.dll ActiveX is prone to an overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP responses.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP responses, leading to an exploitable overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP responses. NAME: Winzip ActiveX CreateNewFolderFromName Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Winzip ActiveX Control is prone to a buffer overwrite vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP request.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the CreateNewFolderFromName method  in HTTP request.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted  HTTP request. NAME: WMNews index.php base_datapath Parameter PHP File Include Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: WMNews index.php base_datapath Parameter is prone to a PHP file include vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP requests, leading to an exploitable file include vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: McAfee ePolicy Orchestrator Agent Content-Length Header Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: McAfee ePolicy Orchestrator agent is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. The agentlistens on port 8081 for requests, fails to perform proper boundary checks on the Content-Length header value. Since thisuser-supplied value is copied to finite buffers, it could lead to an exploitable overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerabilityby sending a crafted HTTP request, which could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the agent service.

NAME: Acoustica MP3 CD Burner PlayList Files Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Acoustica MP3 CD Burner is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted playlist files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input field in the playlist file, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted playlist file. NAME: Microsoft Windows Large Image Resize DoS
DESCRIPTION: Windows Image Rendering is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted html image requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on "image" tag in the html file , leading to a denial of service.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html file. A successful attack could lead to system cpu 100% exhausting.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer HTML Form Tags URI Obfuscation Weakness
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer version 6.0 SP2 is prone to a status bar spoofing vulnerability while parsing certain crafted html pages.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on href tag in the html page. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted web page. A successful attack could lead to status bar spoofing.

NAME: Microsoft Windows Explorer WMF File Handling Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows Explorer is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted WMF files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the WMF file.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted WMF file. A successful attack could lead to denial of service.

NAME: Barracuda Spam Firewall Remote Command Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Barracuda Spam Firewall running firmware 3.1.16 and 3.1.17 is prone to a remote command execution vulnerability while handlingcertain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is present in the img.pl script and is due to the lack of sanitizationon input values passed to the f parameter. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by passing commands to the f parameterin a request to the img.pl script. A successful attack could enable an attacker to retrieve sensitive information such asadmin passwords, read arbitrary files, or execute arbitrary commands with the privileges of the webserver.

NAME: OpManager ReportViewAction.do Cross Site Scripting
DESCRIPTION: AdventNet ManageEngine OpManager is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper filtering on parameter values passed to the reportname, displayname and selectednode parameter of reportviewaction.do script. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted request to the server. A successful attack could lead to script code execution in the context of the server.

NAME: IBM Lotus Expeditor cai URI Handler Command Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exist a buffer overflow vulnerability in IBM Lotus Symphony and Lotus Expeditor. The vulnerability is due to improper handling of "cai:" URIs in the Lotus Expeditor rcplauncher code that the Lotus Symphony utilizes. A remote user can exploit this vulnerability by creating a specially crafted 'cai:' URI and enticing the target user to load it. Successful exploitation will allow execution of arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer Pop-up Window Title Bar Spoofing Weakness
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in the way Internet Explorer displays content in the title bar for script-initiated popup windows. With a DNS server that supports wild-card resolving, a trusted hostname can be displayed as the starting part of a malicious hostname in the popup window's title bar. This can be used to mislead a user into thinking that a trusted site is visited, while the page is loaded with attacker-supplied content.

NAME: Microsoft IIS WebDAV Request Source Code Disclosure
DESCRIPTION: The vulnerability depends on resources specific to each website and knowledge about the path and name of scripts are required to be able todisclose their source code remotely. Moreover there is no patch available at this time and a difference behaviour of the IIS server upon non-validrequests is not known. Therefore, remote deterministic zero-credentialed detection is not possible.

NAME: iTinySoft Studio Total Video Player M3U Playlist Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: iTinySoft Studio Total Video Playe is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted M3U files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in M3U file, leading to an exploitable remote overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted M3U file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer CSS Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted html pages.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input field in the html page, leading to an exploitable memory-corruption vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Windows Media Player Bitmap File Parsing Heap Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Windows Media Player is prone to a heap overflow vulnerability, when parsing malformed                BMP (Bitmap) images. The vulnerability exists since Media Player fails to validate the size of the file field,                which is used to create a heap buffer. However, since the rest of the file contents are copied to the created                buffer, regardless of the file size, it could lead to an exploitable heap overflow.                An attacker could exploit the vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the victim                machine. The attacker could craft a .asx files and open them with a URL, use Activex embedded                 in an HTML page or create a Media Player skin file.

NAME: ClamAV AntiVirus CHM File Handling Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: ClamAV AntiVirus product is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted CHM file.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper check in the directory header.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP response. A successful attack could lead to arbitrary code execution on the target host with the privileges of the current user.

NAME: Yahoo! Music Jukebox mediagrid.dll ActiveX Control Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Yahoo! Music Jukebox ' mediagrid.dll ' ActiveX control is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted params to some com method.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user supplied data on activex com call, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow vulnerability. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by building some crafted HTML pages. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current user.

NAME: BitDefender Antivirus Logging Function Format String Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a format string vulnerability in BitDefender Antivirus product. The flaw is caused by improper validation of file names when printing logging information. By delivering files with crafted names to a vulnerable target, a remote attacker may leverage this vulnerability to bypass the detection for further attacks or execute arbitrary code.

NAME: HP Software Update 'RulesEngine.dll' ActiveX Control Multiple File Overwrite Vulnerabilities
DESCRIPTION: The HPRulesEngine.ContentCollection.1 ActiveX Control is prone to some denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the Activex method call SaveToFile.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to overwrite and corrupt arbitrary files via arguments to the SaveToFile method.

NAME: Microsoft Windows Explorer Invalid URL File Parsing Stack Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows Exploreris prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted http response.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on HTML data in the http response, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP response. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Internet Explorer Script Engine Stack Exhaustion Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A stack exhaustion vulnerability exists in the Microsoft Internet Explorer Script Engine. The flaw is caused by certain types of recursive function calls in Javascript code. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service condition of the vulnerable application.

NAME: Microsoft Office PowerPoint Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Office PowerPoint is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted PowerPoint files. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks when using a string length from user provided file, leading to an exploitable remote code execution. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted PowerPoint file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Telestream Flip4Mac WMV File Remote Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Telestream Flip4Mac Windows Media Components for Quicktime 2.1.0.33 is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ASF media files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on ASF_File_Properties_Object in the ASF file, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted ASF file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: ClamAV CHM File Handling Integer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: There exists an integer overflow vulnerability in Clam Antivirus. The vulnerability is caused by a failure in handling an error when parsing CHM files, resulting in heap corruption. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability using a malicious email that contains a specially crafted CHM file. This results in denial of service or execution of arbitrary code in the context of the running antivirus software.

NAME: TikiWiki jhot.php Script File Upload Security Bypass Vulnerability

NAME: HTTP Non RFC-Compliant Response Found

NAME: Apple iTunes Playlist Handling Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Apple iTunes 4.7 is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted playlist files.
