NAME: VUPlayer M3U Playlist Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: VUPlayer versions lower than 2.42 are prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted M3U files. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on strings passed as UNC names in an M3U file, leading to an exploitable stack overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted M3U file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Mozilla Firefox GetXMLEntity and FastAppendChar Functions Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Mozilla Products are prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted javascript.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the javascript string function, related to the GetXMLEntity and FastAppendChar.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted javascript page. A successful attack could lead to crash the client program.

NAME: CoolPlayer Playlist File Handling Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in the CoolPlayer. The vulnerability is due to a boundary error while handling playlist files. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to create a buffer overflow condition in the target application. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution with the privileges of the currently logged in user.

NAME: Microsoft Office Excel  ExternSheet  Record Array Indexing Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Office Excel is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability while parsing certain crafted EXCEL files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on ExternSheet Record in the EXCEL file, leading to an exploitable code execution.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted EXCEL file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Mozilla Firefox JavaScript Array.splice Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in Mozilla Firefox. The vulnerability is due to insufficient validation when executing malicious JavaScript code. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to open a crafted web page. In a successful attack that arbitrary code being injected and executed on the vulnerable target host, the behaviour of the target system is dependent on the malicious code. Note that any code executed by the attacker runs with the privileges of the logged in user.

NAME: Sybase EAServer WebConsole Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: There exists a stack based buffer overflow in Sybase Enterprise Application Server. The vulnerability exists due to a boundary error in the processing of HTTP requests directed to the WebConsole. An unauthenticated remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service condition or execute arbitrary code. Any code execution will occur with the privileges of the running server, normally administrative.

NAME: Microsoft XML Core Services SubStringData Integer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft XML Core Services is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted webpages. The vulnerability isdue to the lack of boundary checks on the arguments passed to the SubStringData method of a TextNode or XMLDOM object. This could leadto an integer overflow, which could in turn cause large amounts of data being copied to finite buffers, causing an exploitable memorycorruption. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by crafting a webpage, which when visited could lead to remote code executionwith the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Apple iCal Trigger Value Handling DoS
DESCRIPTION: Apple iCal 3.0.1 is prone to a remote denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted .ics file. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on the TRIGGER value in the .ics file. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted .ics file. A successful attack could lead to remote denial of service vulnerability.

NAME: Office OCX Multiple ActiveX Controls OpenWebFile Arbitrary Program Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists an arbitrary program download and execution vulnerability in multiple Office OCX ActiveX controls. The vulnerability is due to insecure design of the OpenWebFile() method in the controls that allows downloading and execution of arbitrary executables. Remote attackers could exploit this vulnerability by persuading a target user to visit a specially crafted web page.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer COM Object Instantiation Memory Corruption
DESCRIPTION: MS IE COM is prone to a Deny of Service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in unknow method in the HTML file, leading to an exploitable Deny of Service vulnerability.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Oracle Application Server Portal Cross Site Scripting
DESCRIPTION: Oracle Application Server is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on "site2pstoretoken" parameter in login.jsp. This can be exploited to execute arbitrary HTML and script code in a user's browser session in the context of an affected site. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer Data Stream Header Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A memory corrupt vulnerability exists in Microsoft Internet Explorer web browser. The vulnerability is due to the way Internet Explorer processes data stream headers in specific situations. The attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute code in the context of the current logged-on user.

NAME: Zlib Compression Library Denial Of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in the <italic>inflate()</italic> and <italic>inflateback()</italic> functions of the zlib library. This vulnerability is caused by insufficient error handling during the pattern expansion of compressed data. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to create a denial of service condition, or with a high level of sophistication, possibly execute an arbitrary code.

NAME: HP Operations Manager Server Unauthorized File Upload Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: HP Operations Manager is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP request, leading to an exploitable remote code execution.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Microsoft Office Excel SST Record Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Office Excel is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability while parsing certain crafted EXCEL files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on SST Record in the EXCEL file, leading to an exploitable code execution.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted EXCEL file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: VBulletin Misc.php Script Arbitrary PHP Code Execution
DESCRIPTION: vBulletin versions lower than 3.0.7 are prone to a PHP code injection vulnerability. Thevulnerability is due to the lack of sanitization of user-supplied input to the templateparameter of the misc.php script. However, this vulnerability can be triggered only when the"Add Template Name in HTML Comments" option is enabled.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by crafting a HTTP request and executingarbitrary PHP commands.

NAME: GlobalLink GLItemCom.DLL ActiveX Heap Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: GlobalLink GLItemCom.DLL is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in SetInfo method in the HTML file, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow vulnerability.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Acer LunchApp.APlunch ActiveX Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Acer LunchApp.APlunch is prone to a code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in Run method in the HTML file, leading to an exploitable code execution vulnerability.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer Dialog Manipulation Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a dialogue box manipulation vulnerability in Microsoft Internet Explorer. The vulnerability is caused by a design flaw that lets an attacker manipulate the File Download dialogue box. The exploitation of this vulnerability requires user interaction and may result in attacker-supplied code to be executed within the security context of the currently logged in user.

NAME: Microsoft Windows Media Format MJPG Media File Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft DirectX is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted media files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on MJPEG stream in the media file, leading to an exploitable remote code execution.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted media file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Sun Microsystems JDK Image Parsing Library ICC Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: An integer overflow vulnerability exists in the way Sun JDK image parser handles JPG files. The vulnerability is due to improper checking of the ICC profile data when parsing JPG files. A remote attacker may leverage this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary code on the target host, in the context of the currently logged in user.

NAME: Microsoft Visual Studio 2005 WMI Object Broker Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Visual Studio is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability, caused by an errorin the WMI Object Broker ActiveX Control. The vulnerability is because this control's method can be used to create other ActiveX controls, in an unsafe manner. Thus the control could be used to bypass any security checks on the other unsafe controls, to download arbitrary code and execute on the victim machine. The vulnerability could be exploited while visiting a malicious webpage. As a workaround,

NAME: Microsoft Windows MFC Library FindFile Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows MFC Library FindFile function provided by CFileFind class is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability.Since the MFC library is provided by Microsoft to third party applications, any application using the vulnerable functionis prone to the overflow. One such application is HP Photo and Imaging Gallery that provides an activex control HPQUtil,whose method ListFiles internally uses the vulnerable MFC function FindFile. When a large parameter is supplied to this function,it could overflow finite heap buffers. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by crafting a webpage, which when visited could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: WoW Roster hsList.php subdir Parameter PHP File Include Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: WoW Roster hsList.php subdir Parameter is prone to a PHP file include vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP requests, leading to an exploitable file include vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Unreal Engine Web Server Logging Denial of Service
DESCRIPTION: Unreal Engine is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while handling long crafted requests to the web server. The vulnerability is due to the lack of boundary checks while handling long requests containing bell characters. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a long crafted HTTP request and crash the server.

NAME: Alcatel OmniVista Action Parameter Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Alcatel OmniVista is prone to a cross site scripting attack vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP request.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in language and action fields.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to script execution in the user's browser.

NAME: CVSTrac Filediff Remote Command Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: CVStrac versions lower than 1.1.4 are prone to a remote command execution vulnerability while parsing certainmalformed URLs. The vulnerability is due to the lack of filtering of certain shell metacharacters passed as user input in the URI paths. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by passing a malformed URL, which couldcause command execution with the privileges of the vulnerable server.

NAME: Mod_Mylo Apache Module REQSTR Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Apache Mod_mylo module is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability is due to the boundary error when processing a malformed HTTP GET request, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP protocol request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the Apache daemon user.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer HTML Objects Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A memory corrupt vulnerability exists in Microsoft Internet Explorer web browser. The vulnerability is due to the way handling certain DOM operations . The attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute code in the context of the current logged-on user.

NAME: Microsoft Malware Protection Engine File Processing Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Malware Protection Engine is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input field in some files, leading to a denial of service.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted file. A successful attack could lead to denial of service.It will cause false positive by many PE files who were packed by compress program.

NAME: Microsoft Word RTF Object Parsing Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Office Word is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability while parsing certain crafted RTF files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input field in the RTF file, leading to an memory corruption.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted rtf file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: HTTP HEAD Request Overflow URI Anomaly
DESCRIPTION: Some web servers are prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on HEAD in the HTTP protocol request, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP protocol request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: FireFox cross-origin data theft vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: FireFox is prone to a cross-origin data theft vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP responses.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on document.getSelection in the HTTP responses, leading to an exploitable cross-origin data theft vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP responses. A successful attack could lead to cross-origin data theft with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer Uninitialized Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTML files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the HTML file , leading to an exploitable remote code execution.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Ipswitch WhatsUp Gold Web Server Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Ipswitch WhatsUp Gold before 8.03 Hotfix 1 is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability exists in the _maincfgret.cgi script, which fails to perform boundary checks on instancename parameter passed throughHTTP requests, leading to a buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by crafting a request which when directed tothe server, could lead to code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: PHP Win32 escapeshellcmd Input Validation Command Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: PHP Win32 is prone to a cross site scripting vulnerability while parsing certain crafted http request.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on userinput field in the http request, leading to an code execution. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted http request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the application.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer JPEG Rendering Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in the Microsoft Internet Explorer JPEG image rendering component. The vulnerability is caused due to the improper validation of user specified data in JPEG image files. A remote attacker can exploit the vulnerability by enticing the target user to open a malicious JPEG image file, which may terminate the browser, or execute arbitrary code with the security context of the currently logged in user.

NAME: Mozilla onunload SSL Certificate Spoofing
DESCRIPTION: There exists a vulnerability in the way products based on the Mozilla Gecko web browser engine display security settings for a web page. Using the unload event, an attacker can cause the browser load a valid certificate from a trusted web site and show the "secure padlock" icon while displaying content from a malicious web site.

NAME: Microsoft Windows Media DRM ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows Media DRM is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in StoreLicense method in the HTML file, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow vulnerability.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer 7 setRequestHeader Multiple Vulnerabilities
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer 7 is prone to some information-disclosure vulnerabilities while parsing certain crafted setRequestHeader() codes.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on setRequestHeader() while parsing some html pages, leading to referer-spoofing, HTTP-request-splitting, and HTTP-request-smuggling attacks.A remote attacker may leverage these classes of attacks to poison web caches, steal credentials, evade IDS signatures, and launch cross-site scripting, HTML-injection, and session-hijacking attacks.

NAME: Mozilla Products Graphics and XML Features Integer Overflows
DESCRIPTION: There exists an integer overflow in certain versions of Mozilla products. The vulnerability exists in the Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG) rendering engine. A remote attacker may leverage the vulnerability by enticing the victim to visit a malicious web page. Exploitation may lead to memory corruption which can result in denial of service or execution of arbitrary code under the security context of the currently logged in user.

NAME: Apple QuickTime Obji Atom Parsing Stack Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: There exists a stack buffer overflow vulnerability in Apple QuickTime application. The vulnerability is due to improper processing of <italic>obji</italic> atoms in QuickTime movie files. A remote attacker may exploit this vulnerability by providing a crafted QuickTime movie file to the target user, causing abnormal termination of the application or potentially causing arbitrary code to be injected and executed in the security context of the current user.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer File Download Security Warning Bypass Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability has been reported to exist in Microsoft Internet Explorer 6 which allows malicious users to bypass security features in Microsoft Windows XP Service Pack 2. The vulnerability is related to a crafted Content-Location HTTP header that prevents Internet Explorer from issuing a warning when opening downloaded files of certain potentially risky types. This vulnerability may be leveraged by an attacker to mislead a user into a false sense of security when opening potentially harmful content.

NAME: MediaWiki index.php rs Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a Cross-Site Scripting vulnerability in MediaWiki index.php. The flaw is due to lack of validation in rs parameter in index.php when handling HTTP requests. An unauthenticated remote attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute script on user's internet browser.

NAME: Apache apr-util IPv6 URI Parsing Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Apache 2.x HTTP server is prone to an input validation vulnerability while parsing certain malformed HTTP requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on URI in the HTTP request. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a malformed HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution.

NAME: Microsoft Visio Object ID Table Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Visio is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability while parsing certain crafted visio files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input field in the visio files, leading to an exploitable remote code execution vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted visio file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: McAfee NeoTrace ActiveX Control Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A code execution vulnerability exists in McAfee NeoTrace ActiveX Control.The vulnerability is due to a design error while processing calls to a method TraceTarget of the ActiveX control. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to open a malicious webpage, potentially allowing arbitrary code to be injected and executed in the security context of the currently logged in user.

NAME: RealPlayer rjbdll.dll ActiveX Control Import Method Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in RealPlayer rjbdll.dll ActiveX Control. The vulnerability is caused due toinsufficient boundary checking when certain parameters are passed to the affected ActiveX control Import Method. Anattacker may exploit this vulnerability by enticing a target user to open a malicious web page. Successfulexploitation might lead to injection and execution of arbitrary code in the security context of the currentlylogged in user.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer Uninitialized Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability while parsing certain crafted html pages.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input field in the html page, leading to an exploitable memory-corruption vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Office WPG Image File Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Office is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted WPG image files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data, leading to an exploitable remote code execution.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted WPG file and ask user to open it by office. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Excel Conditional Formatting Values Handling Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Excel is prone to a code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted excel file.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on Size in the Conditional Formatting (CF) BIFF record, leading to an exploitable code execution.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted Excel file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Safari on iPhone Integer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Safari on Apple iPhone is prone to an integer signedness error while parsing certain crafted HTTP response. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP response, leading to an exploitable integer signedness error. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP response. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: EMC KeyWorks ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: EMC KeyWorks KeyHelp Module is prone to a stack overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP responses. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper boundary checks on parameters passed to certain methods of the control. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by hosting a crafted webpage and enticing the victim to visit the page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Novell iPrint Client ActiveX Control ExecuteRequest Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: The exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in Novell iPrint Client for Windows. The flaw is due to boundary error in certain method of ActiveX control shipped with the product. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by persuading the target user to view a malicious web page. Successful attack could allow for arbitrary code execution with privileges of the currently logged on user.

NAME: Microsoft Office Web Components DataSource Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Office Web Components is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability while parsing certain crafted COM requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on the data user inputed in the COM request, leading to an exploitable code execution vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft HTML Help ActiveX Control Cross Domain Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in the way Microsoft Internet Explorer handles security restrictions for the HTML Help ActiveX control. If the HTML Help ActiveX control invokes a remote HTML index (.hhk) file that contains a reference to a local HTML document, it will be loaded and executed in the local security zone. If an attacker is able to save malicious code to a known location on a target, this vulnerability can be exploited to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the currently logged in user.

NAME: Adobe PageMaker MAIPM6.dll Long Font Name Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Adobe PageMaker is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because the application fails to bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer.An attacker could exploit this issue to crash affected applications, deny service to legitimate users, or take over the system. A vendor-supplied fix is available.

NAME: Internet Explorer CSS Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Internet Explorer is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP responses.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on DOM properties in the HTTP responses, leading to an exploitable memory corruption vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP responses. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: IBM Informix Client SDK NFX File Processing Stack Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: IBM Informix Client SDK 3.0 and 3.50 is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing a crafted nfx file. The vulnerability is due to the lack of length on strings passed in a HostList field in an nfx file, leading to an exploitable stack overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by hosting a crafted nfx file on a webpage and enticing the victim to download and open the file. A successful exploit could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Download Accelerator Plus m3u File Parsing Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Download Accelerator Plus is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted M3U files. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on long URIs present in an M3U file. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by hosting a crafted M3U file on a webpage and enticing the victim to open the file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the user running the software.

NAME: Microsoft HTML Help ActiveX Control Cross Domain Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft HTML Help ActiveX Control is prone to a cross-domain bypass vulnerability.The vulnerability can be triggered with the usage of "Related Topics" parameterof the control, which can be used to open web content from a different security domain.Thus, using the control the security checks related to domains could be bypassed.An attacker can exploit the vulnerability by crafting a web page using the vulnerablecontrol, and convincing the user to download the page.A successful attack might result in arbitrary code execution, installation of malicious files,and thereby complete compromise of the victim machine.

NAME: SAP EnjoySAP RFCGUISink.DLL ActiveX Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: SAP EnjoySAP RFCGUISink.DLL is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in LaunchGui property in the HTML file, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow vulnerability.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Word or WordPad Text Converters Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Windows WordPad is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted DOC or WRI files. The vulnerability is due to an error when parsing a malicious WordPerfect document in the DOC or WRI file, leading to an code execution. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted DOC or WRI file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Squid Proxy TRACE Request Denial of Service
DESCRIPTION: Squid proxy is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while handling certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is due to a failure to handle exceptional conditions when processing an HTTP TRACE request. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP TRACE request. A successful exploit could allow unauthenticated remote attackers to terminate a vulnerable Squid proxy server, creating a denial of service condition to legitimate users.

NAME: Rising Online Virus Scanner Web Scan UpdateEngine Insecure Method
DESCRIPTION: Rising Online Virus Scanner is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while handling certain crafted web pages. The vulnerability is present in the Rising Web Scan Object ActiveX control (OL2005.dll). Particularly, the vulnerability is due to an insecure method UpdateEngine in the control. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by enticing a user to visit a crafted webpage. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Apache Tomcat Servlet Engine Directory Traversal
DESCRIPTION: There exists a directory traversal vulnerability in the Apache Tomcat. The vulnerability is due to an input validation error in Tomcat that does not properly sanitize the URI for the directory traversal patterns. Successful exploitation allows unauthenticated remote attackers to disclose or access arbitrary files on the vulnerable server.

NAME: Microsoft Word Font Parsing Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in way Microsoft Word parses fonts. The vulnerability is caused due to the lack of boundary checking when processing fonts in a malformed Word document. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the target system by enticing the victim to open a malformed document. Any code injected will be executed within the security context of the victim user account.

NAME: Microsoft IE CreateTextRange Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability has been identified in Microsoft Internet Explorer. The vulnerability is created by an error in the processing of scripts that calls the createTextRange method on invalid HTML elements. An attacker can potentially exploit this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary code on a vulnerable host in the security context of the currently logged in user.

NAME: HTTP Long File Name GIF Image Get Request
DESCRIPTION: Some webservers are prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while handling long crafted img get requests to the web server. The vulnerability is due to the lack of boundary checks while handling long requests that could overflow finite buffers. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a long HTTP request and cause remote code execution or crash the server.

NAME: McAfee Multiple Products LHA Type-2 File Handling Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: There exists a vulnerability in the way McAfee Antivirus Library parses LHA Type-2 archive files. The vulnerable archive parser does not perform sufficient bounds checking on the file name field and the directory name field in the header of LHA archive files before copying the field into a buffer, resulting in a buffer overflow. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code in the SYSTEM context on the target system by sending a specially crafted LHA file to the target.

NAME: VideoLAN VLC Media Player TY Processing Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a vulnerability in VideoLAN VLC Media Player. The vulnerability is due to a buffer overflow when opening TiVo TY media files. An unauthenticated remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by enticing a user to play a specially crafted TiVo TY media file. Successful exploitation would cause a stack buffer overflow allowing the attacker to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the logged in user.

NAME: Wireshark MMS Parsing Denial of Service
DESCRIPTION: Wireshark before 0.99.6 is prone to a denial of service while handling certain crafted MMS packets. The vulnerability is due to the improper parsing of MMS packets that trigger an infinite loop. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted request that could crash the wireshark application.

NAME: Internet Explorer Improper URL Canonicalization Domain Spoofing Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a domain spoofing vulnerability while handling certain crafted URLs. The vulnerability isdue the lack of filtering of certain special characters in the domain name of the URL, due to which a particular part of the URL couldbe hidden in the address bar. Thus, when the URL is followed, IE could navigate to the hidden domain in the URL, while diplaying the domainof the original website in the URL. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by crafting a webpage, which when visited couldspoof the origin domain of a webpage, thus taking the victim to a different website. This could be exploited to steal sensitive informationsuch as bank account information, credit card information, etc.

NAME: Microsoft Office Cell Parsing Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Office is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted excel files.The vulnerability is caused by an allocation error when Microsoft Office opens a specially crafted Excel file, leading to an exploitable remote code execution vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted excel files. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Windows Shell CLSID File Type Spoofing Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer and Windows Explorer are prone to a file type spoofing vulnerability, due tothe way in which they determine a file type and extension.The vulnerability is a combination of the way in which Internet Explorer decodes an encoded filename, and the way in whichWindows Explorer determines the file type when a CLSID is included in the filename. An attacker can exploit the vulnerability to disguise an executable as a non-malicious file, which whendownloaded could lead to installation of malicious files.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by crafting a web page and enticing the user todownload the disguised malicious file. A successful attack might result in arbitrary code execution.

NAME: HTTP Possible Nymex/Blackworm Activity
DESCRIPTION: This alert indicates a possible HTTP activity of Blackworm/Nyxem worm. The Blackworm is a mass-mailing worm that also tries to spread using remote shares. It also tries to disable security-related and file sharing software as well as destroys files of certain types.

NAME: Adobe Flash Player Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Adobe Flash Player is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted FLASH files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the FLASH file, leading to an exploitable remote code execution.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted FLASH file or PDF file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Creative Software AutoUpdate Engine ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer Address Bar Spoofing Vulnerability

A specific sequence of steps, executed in an Internet Explorer browser can allow for arbitrary content to be represented by a false address in the address bar. This can be used to mislead a user into thinking that a trusted site is visited, while the page is loaded with attacker supplied content.

NAME: Microsoft Excel Colinfo Record Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Excel is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability when parsingmalformed Colinfo records in an Excel document.The vulnerability is due to the lack of data validation on certain fields in the Colinforecord, leading to a memory corruption while parsing the malformed file.An attacker can exploit the vulnerability by crafting an excel file with a malformedColinfo, and convincing the user to download and open the file.A successful attack might result in arbitrary code execution, installation of malicious files,and thereby complete compromise of the victim machine.

NAME: Hidden Iframe For Drive-By Download Web Exploitation

Typically, a popular website is hacked and hidden iframes are inserted into the webpages. These webpages when visited would retrieve remote pages using the links from the hidden iframes. The remote pages could then use various techniques to download malware.

NAME: Novell iManager Tomcat HTTP POST Request Handling Denial of Service Vulnerability

NAME: Adobe Reader and Acrobat util.printf Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability

NAME: 427BB Cookie-based Authentication Bypass Vulnerability

NAME: Apple QuickTime PICT Image Processing Uncompressedfile Stack Overflow

NAME: Apple Quicktime SMIL Parsing Buffer Overflow Vulnerability

NAME: HTTP SQL Injection Attempt
DESCRIPTION: SQL injection is a technique that exploits a security vulnerability occurring in the database layer of an application. The vulnerability is present when user input is either incorrectly filtered for string literal escape characters embedded in SQL statements or user input is not strongly typed and thereby unexpectedly executed. It is in fact an instance of a more general class of vulnerabilities that can occur whenever one programming or scripting language is embedded inside another.

NAME: PHP Functions CRLF Injection Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: PHP functions include fopen and file are probe to a CRLF injection vulnerability when allow_url_fopen is enabled.The flaw is due to lacking of validition when parsing user provided parameters. Remote attackers could modify HTTP headers for outgoing requests by causing CRLF sequences to be injected into the HTTP response.

NAME: Adobe Reader and Acrobat util.printf Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Adobe reader is prone to an overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted .pdf file.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the .pdf file, leading to an exploitable overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted .pdf file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Adobe Acrobat Reader Active X Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There is a heap buffer overflow vulnerability in the ActiveX component of Adobe System Inc's Acrobat/Acrobat Reader. An overly long filename passed to the ActiveX control can overflow the heap, allowing for possible arbitrary code execution.

NAME: FLAC Project libFLAC Picture Metadata Picture Description Size Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: A heap overflow vulnerability exists in the libFLAC library when processing meta data inside FLAC audio files. More specifically, the problematic code processes the PICTURE Metadata block mentioned above. The code reads the supplied Description Length value, adds one to it, and use the result to allocate a buffer in heap memory. If the value 0xFFFFFFFF is supplied as the length value, an integer overflow is triggered and the buffer will be insufficiently sized. Later, the code use the supplied size value to copy the Description String to the destination buffer, resulting in a heap buffer overflow. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by persuading a user into opening a specially crafted FLAC file using a vulnerable application. Successful exploitation would cause a memory corruption that may lead to arbitrary code execution in the security context of the logged in user, or terminate the application resulting in a Denial of Service condition.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer HTML Objects Memory Corruption Vulnerability

NAME: HTTP WWW-Authentication Failed
DESCRIPTION: This alert indicates a failed http authentication flow. A multiple failed authentication response means an attack is try to brute-force user name and password.

NAME: Linksys WRT54G Unauthenticated User Apply.cgi Request Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Linksys WRT54G wireless router versions 3.01.03, 3.03.6, and possibly other versions before 4.20.7, are prone to a bufferoverflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. NAME: Knusperleicht Shoutbox index.php sb_include_path Parameter PHP File Include

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer Daxctle.OCX Spline Method Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a buffer overflow in the DirectAnimation ActiveX control. The flaw is due to improper validation of user supplied arguments to the Spline method of the affected object. NAME: Winamp ID3v2 Tag Handling Buffer Overflow

A remote attacker can exploit the vulnerability by enticing the victim to add a malicious MP3 file to the playlist and play it. The exploitation of the vulnerability can cause a denial of service or the execution of arbitrary code with privileges of the currently logged in user.

NAME: Multiple Browsers Telnet URI Handler File Manipulation Vulnerability

The vulnerability is due to improper handling of "HardError" messages in Windows Client/Server Runtime Server Subsystem (CSRSS). A remote unauthenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to visit a malicious website using Internet Explorer. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may allow the remote attackers to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the System.

NAME: VLC Media Player SMB Module Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: VideoLAN VLC media player 0.9.9 on Microsoft Windows is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain long crafted SMB URLs. The vulnerability is present in the Win32AddConnection function and is due to the lack of proper length checks on SMB URLs, leading to an exploitable stack overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by hosting a webpage containing the crafted URL and entice the victim to visit the page. A successful exploit could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: HTTP Long Chunk Response Anomaly
DESCRIPTION: There are some softwares are prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted http chunk responses.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on chunk in the http response, leading to a exploitable overflow or remote code execution.

An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by hosting a crafted webpage and enticing the victim to visit the page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.
