DESCRIPTION: There exists a stack buffer overflow vulnerability in Sun Java Web Start. The vulnerability is due to improper bounds checking while handling XML based JNLP files. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to open a crafted JNLP file, potentially causing arbitrary code to be injected and executed in the security context of the current user.

NAME: Generic PHP Inlucsion Vulnerability Mail Back Scanner
DESCRIPTION: Some php parameters are prone to a kind of PHP file include vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.This kind of vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP requests, leading to an exploitable file include vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Microsoft IIS HTR Request Parsing Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Information Server (IIS) version 4.0 before Service Pack 6 is prone to a buffer overflow whilehandling certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of boundary checks on the length of filenames with .htr, .idc and .stm extensions, processed as part of a HTTP URL. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by passing a longfilename in the URL, overflowing the buffer.  A successful exploit could lead to remote code execution, or lead to a denial ofservice condition on the server.

NAME: Oracle ORADC ActiveX Control Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Oracle ORADC ActiveX Control is prone to some denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the Activex method call UpdateRecord.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Indexing Service memory curruption vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Indexing Service is prone to a memory curruption vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP responses.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on DecodeURLEscapes() in the HTTP responses, leading to an exploitable memory curruption.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP responses. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Flashchat aedating4CMS.php dir[inc] Parameter PHP File Include Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Flashchat aedating4CMS.php dir[inc] Parameter is prone to a PHP file include vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP requests, leading to an exploitable file include vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: TrackerCam PHP Argument Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: TrackerCam 5.12 and earlier versions are prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. Thevulnerability is due to the lack of boundary checks on HTTP request parameters passed to certain PHP scripts on the server. An attackercould exploit the vulnerability by passing a crafted HTTP request that would overflow the buffer, and potentially cause remotecode execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Squid cachemgr.cgi Unauthorized Connection Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: The Squid proxy cachemgr.cgi script is prone to a unauthorized connection vulnerability while parsing certain crafted http request.This script can be used by a remote attacker to connect to arbitrary hosts and ports which could be used to "proxy" portscans through vulnerable systems.

NAME: Yahoo! Music Jukebox datagrid.dll ActiveX Control Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Yahoo! Music Jukebox 'datagrid.dll' ActiveX control is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted params to some com method.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user supplied data on activex com call, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow vulnerability. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by building some crafted HTML pages. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current user.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer HTML Element Cross Domain Security Bypass Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a cross-domain security-bypass vulnerability because the application fails to properly enforce the same-origin policy. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the HTML file, leading to an potential remote code execution on Internet Explorer 6. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user or lead information disclosure.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer NDFXArtEffects Stack Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a stack buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX objects.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on RGBExtraColor property in DXImageTransform.Microsoft.NDFXArtEffects object, leading to an exploitable stack overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Windows Media Runtime ASF Parsing Code Execution
DESCRIPTION: Windows Media Runtime is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ASF files. The vulnerability is due to the improper handling of certain functions in compressed audio files. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by hosting a crafted ASF file and enticing a victim to download and open the file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Trend Micro OfficeScan CGI ChkMasterPwd DoS
DESCRIPTION: Trend Micro OfficeScan Policy server is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while handling certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is due to lack of proper checks while processing HTTP requests without a content-length field in the cgiChkMasterPwd CGI application, leading to a NULL pointer exception. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could crash the server.

NAME: Microsoft Windows Media Format Runtime Media File Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft DirectX is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted media files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on MJPEG stream in the media file, leading to an exploitable remote code execution.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted media file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Nullsoft Winamp AIFF Parsing Heap Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Winamp 5.541 and earlier is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted AIFF files. The vulnerability is due to the lack of boundary checks on the COMM chunk field in an AIFF file, leading to an exploitable heap overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by hosting the file on a web server and enticing the victim to open the file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Internet Explorer FTP URI Parsing Command Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer versions 6.0 and prior are prone to a FTP command execution vulnerability while parsing certain craftedFTP URLs. The vulnerability is due to the lack of filters on URL-encoded newline (%0a), which mark the start of an FTP commandin the FTP URL. Thus, any FTP commands inserted after the newline character are executed by connecting to the FTP server. Sucha URL could be used to execute FTP commands, such as downloading files, sending sensitive information to the remote FTP server, or could even be used to send email without user interaction. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by hostinga HTML page containing the crafted URL, which when visited could cause the FTP command execution.

NAME: Adobe Acrobat Reader PDF Catalog Handling Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Adobe Acrobat Reader is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted PDF files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input field in the PDF file, leading to an exploitable remote code execution.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted PDF file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: HP OpenView Network Node Manager CGI Application Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: HP OpenView Network Node Manager is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is present in the CGI applications when processing overly long parameters submitted in HTTP requests. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request to the vulnerable server. A successful attack could allow for remote code execution with the privileges of the affected service.

NAME: HP OpenView Network Node Manager Toolbar.exe HTTP Request Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in HP OpenView Network Node Manager. The flaw is due to a boundary error when processing user requests to Toolbar.exe. A remote unauthenticated attacker can send a crafted request to the target host to exploit this vulnerability. Successful attack could allow for arbitrary code being injected and executed with the privileges of the affected process, normally Internet Guest Account on Windows platforms.

NAME: Microsoft Office XP HTML Link Processing Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Office XP, Project 2002, Visio 2002, and Microsoft Works Suite 2002, 2003, and 2004 could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code, caused by a buffer overflow in the process that passes URL file locations to the Office XP software. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system, with privileges of the victim. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by creating a malicious Web page and hosting it on a Web site or by sending it to a victim as an HTML email.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer IMJPCKSI COM Object Instantiation Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP responses. The vulnerability is due to the way in which IE instantiates certain COM objects that are not intended to be instantiated in IE, leading to an exploitable memory corruption. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by enticing a victim to visit a crafted webpage containing the object. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Exchange OWA XSS and Spoofing Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There is vulnerability in Microsoft Outlook Web Access, a component of Microsoft Exchange, in the validation of user input. This vulnerability could allow a malicious user to conduct cross-site scripting and spoofing attacks against other users of the web access service.

NAME: Youngzsoft CMailServer CMailCOM ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a stack buffer overflow in Youngzsoft CMailServer product. The vulnerability is due to improper handling of user requests. A remote authenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability by sending crafted requests to the target host. Successful exploitation would allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system with NETWORK SERVICE privileges.

NAME: BadBlue Information Disclosure Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: BadBlue is prone to a information disclosure vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP request.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on URI in the HTTP request, leading to an information disclosure. An attacker could obtain sensitive information via an invalid browse parameter. A successful attack could lead to reveals the installation path in an error message

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer Uninitialized Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A memory corrupt vulnerability exists in Microsoft Internet Explorer web browser. The vulnerability is due to the way Internet Explorer accesses an object that has not been correctly initialized or has been deleted. The attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute code in the context of the current logged-on user.

NAME: Microsoft Office Excel MDXTUPLE Record Heap Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Office Excel is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted .xls files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the .xls file, leading to an exploitable remote code execution.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted .xls file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Mcafee FreeScan Information Disclosure
DESCRIPTION: Two vulnerabilities exist in a component of the McAfee's FreeScan service. An information disclosure vulnerability exists that may allow remote attackers to gain file-system information and can be used to obtain the user-name being used. A second vulnerability allows attackers to cause applications executing VBScript or Javascript to terminate. Only systems that have used McAfee's online virus scanning tool FreeScan are susceptible to attack.

NAME: Long Http Transfer Encoding Anomaly
DESCRIPTION: Some http servers are prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted transfer encoding http header.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on transfer encoding header in the http request, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted transfer encoding request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Generic HTTP Cross Site Scripting Attempt
DESCRIPTION: This signature detects suspected attempts to locate and/or exploit cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in a web application. XSS vulnerabilities are created by a lack of proper checks on HTTP requests. An attacker could exploit XSS vulnerabilities by sending a crafted HTTP request that executes arbitrary javascript in user's browser, leading to cookie theft and other data leakage. This signature specifically checks HTTP request parameters for an attempted javascript alert dialog box. This is commonly used to test URI query strings for javascript injection vulnerabilities.

NAME: Microsoft Windows GDI WMF Handling Heap Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows GDI library is prone to a heap overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted WMF files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the WMF file, leading to an exploitable heap overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted WMF file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: SAP Internet Transaction Server wgate.dll ~service Parameter XSS  Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a Cross-Site Scripting vulnerability in SAP Internet Transaction Server. The flaw is due to lack of validation in ~service Parameter in wgate.dll when handling HTTP requests. An unauthenticated remote attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute script on user's internet browser.

NAME: Mozilla Firefox createRange Remote DoS
DESCRIPTION: Mozilla Firefox is prone to a remote denial of service vulnerability while handling certain crafted web pages. The vulnerability is due to the improper handling of javascript Range object, leading to a NULL pointer dereference. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by enticing a user to visit a crafted webpage. A successful attack could crash the Firefox browser.

NAME: Anzio Web Print Object Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Stack-based buffer overflow in the Anzio Web Print Object (WePO) ActiveX control 3.2.19 and 3.2.24, as used in Anzio Print Wizard, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long mainurl parameter.

NAME: Microsoft Excel File Handling Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a memory corruption vulnerability in Microsoft Excel. The vulnerability is a due to improper parsing of the rtAFDesc record of Excel files. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to open a crafted Excel file, potentially causing arbitrary code to be injected and executed in the security context of the current user.

NAME: Novell GroupWise Messenger Accept Language Header Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Novell GroupWise Messenger version 2 is prone to a stack overflow vulnerability while parsing certain malformed HTTP requests, sent tothe web server that listens on port 8300. The vulnerability is due to the lack of boundary checks while copying user input froma long Accept-Language header, overwriting finite stack buffers. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by passing a crafted HTTP request to the Novell Messenger web server, causing remote code execution.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer FolderItem Object Access Denial Of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX objects.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on "object" property on FolderItem ActiveX object.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to denial of service.

NAME: Mozilla Firefox Assertion Failure  Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Mozilla Firefox is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted html files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the html file.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html response. A successful attack could lead firefox to crash.

NAME: Multiple Vendor CUPS GIF Decoding Routine Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Multiple Vendor CUPS GIF are prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted GIF files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on GIF file, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted GIF file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Symantec CcErrDsp.ErrorDisplay.1 ActiveX Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Symantec Norton AntiVirus CcErrDsp.ErrorDisplay.1 ActiveX is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX control requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on "DisplayError" method/property in the Symantec Norton AntiVirus ActiveX control request, leading to a DOS.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to denial of service of the target application.

NAME: Sun Java Runtime Environment JAR File Processing Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a stack buffer overflow vulnerability in Sun Java Runtime Environment software. The vulnerability is due to insufficient validation while processing Java ARchive (JAR) files. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing a target user to open a crafted JAR file. Successful exploitation can lead to arbitrary code execution on the target.

NAME: Cisco User-Changeable Password CSuserCGI.exe Multiple Remote Vulnerabilities
DESCRIPTION: Cisco User-Changeable Password is prone to cross-site scripting and buffer-overflow vulnerabilities while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the HTTP request, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow and cross-site scripting vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Adobe RoboHelp Server SQL Injection Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists an SQL injection vulnerability in Adobe RoboHelp Server. The flaw is due to insufficient sanitizing of user input. A remote authenticated attacker may trigger this vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request to the target server. Successful attack may allow for execution of arbitrary SQL statements within the RoboHelp back-end database. These arbitrary SQL statements would execute within the security context of the application's database connection.

NAME: Microsoft MDAC RDS.DataSpace ActiveX Control Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft MDAC RDS.Dataspace ActiveX control is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability. This control's method can be used to create other ActiveX controls in an unsafe manner. The control could be used to bypass any security checks on other unsafe controls allowing download of arbitrary code and execution on the victim machine. The vulnerability could be exploited while visiting a malicious web page. As a workaround the kill bit can be set on this control as specified in the Microsoft advisory.

NAME: British Telecommunications Consumer Webhelper Multiple Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
DESCRIPTION: British Telecommunications Consumer Webhelper is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX control requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on "IsICMActive" method in the btbconnectwebcontrol.dll and btwebcontrol.dll ActiveX control request, leading to a buffer overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of t

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer HTML Rendering Remote Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a memory-corruption vulnerability while parsing certaincrafted HTML rendering elements. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on certain DOM element ref call in the HTML page, leading to an exploitable memory-corruption vulnerability. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by building a crafted HTML page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: CA AV Engine CAB Header Parsing Stack Overflow Exploit
DESCRIPTION: There exists a stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability in multiple Computer Associates products. The vulnerability exists in the component that processes CAB files. A remote unauthenticated attacker can exploit the vulnerability causing a denial of service condition or the execution of arbitrary code on the target system through delivering a specially crafted CAB file to the target.

NAME: Microsoft Step-by-Step Interactive Training Crafted Bookmark Link File Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Step-by-Step Interactive Training is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted bookmark link files. The vulnerability is due to the lack of boundary checks while parsing syllabus string in a bookmark link file. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted bookmark link file. A successful attack could allow code execution with the privileges of the currently logged in User.

NAME: VMware Inc 6.0.0 CreateProcess Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: EMC VMware 6.0.0 is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP responses.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP response, leading to an exploitable remote code execution. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP response. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Sun Java RunTime Environment GIF Images Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Java is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted GIF images.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input field in the GIF file, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted GIF file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user or server.

NAME: LeadTools Raster Dialog File Object LTRDF14E.DLL ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: LeadTools is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX control requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on "Directory" method/property in the LeadTools Raster Dialog File ActiveX control request, leading to a buffer overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Alcatel OmniPCX Office FastJSData id2 Parameter Command Execution
DESCRIPTION: Alcatel OmniPCX before 210/091.001 is prone to a arbitrary command execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is present in the FastJSData.cgi script and is due to the lack of proper checks on id2 parameter value. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request with shell metacharacters in the id2 parameter. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Mozilla Firefox Wrapped JavaScript Code Execution
DESCRIPTION: There exists a vulnerability in Mozilla web browser and its derivatives. The flaw is caused by insufficient validation when handling javascript URLs. A remote attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary JavaScript code with escalated privileges.

NAME: Microsoft Excel Sheet Name Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A memory corruption vulnerability has been reported in Microsoft Excel. The vulnerability is due to the way Microsoft Excel parses malicious XLS files containing a specially crafted sheet name. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by persuading a user to open a specially crafted XLS file, potentially causing arbitrary code to be injected and executed in the security context of the logged in user.

NAME: Mozilla Firefox iframe.contentWindow.focus Deleted Object Reference Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A remotely exploitable code execution vulnerability has been reported in the Mozilla Firefox product. The vulnerability is created as a result of a flaw in the implementation of the JavaScript focus method. Exploitation of this vulnerability may allow a malicious user to inject and execute arbitrary code on a target host within the security context of the current user.

NAME: Multiple Vendor AntiVirus Extended ASCII Filename Scan Bypass Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: AntiVirus products from several vendors are affected by a virus scan bypass vulnerability. The vulnerability may allow an attacker to deliver a known virus to a target host while evading the virus scan. Exploitation of this flaw may aid in further target host compromise.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer Cross Domain Information Disclosure Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a information disclosure vulnerabilitywhile parsing certain crafted html pages.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the web page, leading to an information disclosure vulnerability. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted web page. A successful attack could obtain some information from current logged-in user.

NAME: Xunlei Thunder DapPlayer ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Xunlei Web Thunder ActiveX control is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted parameter for DownURL2 method.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on DownURL2 parameter, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft File Converter Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Office is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted Microsoft Publisher files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user provided data in the pub file, leading to an exploitable code execution.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted pub file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Visual Basic For Applications Document Handling Buffer Overrun Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Visual Basic for Applications is prone to an buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted office file.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the office file, leading to an exploitable overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted office file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Excel Malformed File Format Parsing Code Execution
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Excel is prone to a code execution vulnerability while parsing certain excel file.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks within the certain BIFF record in the excel file, leading to a code execution condition.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted excel file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution within the context of the current logged-in user.

NAME: NT IIS4 DoS - ExAir Sample Site Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft NT IIS4 is prone to a large CPU usage (100%) vulnerability while parsing malformed HTTP requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on unnecessary file requests in the HTTP request.

NAME: Microsoft Excel Malformed OBJECT Record Code Execution
DESCRIPTION: There exists an arbitrary index pointer code execution vulnerability in Microsoft Excel. The flaw is caused by an insufficient check of a malformed OBJECT Record in an Excel file. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary code in the security context of the currently logged in user.

NAME: Microsoft Windows Help And Support Center URI Validation Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows Help and Support Center is prone to an argument injection vulnerability while parsing crafted "HCP://" URLs.The vulnerability exists in HelpCtr.exe, which does not sanitize the arguments from the HCP URLs, which would allow an attacker to inject malicious scripting code and execute it in the local machine zone.An attacker can exploit the vulnerability by crafting a web page and enticing the user to download and click on the webpage. A successful attack might result in arbitrary code execution.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer HTML Objects Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer handles table operations in specific situations that will result in memory corruption which can lead to a crash or remote code execution.

NAME: Adobe Acrobat FlateDecode Parameters Integer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Adobe Reader and Acrobat are prone to an integer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted PDF files. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper boundary checks on parameters passed to the FlateDecode filter. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability hosting a crafted PDF file and enticing the victim to visit the webpage containing the PDF. A successful exploit could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: BigAnt Server HTTP Request Parsing Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: BigAnt IM Server in BigAnt Messenger 2.2 is prone to a stack overflow vulnerability while handling certain crafted HTTP requests on port 6080. The vulnerability is present in the AntServer module (AntServer.exe). The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper length checks on HTTP URIs. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Internet Explorer Vector Markup Language Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted   web pages.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in Vector Markup Language (VML) in the web page, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Symantec Sygate Management Server SMS Authentication Servlet SQL Injection
DESCRIPTION: Symantec Sygate Management Server (SMS) versions 4.1 build 1417 and earlier are prone to a SQL injection vulnerability. Thevulnerability is present in the Authentication Servlet and is due to the lack of sanity checks on the input providedthrough the HTTP request parameters to the servlet. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by passing a crafted HTTP request,that could allow creation or modification of user accounts. A successful attack could thus allow privileged access to the serverby modifying the user accounts.

NAME: Adobe PDF Reader and Acrobat JS Media NewPlayer Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Adobe PDF Reader and Acrobat is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted PDF files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on JS fucntion in the PDF file, leading to an exploitable remote code execution.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted PDF file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer HTML Tags  Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTML pages.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on some html tags in the html page, leading to an exploitable memory corruption vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Internet Explorer Vector Markup Language Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted   web pages.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in Vector Markup Language (VML) in the web page, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: GlobalLink glitemflat.dll ActiveX Heap Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: GlobalLink glitemflat.dll is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in SetClientInfo method in the HTML file, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow vulnerability.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Apple QuickTime Jpeg2000 Marker Size Heap Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Apple Quikctime is prone to a heap overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted JPEG2000 images.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on marker size in the JPEG2000 files, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted JPEG2000 image. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: MiniBB Forum absolute_path Parameter PHP File Include
DESCRIPTION: MiniBB Forum 1.5a and earlier is prone to a remote file inclusion vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is present in the absolute_path parameter of the index.php and com_minibb.php scripts. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted request contaning arbitrary PHP code in the absolute_path paramter. A successful attack could lead to arbitray PHP code execution.

NAME: Apple QuickTime STSD Atoms Handling Heap Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in Apple QuickTime. The flaw is due to boundary errorswhen processing the Sample Table Sample Descriptor (STSD) atom in QuickTime movie files. A remoteattacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to open a crafted QuickTime movie file.Successful exploitation may lead to arbitrary code execution in the security context of the logged in user.

NAME: GNOME Project libxslt RC4 Key String Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: There exists a heap based buffer overflow vulnerability in RC4 libxslt libraryextension. The vulnerability is due to a boundary error in handling of strings passed to RC4 encryption/decryption functions. This vulnerability can be exploited using a crafted stylesheet leading to a heap-based buffer overflow, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code with privileges of the application using the libxslt library to perform XSL transformations.

NAME: OpenOffice EMF File EMR Record Parsing Integer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: An integer overflow vulnerability exists in the OpenOffice software suite. The vulnerability is due to the way OpenOffice parses EMF images. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by persuading a user to open a malicious EMF file, potentially causing arbitrary code to be injected and executed on the target system in the security context of the logged in user.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer handles a memory object.  When Internet Explorer attempts to access an object that has been deleted, memory may be corrupted in such a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the logged-on user.

NAME: Microsoft WordPerfect Converter Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Wordperfect Converter is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while handling certain crafted WPC files. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on data offset and data size parameters while parsing the WPC files. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by hosting a crafted file on a website and enticing the victim to download it. A successful exploit could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer Property Method Remote Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a memory-corruption vulnerability while parsing certaincrafted HTML elements. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on certain DOM element ref call in the HTML page, leading to an exploitable memory-corruption vulnerability. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by building a crafted HTML page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Novell eDirectory iMonitor Overflow Exploit Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Novell eDirectory 8.7.3 on Windows is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability is present in the iMonitor component of the server, and is due to the lack of boundary checkson the lengths of certain resource requests. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by passing a crafted overly longHTTP requests that could exploit the vulnerability and cause remote code execution on the server.

NAME: LeadTools Raster Dialog File D LTRDF14E.DLL ActiveX Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: LeadTools Raster Dialog File D LTRDF14E.DLL is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in DestinationPath property in the HTML file, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow vulnerability.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Works File Converter Field Length Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Works File Converter is prone to a heap overflow vulnerability while parsing certaincrafted WPS files. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on field length in the WPS file,leading to an exploitable heap overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted WPS file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: F-Secure Products Web Console Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in the Web Console of multiple F-Secure products. The vulnerability is caused by insufficient validation of the user-supplied data to the HTTP server hosting the console. An unauthenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service condition, or to inject and execute arbitrary code with the security context of the vulnerable service, normally System.

NAME: Microsoft Windows Saved Search File downloaded
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Explorer is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain malformed Windows Search files. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability if a user is logged in with administrative rights. The attacker could create new priviledged users, install programs, or view, change, or delete data. Users whose accounts are configured to have fewer user rights on the system could be less impacted than users who operate with administrative user rights.

NAME: RealPlayer ActiveX Control Playlist Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: RealNetworks RealPlayer is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTML pages. The vulnerability is present in the ActiveX control ierpplug.dll, and is due to the lack of proper checks while allocating space to copy user-supplied input. If the user-supplied "playlist name" parameter is copied to finite stack buffers, it could lead to an exploitable stack overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by crafting a webpage containing the control, and entice

NAME: Internet Explorer MSXML Race Condition Memory Corruption
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability while parsing certain crafted html pages.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input field in the html page, leading to an exploitable memory-corruption vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: phpBook mail Parameter PHP Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: phpBook is prone to a code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted http request.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on mail field in the http request, leading to an code execution. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted http request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server

NAME: UltraISO CCD and IMG File Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: UltraISO 9.3.3.2685 is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted CCD/IMG files. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on certain field values passed in a CCD/IMG file. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by hosting a crafted file and enticing the victim to open the file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the user running the UltraISO software.

NAME: Microsoft IIS Chunked Encoding Transfer Heap Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Information Server (IIS) 4.0 and 5.0 are prone to a heap overflow vulnerability while parsing certain craftedHTTP requests. The vulnerability is due to the improper parsing of chunk-encoded form data sent as a POST request to IIS, causing critical heap structures to be overwritten. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by passing a crafted HTTP POST request, and causeremote code execution with the privileges of the web server.

NAME: Mozilla Firefox File Input Element Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists vulnerability in Mozilla Firefox. The vulnerability is due to a race condition when handling a DOM method on a specific HTML formobject. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to open a crafted web page. Successful exploitation would allow for arbitrary code injection and execution with the privileges of the currently logged on user.

NAME: Microsoft GDI+ JPEG Parsing Integer Underflow
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Graphics Device Interface (GDI+) JPEG handler is prone to an integer underflow, when parsing malformed                JPEG images. The parsing routine in the GDI+ dll does not perform proper sanity checks before using the JPEG data,                which is later used in a memory copy. An attacker could exploit the                issue to copy code of attacker's choice into memory, and execute the code on the victim machine.                 The attacker could cra

NAME: Panda Antivirus ZOO Archive Decompression Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: There exists a heap-based buffer overflow in Panda Antivirus. The flaw is caused by a boundary error when scanning a user supplied ZOO archive. Exploiting this vulnerability may cause a denial of service condition, or reportedly may result in arbitrary code execution. Any code executed as a result of exploitation will be executed with the privileges of the target application, system by default.

NAME: OpenOffice TIFF File Parser Multiple Integer Overflow Vulnerabilities
DESCRIPTION: OpenOffice is prone to a integer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted tiff files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on some record in the tiff file, leading to an exploitable integer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted tiff file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: IE ADODB.Recordset ActiveX object DOS Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Internet explorer ADODB.Recordset ActiveX object is prone to a DoS vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTML document. The vulnerability is due to by a NULL pointer dereference that can occur when processing a malformed ADODB.Recordset ActiveX object 'Filter' property. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML document. A successful attack could lead to a victim's browser to crash.

NAME: Windows Media Player Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Windows Media Player is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain malformed HTTP responses. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP response. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a malformed HTTP response. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current user.

NAME: Apple iTunes AAC File Parsing Integer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: An integer overflow vulnerability exists in Apple iTunes. The vulnerability is caused due to improper handling the sample table size atom (STSZ) when processing AAC media files. An attacker may exploit the vulnerability by delivering a crafted AAC media file to a target user and enticing the user to open it, resulting in execution of arbitrary code on the target host within the security context of the current user.

NAME: Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities in the layout engine in Mozilla Firefox
DESCRIPTION: Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities in the layout engine in Mozilla Firefox before 1.5.0.8, Thunderbird before 1.5.0.8, and SeaMonkey before 1.0.6 allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via unspecified vectors.

NAME: Microsoft Windows Graphics Rendering Engine WMF Record Parsing Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability                when parsing Windows Meta File (WMF) files. The vulnerability is present in the Graphics                Rendering Engine and is due to the lack of proper checks on the Size field of the WMF record, which is later                used in a memory copy operation. This could result in overwriting heap structures,                which could be exploited by an attacker to inject malicious code.                An attacker could craft a WMF file and host it on a website, which when downloaded                could facilitate remote code execution.

NAME: Squid Proxy Client NTLM Authentication Denial Of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in the Squid proxy server in the processing of authentication requests. The flaw is caused by improper handling of malformed NTLM authentication requests. By sending such crafted HTTP requests to the target, a remote malicious user may exploit this vulnerability to terminate an affected Squid proxy server, creating a denial of service condition.

NAME: Second Sight ActiveGS ActiveX control filename overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Second Sight ActiveGS is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in Slot52 property in the HTML file, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow vulnerability.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: IE CCRP Folder Treeview ActiveX control DoS Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: IE CCRP Folder Treeview is prone to a Deny of Service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in RootFolder property in the HTML file, leading to an exploitable Deny of Service vulnerability.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer HTTPS Proxy Information Disclosure Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in Microsoft Internet Explorer. The vulnerability can occur when Internet Explorer is configured to use an HTTPS proxy with Basic authentication. This flaw may be exploited by an attacker to read an HTTPS request URL sent by Internet Explorer despite the use of an encrypted connection.

NAME: RealPlayer RealMedia Security Bypass
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in the way that RealNetworks line of RealPlayer products handle clip-encoded URLs. A malicious website can load a local HTML document within the Microsoft HTML viewer control in the local zone security context by using a specially crafted RealMedia file. An attacker exploiting this flaw can bypass certain security restrictions.

NAME: The JavaScript engine vulnerability in Mozilla Firefox
DESCRIPTION: The JavaScript engine in Mozilla Firefox 3.x before 3.0.4, Firefox 2.x before 2.0.0.18, Thunderbird 2.x before 2.0.0.18, and SeaMonkey 1.x before 1.1.13 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via vectors related to "insufficient class checking" in the Date class.

NAME: NetSprint Toolbar ActiveX Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: NetSprint Toolbar is prone to a Denial of Service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in IsChecked method in the HTML file, leading to an exploitable Denial of Service vulnerability. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: ffdshow Codec Media Stream URL Processing Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the ffdshow codec. The vulnerability is due to a boundary error when processing URLs. Remote attackers could exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to view a media stream or open an HTML page embedded media stream. Successful exploitation would cause a memory corruption that may lead to arbitrary code execution in the security context of the currently logged on user.

NAME: Microsoft Embedded OpenType Font Integer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Office is prone to a heap overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted Microsoft Embedded OpenType (EOT) Font files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user provided data in the Embedded OpenType (EOT) Font file, leading to an exploitable code execution.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted Embedded OpenType (EOT) Font file. A successful attack could lead to heap overflow and code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: ACD Systems ACDSee Products XPM File Handling Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: There exists a stack buffer overflow vulnerability in the ACD Systems, ACDSee products. The vulnerability is due to improper boundary validation when processing XPM images. The flaw can be leveraged remotely to execute arbitrary code under the context of the currently logged in user.

NAME: Mozilla Firefox Click Event Classification Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There is a vulnerability in the way Mozilla Firefox classifies mouse clicks generated by scripts. The product treats the script generated clicks in the same manner as normal user clicks. An attacker can exploit this flaw to simulate user actions. The most dangerous exploit for this vulnerability currently known is the ability to automatically download files. Taking advantage of the Alt-click automatic download capability in Firefox, an attacker can use this vulnerability to download malicious content to the target client system without any user intervention.

NAME: Microsoft Visual Studio .NET msdds.dll Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a vulnerability in the Microsoft Design Tools Diagram Surface COM object, an object bundled with several popular Microsoft products. When this COM object is instantiated as an ActiveX component by Internet Explorer, memory corruption can occur. A remote attacker can exploit the vulnerability by enticing the victim to open a malicious web page using Internet Explorer. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability can allow for arbitrary code execution with the privileges of the currently logged in user.

NAME: Microsoft Visual Studio dbp and sln File Handling Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Visual Studio is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted project files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the project file, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted project file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Excel IMDATA Record Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Excel is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted XLS files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on IMDATA record in the XLS file, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted excel file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft XML Parser Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in the Microsoft WebDAV XML message handler. By sending a specially crafted WebDAV request, an attacker is able to trigger this vulnerability on a vulnerable server running Microsoft IIS and WebDAV. Such a specially crafted request can cause the WebDAV XML message handler to consume large amounts of memory and CPU resources, creating a denial of service condition.

NAME: GeckoActiveXObject installed COM objects enumeration vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: GeckoActiveXObject is prone to a installed COM objects enumeration vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP responses.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP response, leading to an exploitable vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP response. A successful attack could lead to enumerate installed COM objects of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Office PowerPoint Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Office PowerPoint is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted PowerPoint files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks when casting some PowerPoint objects, leading to an exploitable remote code execution.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted PowerPoint file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Opera Browser file URI Handling Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in Opera Software's Opera Web browser. The flaw is due to a boundary error when handling overly long "file://" Universal Resource Indicator (URI) strings. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to open a malicious HTML document. Successful attack may allow for arbitrary code injection and execution with privileges of the currently logged on user.

NAME: Move Media Player Quantum Streaming qsp2ie07074039.dll ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Move Media Player is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on "UploadLogs" method in the Quantum Streaming IE Player ActiveX control, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Office Malformed Routing Slip Code Execution
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in Microsoft Office components when processing documents which include malformed Routing Slip records. This vulnerability may be exploited by supplying a malicious document to a vulnerable target host and enticing a user to open the file. An attacker may exploit this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary code into the vulnerable application process.

NAME: Microsoft Windows Media File Format Stream Property error correction  Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows Media is prone to a heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ASF files. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on the error correction and type-specific data lengths of a Stream Property entry of an ASF stream, leading to an exploitable heap overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted ASF file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges

NAME: Aurigma Image Uploader ActiveX Control Multiple Remote Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
DESCRIPTION: Aurigma Image Uploader ActiveX Control is prone to some buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the Activex method call GotoFolder.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Office PowerPoint Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Office PowerPoint is prone to an remote code execution while parsing certain crafted Power Point files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the Power Point file, leading to an exploitable overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted Power Point file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Internet Explorer DirectAnimationPath Control KeyFrame Method Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to an integer overflow vulnerability when a craftedargument is passed to the KeyFrame or Spline method of DirectAnimationPath ActiveX object.The vulnerability leads to an invalid memory copy, which could be exploited by an attackerto cause code execution. The vulnerability could be exploited while visiting a maliciouswebpage.

NAME: Apple Mac OS X DMG UFS FFS_MountFS Integer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Mac OS X 10.4.8 and FreeBSD 6.1  is prone to a integer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted DMG files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on negative size in the DMG files, leading to an exploitable heap overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted DMG file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server

NAME: RSA Authentication Agent for Web IISWebAgentIF.dll Redirect Overflow
DESCRIPTION: RSA Authentication Agent for Web for IIS "IISWebAgentIF.dll", is prone to a stack overflow vulnerability whileparsing certain crafted HTTP request. The vulnerability is due to the lack of boundary checks while parsing the url parameterin the Redirect method, causing a stack overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by passing a crafted HTTPrequest that would trigger the overflow, thereby causing remote code execution with the permissions of the server.

NAME: Yahoo Messenger URL Handler Remote DoS
DESCRIPTION: Yahoo Messenger is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while handling certain crafted HTTP responses. The vulnerability is due to the improper parsing of room login or room join request packets sent in a YMSGR URL. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted YMSGR URL in a HTML page, which when clicked could disconnect the user from the current chat session.

NAME: Zenturi ProgramChecker ActiveX DownloadFile File Download Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Zenturi ProgramChecker is prone to a code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in NavigateUrl method in the HTML file, leading to an exploitable code execution vulnerability.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Apple QuickTime PICT Image Poly Structure Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Apple Inc.'s QuickTime media player is prone to a heap overflow vulnerabilitywhile parsing certain crafted CTAB atom files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on PackBitsRgn field, it could leading to an exploitable heap corruption.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by creating a crafted image file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Mozilla Firefox XML.prototype.hasOwnProperty bug
DESCRIPTION: Unspecified vulnerability in Mozilla Firefox before 1.5.0.8, Thunderbird before 1.5.0.8, and SeaMonkey before 1.0.6 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via the XML.prototype.hasOwnProperty JavaScript function.

NAME: Acoustica Beatcraft Project Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Acoustica Beatcraft is prone to an overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted Beatcraft Project (aka bcproj) files. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on a certain instruments title field, leading to an exploitable overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by hosting a crafted bcproj file on a webpage and enticing the victim to open the file. A successful exploit could allow remote code execution with the privileges of the user running the Beatcraft software.

NAME: Horde Help Viewer Remote PHP Code Injection Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Horde Application Framework versions 3.0 before 3.0.10 and 3.1 before 3.1.1 is vulnerable to a PHP code injection vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of sanitization of user-supplied input to certain parameters in a HTTP request to help viewer. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by crafting a HTTP request and execute arbitrary commands with the privilege of the server.

NAME: Microsoft Pdwizard PublicTools ActiveX Control Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft ActiveX Control Pdwizard.ocx for Internet Explorer 5.01, 6 SP1, and 7 is prone to a remote code executionvulnerability. The vulnerability is present in the control with progID PDWizard.PublicTools and is due to certaindangerous methods such as StartProcess, SyncShell etc, which could enable remote code execution.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by crafting a webpage, which when visited could lead to remote code executionwith the privileges of the current logged-in

NAME: Oracle Application Server 9i WebCache File Corruption
DESCRIPTION: Oracle Application Server is prone to a arbitrary file overwrite vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is present in the web cache server, and is due to the lack of validation of the location of web cache dump files. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request to the web cache server running on TCP port 4000. A successful exploit could allow an attacker to corrupt any system file using the Web Cache dump file.

NAME: Apache Struts Directory Traversal Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Apache Struts is prone to an information disclosure vulnerability while parsing certain crafted requests. The vulnerability is present in the FilterDispatcher and DefaultStaticContentLoader classes of struts. The vulnerability is due to the improper sanitization of URIs containing directory traversal paths. A successful attack could lead to information disclosure of arbitrary files on the vulnerable server.

NAME: Microsoft Outlook mailto URL Parsing Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Outlook is prone to a cross-domain security bypass vulnerabilitywhile parsing crafted "mailto:" URLs. The vulnerability is due to improperfiltering of certain characters such as quotation marks in the URL, beforepassing as an argument. It is thus possible to inject script code by crafting a URL with the unfiltered characters, which would allow script code executionin the local domain security zone.Internet Explorer is also an attack vector, since it in turn invokes Outlook witho

NAME: Multiple Vendor SOAP Server Undisclosed Request Denial Of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in the way Apache Axis handles requests with SOAP arrays in the parameters. Apache Axis is embedded within several Web Services packages. Attackers can trigger the vulnerability to cause a denial of service condition in a vulnerable service.

NAME: Microsoft Windows Hyperlink Object Library Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A buffer overflow exists in the Microsoft Windows system library used to handle hyperlink objects. An unchecked buffer in the Microsoft Object Library is vulnerable to attack when malformed hyperlinks are processed when a user clicks on a hyperlink in a browser or in HTML-rendered email. An attacker who successfully exploits this vulnerability can execute code with the privileges of the currently logged in user.

NAME: Microsoft Office Web Components Memory Allocation Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Office Web Components are a collection of Component Object Model (COM) controls for publishing spreadsheets, charts, and databases to the Web, and for viewing the published components on the Web. The DataSourceControl object in the Office Web Components Library 10/11 contains a vulnerability which allows remote attackers to execute malicious code. A user's machine can be infected when browsing a malicious site that invokes the OWC functionality.

NAME: Internet Explorer DHTML Engine Race Condition Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a race condition vulnerability when parsing a webpage containing certain DHTML objects. The vulnerability is present in IE when handling DHTML methods such as createElement, appendChild and removeNode, that could lead to an exploitable memory corruption when the race condition is triggered.An attacker can exploit the vulnerability by crafting a web page using the vulnerable DHTML objects, and convincing the user to download the page.A successful attack might result in arbitrary code execution, or might result in a denial-of-service condition.

NAME: The layout engine vulnerability in Mozilla Firefox 3.x
DESCRIPTION: The layout engine in Mozilla Firefox 3.x before 3.0.4, Thunderbird 2.x before 2.0.0.18, and SeaMonkey 1.x before 1.1.13 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via multiple vectors that trigger an assertion failure or other consequences.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer HTML Objects Uninitialized Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability while parsing certain crafted OBJECT call requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on object initializing in the HTML file, leading to an exploitable remote code execution vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer Uninitialized Object Remote Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability while parsing certain crafted OBJECT call requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on object initializing in the HTML file, leading to an exploitable remote code execution vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Checkpoint Firewall-1 HTTP Parsing Format String Vulnerabilities
DESCRIPTION: Check Point Firewall-1 is prone to a Format String vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP request.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on URI field in the HTTP request.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to crash the firewall or to execute code of the attacker's choice on the firewall.

NAME: Novell eDirectory SOAP Handling Accept Language Header Heap Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Novell eDirectory is prone to an overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on Accept Language in the HTTP request, leading to an exploitable overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Corel WordPerfect Office PRS Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Corel WordPerfect Office is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted PRS filesThe vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the PRS file, leading to an exploitable overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft ASN.1 Library Bit String Processing Heap Corruption
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft ASN.1 library is prone to a heap overflow vulnerability while handling certain crafted nested ASN.1 constructs. The vulnerability is present in the BERDecBitString function and is due to the improper handling of bit strings, leading to an exploitable heap corruption. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a HTTP authentication request with a crafted bit string. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Hidden Iframe For Drive-By Download Web Exploitation
DESCRIPTION: This alert indicates the presence of a hidden iframe in a webpage. The use of a hidden iframe is popular for drive-by downloads in web-based attacks. Typically, a popular website is hacked and hidden iframes are inserted into the webpages. These webpages when visited would retrieve remote pages using the links from the hidden iframes. The remote pages could then use various techniques to download malware.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer COM Object Instantiation Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a vulnerability in the way Microsoft Internet Explorer instantiates the DirectAnimation.DATuple COM objects. When an instantiation of such a COM object is attempted by Internet Explorer, the application memory can be corrupted. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability can allow for arbitrary code execution within the security context of the currently logged in user.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer IsComponentInstalled Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a memory corruption vulnerability in Microsoft Internet Explorer. The vulnerability is caused due to a flaw while processing nested HTML Object tags leading to memory corruption. A remote attacker may exploit this issue via a malicious web page to cause denial of service or execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged in user.

NAME: LibTIFF TIFFFetchData Function Integer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: An integer overflow vulnerability exists in LibTIFF TIFF file processing library. The vulnerability is result of the lack of proper boundary checking in TIFFFetchData function, which is responsible for parsing and fetching data from TIFF files. By enticing a user to open a craft TIFF file, an attacker may leverage the vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary code.

NAME: HT MP3 Player HT3 File Parsing Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: HT-MP3Player 1.0 is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ht3 files. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper length checks on certain values passed in a ht3 file. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by hosting a crafted ht3 file on a webpage and enticing the victim to download and open the file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the user running the player.

NAME: Mircrosoft Rich TextBox Control richtx32.ocx ActiveX Insecure Method Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Mircrosoft Rich TextBox Control is prone to a remote command execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTML pages.The vulnerability is caused due to the lack of proper checks on some ActiveX method call.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by building a malicious HTML page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution in the context of current user.

NAME: PHP Upload File Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: PHP 4.1.0, 4.1.1, and 4.0.6 and earlier are prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while handling crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is due to a bug in the php_split_mime function when handling crafted multipart/form-data POST data. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted request that could cause remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: GrapAgenda index.php page Parameter PHP File Include Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: GrapAgenda index.php page Parameter is prone to a PHP file include vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP requests, leading to an exploitable file include vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Microsoft ISA Server Radius OTP Bypass Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists in ISA Server 2006 authentication when configured with Radius OTP. The vulnerability could allow an unauthenticated user access to any Web published resource. With knowledge of administrator account usernames, an attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of systems relying on the ISA Server 2006 Web publishing rules for authentication. An attacker could then install programs; view, change, or delete data; or create new accounts with full user rights.

NAME: Microsoft Indexing Services .htw Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Indexing Services is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability while parsing certain crafted URL requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on  in the "CiRestriction" parameter in URL  request.

NAME: Bluecoat WinProxy Host Header Stack Overflow

An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending HTTP URI requests to restricted resources. A successful attack could bypass access restriction and reveal sensitive server information.
