NAME: Apple QuickTime RTSP URI Parsing Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Apple QuickTime 7.1.3 and lower is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted webpages. The vulnerabilityis due to the lack of boundary checks while parsing crafted long rtsp:// URIs, leading to an exploitable stack overflow. An attackercould exploit the vulnerability by crafting a webpage containing a long rtsp URI, or crafting a QTL file, and enticing a victim todownload the file or page. A successful attack could allow remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Nessus HTTP Remote File Include scan
DESCRIPTION: There is a file include vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP request.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on HTTP URI in the HTTP request, leading to an file include vulnerability. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to script execution in user's browser.

NAME: Yahoo Toolbar YShortcut.dl ActiveX Control Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Yahoo Toolbar YShortcut.dl ActiveX Control is prone to some denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the Activex method call IsTaggedBM.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to code execution within the security context of the currently logged in user.

NAME: KDE LibkHTML NodeType Function Denial Of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: KDE LibkHTML is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted html pages.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on html tag in the http response.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to denial of service.

NAME: Trend Micro OfficeScan CGI ChkMasterPwd Invalid Parameter DoS
DESCRIPTION: Trend Micro OfficeScan Policy server is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while handling certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is due to the improper parsing of parameters passed to the cgiChkMasterPwd CGI application in a HTTP request, leading to a NULL pointer exception. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could crash the server.

NAME: Internet Explorer Exception Handling Memory Corruption
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability, when parsing a crafted HTML page, which would trigger an exception condition. A particular case would bewhen an event is registered for an object, and an exception is triggered by numerous nestedobject tags. An attacker can exploit the vulnerability by crafting a web page which could cause the exception condition, and convincing the user to view the page.A successful attack might result in arbitrary code execution

NAME: ME Download System header.php Vb8878b936c2bd8ae0c ab Parameter PHP File Include Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: ME Download System is prone to a PHP file include vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP requests, leading to an exploitable file include vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: OpManager Search.do Cross Site Scripting
DESCRIPTION: AdventNet ManageEngine OpManager is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper filtering on parameter values passed to the searchTerm parameter of Search.do script. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted request to the server. A successful attack could lead to script code execution in the context of the server.

NAME: Adobe Acrobat Reader Unix Shell Metacharacter Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Adobe Acrobat Reader is prone to a code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted PDF document.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on uudecode function in the pdf filename, leading to an exploitable code execution. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted PDF document. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Internet Explorer Sysimage Protocol Handler Local File Detection Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Internet Explorer is prone to an information disclosure vulnerability while parsing certain crafted web page. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper security checks while parsing sysimage URL in an image tag in a webpage. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by hosting a crafted webpage and enticing a victim to visit the page. A successful attack could lead allow an attacker to retrieve local file data and thus could enable sensitive information disclosure.

NAME: LeadTools ISIS Ltisi14E.OCX ActiveX Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: LeadTools ISIS Ltisi14E.OCX is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in DriverName property in the HTML file, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow vulnerability.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Office Drawing Record msofbtOPT Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a vulnerability in Microsoft Office products. The flaw is due to improper handling of Microsoft Office files containing malformed records. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing an unsuspecting user to open a malicious Office document. This flaw may allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Publisher Invalid Memory Reference Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Publisher is prone to a code-execution vulnerability while parsing certaincrafted publisher files. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on data user supplied in the publisher file,leading to an exploitable code execution vulnerability. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted publisher file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Embedded OpenType Font Heap Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Office is prone to a heap overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted Microsoft Embedded OpenType (EOT) Font files. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user provided data in the Embedded OpenType (EOT) Font file, leading to an exploitable code execution. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted Embedded OpenType (EOT) Font file. A successful attack could lead to heap overflow and code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer ActiveX Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Internet Explorer is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain HTTP responses.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP response, leading to an exploitable remote code execution.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP response. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Apple OS X Software Update Command Execution
DESCRIPTION: Apple Mac OS X 10.5.1 is prone to a command execution vulnerability while handling certain software updates. The vulnerability is because certain portions of the software update are unauthorized. Hence, an attacker could perform a man-in-the-middle attack using a modified distributiondefinition file with the "allow-external-scripts" option. A successful exploit could allow command execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: RealNetworks RealPlayer Zipped Skin File Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: There exists a heap buffer overflow vulnerability in RealNetworks RealPlayer Zipped Skin handling component. The vulnerability is caused by insufficient verification of size field values supplied in Zipped Skin files. An attack can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the victim to open a malicious Zipped Skin file, potentially resulting in execution of arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged in user.

NAME: BerliOS Docpile:we auth.inc.php INIT_PATH Parameter PHP File Include Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: BerliOS Docpile:we auth.inc.php is prone to a PHP file include vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP requests, leading to an exploitable file include vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Microsoft Windows GDI Stack Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows GDI is prone to a stack overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted EMF files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on name length of EMR_COLORMATCHTOTARGET record in the EMF file, leading to an exploitable stack overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted EMF file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Vmist Downstat stats.php art Parameter PHP File Include Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Vmist Downstat stats.php art Parameter is prone to a PHP file include vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP requests, leading to an exploitable file include vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Microsoft Office PowerPoint Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Office PowerPoint is prone to an remote code execution while parsing certain crafted Power Point files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the Power Point file, leading to an exploitable overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted Power Point file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: IIS WebDAV Denial of Service
DESCRIPTION: IIS 5.0 is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on SEARCH request URI path length. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could crash the server thus denying its services to other clients.

NAME: PollMentor pollmentorres.asp id Parameter SQL Injection
DESCRIPTION: PollMentor 2.0 is prone to a SQL injection vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is present in the pollmentorres.asp script and is due to the lack of proper checks on id parameter. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request with SQL injection characters. A successful attack could lead to remote command execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Apple QuickTime crgn Atom Parsing Memory Corruption
DESCRIPTION: There exists a memory corruption vulnerability in Apple QuickTime application. The vulnerability is due to improper checking of <italic>region size</italic> field of the <italic>crgn</italic> atom. A remote attacker may exploit this vulnerability by providing a malicious QuickTime movie file to the target user, cause abnormal termination of the application or potentially allow arbitrary code to be injected and executed in the security context of the current user.

NAME: Microsoft Visual FoxPro ActiveX Controls Arbitrary Command Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Visual FoxPro is prone to a code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in DoCmd method in the HTML file, leading to an exploitable code execution vulnerability.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: PeaZIP Archived File Name Handling Command Injection Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: PeaZIP is prone to an overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP responses.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP responses, leading to an exploitable overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP responses. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: XOOPS mydirname Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: XOOPS is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP request, leading to an exploitable remote code execution. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Mozilla Firefox protection mechanisms bypass
DESCRIPTION: The CSS parser in Mozilla Firefox 3.x before 3.0.5 and 2.x before 2.0.0.19, Thunderbird 2.x before 2.0.0.19, and SeaMonkey 1.x before 1.1.14 ignores the '\0' escaped null character, which might allow remote attackers to bypass protection mechanisms such as sanitization routines.

NAME: Webhints Improper URI Sanitization Remote Command Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Webhints version lower than 1.4 are prone to a remote code execution vulnerability. The vulnerability isdue to the lack of proper sanitization of shell metacharacters passed through URI parameters. An attackercould exploit the vulnerability by crafting a URL, which could allow remote code execution.

NAME: Microsoft Excel File Import Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Excel is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted SLK files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on validation of data when importing a file into Excel, leading to an exploitable remote code execution vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted SLK file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Maya Studio EO Video Playlist Parsing Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Maya Studio EO Video (eo-video) 1.36 is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted playlist (eop) files. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on the attribute value of Name element under a ProjectElement element. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by enticing the victim to open a crafted eop file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the usre running the video software.

NAME: Mozilla Products QueryInterface Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Mozilla products including Firefox and Thunderbird prior to version 1.5.0.2, areprone to a memory corruption vulnerability when parsing a malformed webpage.The vulnerability is due a memory corruption caused by the usage of QueryInterface methodof the built-in Location and Navigator objects.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by crafting a webpage, and enticingthe victim to click on the webpage to execute arbitrary code on the victim machine.

NAME: Multiple Vendor Malformed ZIP Archive Antivirus Detection Bypass
DESCRIPTION: Multiple Vendor Anti-virus product is prone to a detection bypass vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ZIP archive file.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks within certain field of the ZIP file, leading to a security check bypass condition.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted ZIP file. A successful attack could lead to bypass the anti-virus product security check.

NAME: HTTP Opera Iframe Denial Of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: HTTP Opera browser is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP response.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP response.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP response. A successful attack could lead to denial of service against the target browser.

NAME: RealNetworks RealPlayer IVR Overly Long Filename Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A remote code-execution vulnerability exists in RealNetwork's RealPlayer application. The vulnerability is due to incorrect handling of the filename length in an IVR (Internet Video Recording) file. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to open a malicious IVR file, potentially causing arbitrary code to be injected and executed on the target.

NAME: DivX Player SRT Long Subtitle Parsing Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: DivX Player 6.7 build 6.7.0.22 and earlier is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted SRT files. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on the subtitle field in an SRT file. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted hosting a crafted SRT file and enticing the victim to open the file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the user running the DivX player.

NAME: XnView Products TAAC File Parsing Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Several XnView products such as NConvert 4.92, GFL SDK 2.82, and XnView 1.93.6 are prone to a stack overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted TAAC files. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper boundary checks on format field in a TAAC file. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by enticing the victim to open a crafted TAAC file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the user running the xnview software.

NAME: Novell eDirectory MS-DOS Device Name Denial of Service
DESCRIPTION: Novell eDirectory server is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while handling certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of filtering of HTTP requests that use reserved MS-DOS device names. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request containing the MS-DOS device name in the request path. A successful exploit could terminate the Novell eDirectory service, causing a denial of service condition.

NAME: HTTP Opera Torrent File Denial Of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: HTTP Opera browser is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP response.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP response.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP response. A successful attack could lead to denial of service against the target browser.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer DHTML Objects Memory Corruption
DESCRIPTION: A memory corruption vulnerability exists in Microsoft Internet Explorer. The vulnerability is due to the way Internet Explorer handles switching of page location. Remote attackers can exploit this vulnerability by persuading target users to visit a specially crafted web page. Successful exploitation may allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable client system, in the context of the logged in user.

NAME: Sabdrimer advanced1.php pluginpath[0] Parameter CMS PHP File Include Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Sabdrimer advanced1.php is prone to a PHP file include vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP requests, leading to an exploitable file include vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Microsoft MSXML Header Request Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: XML Core Services is prone to a code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted http response.The vulnerability is due to the way XML core services handles transfer-encoding headers in the HTTP response, leading to an code execution.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML document. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Generic HTTP Cross Site Scripting Attempt
DESCRIPTION: This signature detects suspected attempts to locate and/or exploit cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in a web application. XSS vulnerabilities are created by a lack of proper checks on HTTP requests. An attacker could exploit XSS vulnerabilities by sending a crafted HTTP request that executes arbitrary javascript in user's browser, leading to cookie theft and other data leakage. This signature specifically checks HTTP request parameters for an attempted injection of javascript. This is commonly used to test URI query strings for javascript injection vulnerabilities.

NAME: OpenOffice OLE File Stream Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: A heap overflow vulnerability exists in the OpenOffice software suite. The vulnerability is due to the way OpenOffice imports OLE files. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by persuading a user to open an OLE file, potentially causing arbitrary code to be injected and executed in the security context of the logged in user.

NAME: Microsoft Office Excel Object Record Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Office Excel is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability while parsing certain crafted EXCEL files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on OBJECT Record in the EXCEL file, leading to an exploitable code execution.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted EXCEL file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Computer Associates eTrust Intrusion Detection CallCode ActiveX Control Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: CA eTrust Intrusion Detection is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerabilities while parsing certain crafted HTML file. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in CallDLLLong_S method call in the ActiveX control.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to code execution within the security context of the currently logged in user.

NAME: Apache Mod_SSL HTTP Request Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in the Apache 2.0 module for handling SSL connections. This SSL module mod_ssl, contains a memory handling error when processing non-SSL connections. This memory error, when repeatedly exploited, can eventually cause a Denial of Service condition.

NAME: Windows Internet Explorer XML SRC Parsing Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted XML  pages.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on SRC field in the XML file, leading to an exploitable remote code execution vulnerability..An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML page contained XML elements. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: LeadTools Raster ISIS Object LTRIS14e.DLL ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: LEADTOOLS LEAD Raster ISIS ActiveX Control is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTML document. The vulnerability is due to boundary error when processing a malformed DriverName  properity usage. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML document. A successful attack could lead to code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Outlook - Word Object Tag Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There is a vulnerability in Microsoft Outlook when Microsoft Word is enabled in Outlook as the default editor for email messages. The vulnerability exists in the handling of object tags, and can be triggered remotely when a user replies or forwards a maliciously crafted email message. This vulnerability could bypass Outlook's "Restricted Zone" security setting and enable arbitrary access to remote resources.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer Screen Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP responses.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on onload field in the HTTP response, leading to an exploitable remote denial of service.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP response. A successful attack could lead to remote denial of service.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer Object Reference Counting Memory Corruption
DESCRIPTION: A memory corruption vulnerability exists in Microsoft Internet Explorer. The vulnerability is due to the way Internet Explorer handles incorrectly initialized or removed objects. Remote attackers can exploit this vulnerability by persuading target users to visit a specially crafted web page. Successful exploitation may allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable client system, in the context of the logged in user.

NAME: VanDyke SecureCRT Configuration Folder Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in the way VanDyke SecureCRT handles telnet URLs. Through the use of a telnet URL, SecureCRT can be remotely supplied a parameter which can be used to specify an arbitrary configuration folder; this configuration folder can reside on a remote shared resource. Because a configuration file can reference script code, an attacker can exploit this vulnerability to execute code on the vulnerable system in the context of the currently logged in user.

NAME: Oracle Database Application Express Component APEX Password Hash Disclosure Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in the Application Express component. The vulnerability is due to an insecure design within the Application Express component in Oracle Database server products that allows remote authenticated attacker obtain access to password hashes via certain database views. A successful attack attempt will result in disclosure of sensitive information.

NAME: Microsoft DirectShow Invalid Quicktime File Record Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows quatz.dll is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted QuickTime File.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on STSD record in the QuickTime file, leading to an exploitable remote code execution vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted QuickTime file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Adobe Flash User Clipboards Hijack Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Internet browsers like Internet Explorer and Firefox are prone to a user clipboard hijack vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP responses. The vulnerability is due to an design issue in Adobe Flash which could be used by malicious user to hijack users clipboards. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML response. A successful attack could lead user's clipboards to be hijacked.

NAME: VLC Media Player Format String Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: VLC Player is prone to a format string vulnerability while parsing certain crafted .ogg files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the .ogg file, leading to an exploitable format string vulnerability. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted .ogg file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Windows Shell User Logon ActiveX Vulnerability Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Windows Shell User Logon is prone to a code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in create method in the HTML file, leading to an exploitable code execution vulnerability.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: HTTP JavaScript Obfuscation Detected
DESCRIPTION: The JavaScript Obfuscation code has been detected in the HTTP packet. There are two purposes to do JavaScript obfuscation, first one is good purpose to protect the JavaScript copyright by the original owner. The other purpose is used by attacker to hide the malicious JavaScript to avoid the IPS/IDS detection.

NAME: Mozilla Firefox Download Directory File Deletion Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There is a vulnerability in the way Mozilla Firefox handles file download operations. If the vulnerable victim saves a remote resource that uses a specific scheme, files within the download folder can be deleted. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to remove files in the user download directory.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer TriEditDocument Denial Of Service Vulnerabilit
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX objects.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on "URL" property on TriEditDocument ActiveX object.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to denial of service.

NAME: Libxml2 XML File Processing Long Entity Name Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Libxml2 is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while handling certain crafted XML files. The vulnerability is due to the lack boundary checks while handling long XML entity names. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by hosting a crafted XML file and enticing the victim to visit open the file. A successful exploit could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft DirectX Media SDK DXTLIPI.DLL ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft DirectX Media SDK is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX control requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on "\.SourceUrl" method/property in the DXSurface ActiveX control request, leading to a buffer overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer Object Type Validation Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is vulnerable to remote code execution while parsing malformed ActiveX control requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on the "Run" method/property in the WScript.Shell.1 ActiveX control request, leading to arbitrary code execution. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current user.

NAME: AtHocGov IWSAlerts ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: AtHocGov IWSAlerts is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTML pages. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on parameters passed to the CompleteInstallation method, leading to an exploitable overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by hosting a crafted webpage and enticing the victim to visit the page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: VideoLAN VLC real.c ReadRealIndex Real Demuxer Integer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a vulnerability in VideoLAN VLC Media Player. The vulnerability is caused due to an integer overflow when playing a specially crafted RealMedia (.rm) file. An unauthenticated remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by enticing a user to play a specially crafted RealMedia file. Successful exploitation would cause a heap buffer overflow allowing the attacker to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the currently logged on user.

NAME: EFS Easy Chat Server Authentication Request Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: EFS Easy Chat Server 2.2 and below are prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while handling crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of boundary checks on authentication values passed as parameters in a request. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful exploit could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Microsoft CreateObject ActiveX Code Execution Exploit
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft MDAC RDS.Dataspace ActiveX control is prone to a remote code execution vulnerabilityThe vulnerability is because this control's methodcan be used to create other ActiveX controls, in an unsafe manner. Thus the control couldbe used to bypass any security checks on the other unsafe controls, to download arbitrarycode and execute on the victim machine. The vulnerability could be exploited while visitinga malicious webpage. As a workaround, you could set the kill bit on this control as specified in the Microsoftadvisory.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer IsComponentInstalled Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a memory corruption vulnerability in the Mozilla Firefox web browser. The vulnerable application incorrectly parses a series of crafted HTML tags, resulting in memory corruption. A malicious attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing a user to open a specially crafted web page, which may result in the injection and execution of arbitrary code on the target host.

NAME: LEADTOOLS JPEG2000 LTJ2K14.OCX ActiveX Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: LEADTOOLS JPEG2000 LTJ2K14.OCX is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in BitmapDataPath property in the HTML file, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow vulnerability.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Apple CUPS SGI Image Format Decoding imagetops Filter Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in Apple's Common Unix Printing System (CUPS) distributed by multiple vendors. The vulnerability is due to a boundary error in handling SGI Image format files. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to compromise a vulnerable system.

NAME: Yahoo Messenger AudioConf ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Yahoo Messenger AudioConf ActiveX Control is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability when parsing certain properties with long values.The vulnerability is due to the lack of boundary checks on certain properties such as 'socksHostname' and 'hostname', which are copiedto finite stack buffers, leading to a stack overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by hosting a HTML page with the control and crafted property values. A successful exploit could cause code execution in the context of the current user.

NAME: Microsoft Word mso.dll LsCreateLine Memory Corruption
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Word is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability while parsing certain word file.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks within certain field of the word file, leading to a code execution condition.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted word file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution within the context of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft SQL Server Backup Restoring Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in Microsoft SQL Server. The vulnerability is due to improper checks when parsing records in backup database. A local or remote authenticated attacker could exploit the vulnerability by issuing a RESTORE command with the path to a malicious backup file placed on local filesystem, SMB share or WebDAV. Successful exploitation would cause a memory corruption condition which may lead to arbitrary code injection and execution in the security context of the SQL Server, normally System for SQL Server 2000 and earlier.

NAME: Apple QuickTime Image Descriptor Atom Parsing Memory Corruption
DESCRIPTION: There exists a memory corruption vulnerability in Apple QuickTime application. The vulnerability is due to improper checking the Atom size field of the idsc atom in the QTIF image file. A remote attacker may exploit this vulnerability by providing a malicious QTIF image file to the target user. Potentially causing arbitrary code to be injected and executed in the security context of the current user.

NAME: MySQL MaxDB Webtool HTTP Request Parsing Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: MySQL MaxDB before 7.5.00.26 is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability is due to lack of boundary checks on the length of a GET request containing a percent (%) sign. An attacker couldsend a long GET request that would exploit the vulnerability and overflow the stack buffer. A successful exploit could lead to remotecode execution, or lead to denial of service condition on the server.

NAME: Trend Micro OfficeScan Atxconsole ActiveX Control Format String Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Trend Micro OfficeScan Atxconsole ActiveX Control is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted http response. The vulnerability is due to a boundary error in handling of incoming CGI requests. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: X.Org X Server PCF Font Parser Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the X.Org Foundation's X Windows Server. The vulnerabilityis due to boundary error when processing PCF Fonts. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerabilityby enticing the target user to open maliciously constructed PCF Font files, potentially causing arbitrary code to be injected and executed in the security context of the logged-in user.

NAME: Symantec Altiris Deployment Solution File Download Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Symantec Altiris Deployment Solution is prone to an arbitrary file download vulnerability while handling certain crafted HTML pages. The vulnerability is present in AeXNSPkgDLLib.dll and is due to the lack of proper checks on certain methods, which could allow arbitrary file download and execution. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by hosting a crafted webpage and enticing the victim to visit the page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer Macromedia Flash Player Plug-in Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Macromedia Flash Player is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX control requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on "LoadMovie" method/property in the flash player plug-in ActiveX control request, leading to a denial of service.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to denial of service, client browser may be crashed.Note: this is a designing defect. By loading a normal flash movie, invoking of such method would lead to a crash of browser when flash 7.0 or lower version is installed. However, this method is commonly used to load flash movie in later version. Therefore, if you saw such alert, it means it may cause a deny of service or arbitrary code execution for flash 7.0, but it should be safe for high version.

NAME: IBM Tivoli Provisioning Manager URI Stack Overflow
DESCRIPTION: IBM Tivoli Provisioning Manager for OS Deployment before 5.1 is prone to a stack overflow vulnerability while handling certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is present in rembo.exe service listening on TCP port 8080. The issue arises due to the lack of proper length checks on URI path and Authorization fields in a HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Microsoft DirectX RLE Compressed Targa Image File Heap Overflow
DESCRIPTION: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in Microsoft DirectX application framework. The vulnerability is due to the way certain DirectX libraries handle specially crafted Targa (TGA) image files that are compressed using the Run-Length Encoding (RLE) method. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by persuading a user to open a specially crafted TGA file, potentially causing arbitrary code to be injected and executed in the security context of the logged in user.

NAME: Microsoft Office Sharepoint Server Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Office SharePoint Server 2007 and Microsoft Office SharePoint Server 2007 Service Pack 1  is prone to an elevation of privilege vulnerability while parsing certain crafted http requests.The vulnerability could allow elevation of privilege if an attacker bypasses authentication by browsing to an administrative URL on a SharePoint site. A successful attack leading to elevation of privilege could result in denial of service or information disclosure.

NAME: HP Info Center HPInfoDLL.DLL ActiveX Control SetRegValue Registry Write
DESCRIPTION: HP Info Center HPInfoDLL.dll is prone to a remote code execution vulnerabilitywhile parsing certain crafted activex methods.The vulnerability is due to the lack of check insecure SetRegValue() methodcalling, leading to an exploitable remote code execution vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by persuading a victim to visit oropen a website or a HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote codeexecution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Zyxel Prestige 660H-61 ADSL Router RPSysAdmin Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: ZyXEL Prestige 660H-61 ADSL Router is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is due to the improper filtering of script characters passed through the "a" parameter value to the rpSysAdmin script. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted web link to the user using the router. A successful attack could cause arbitrary script code to be executed by the user's browser in the security context of an affected

NAME: Trend Micro OfficeScan Multiple CGI Modules HTTP Form Processing Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in Trend Micro's OfficeScan. The flaw is due to a boundary error when handling HTTP requests. An unauthenticated remote attacker can leverage this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary code with System level privileges on the target system.

NAME: AOL Instant Messenger Away Message Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: AOL Instant Messenger (AIM) is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted URLs. The vulnerability is due tothe lack of boundary checks on the parameters passed to the goaway function of the 'aim:' URI handler. An attacker could exploit thevulnerability by passing a crafted URL to an AIM user, which when opened could lead to remote code execution.

NAME: RealPlayer RealMedia File Parsing Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: RealNetworks RealPlayer is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability while parsing certain crafted RealMedia Files (RMFF). The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks while parsing certain fields in the RMFF file. Since the user-suppliedfield value is used for certain heap memory operations, it could lead to an exploitable heap corruption. An attacker could exploitthe vulnerability by hosting a crafted RMFF file on a website and enticing the victim to download the file. A successfulexploit could lead to remote code execution on the victim client machine.

NAME: Apple QuickTime Panorama PDAT Atom Parsing Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Apple Quicktime Player is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted MP4 H264 files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on H264 Data in the MP4 file, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted MP4 file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Lycos FileUploader Control ActiveX Remote Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Lycos is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX control requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on "HandwriterFilename" method/property in the FileUploader.FUploadCtl.1 ActiveX control request, leading to a buffer overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: HTTP Rosoft Media Player M3U File Processing Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: HTTP Rosoft Media Player is prone to an overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted M3U files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the M3U file, leading to an exploitable overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted M3U file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: ht://dig Arbitrary File Inclusion Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: The ht://dig program is prone to a arbitrary file reading vulnerability while parsing certain crafted parameters.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on htsearch field in the http request, leading to a arbitrary file exposure vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted argument to htsearch cgi. A successful attack could lead to read any file existed in the server.

NAME: Internet Explorer URL Compression Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Heap-based buffer overflow in URLMON.DLL in Microsoft Internet Explorer 6 SP1 on Windows 2000 and XP SP1, with versions the MS06-042 patch before 20060912, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) or execute arbitrary code via a long URL in a GZIP-encoded website that was the target of an HTTP redirect, due to an incomplete fix for CVE-2006-3869.Note: This vulnerability affects only the versions listed when MS06-042 initial patch is installed. For this vulnerability, since the check is for long URL it might cause FPs. So to reduce FPs either make it low priority signature, or also additionally check for browser version in User-Agent. Refer to this link for more details: http://msdn.microsoft.com/workshop/author/dhtml/overview/aboutuseragent.asp

NAME: Microsoft Visual Studio WMI Object Broker ActiveX Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Visual Studio is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability, caused by an errorin the WMI Object Broker ActiveX Control. The vulnerability is because this control's methodcan be used to create other ActiveX controls, in an unsafe manner. Thus the control couldbe used to bypass any security checks on the other unsafe controls, to download arbitrary code and execute on the victim machine. The vulnerability could be exploited while visiting a malicious webpage. As a workaround,

NAME: Microsoft Windows Web Service on Devices Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Web Service on Devices is prone to an overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on MIME head in the HTTP requests, leading to an exploitable overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Mozilla Firefox nsPropertyTable PropertyList Memory Corruption
DESCRIPTION: Mozilla Firefox before 3.0.14 is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTML pages. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on certain HTML element values passed in a webpage. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by hosting a crafted webpage and enticing the victim to visit the page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft IIS Unicode Directory Traversal Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Information Server (IIS) versions 4.0 and 5.0 are prone to a directory traversal vulnerability while parsing certain URLs which use Unicode character sets. The vulnerability is due to improper canonicalization causing certain URI paths to be decoded to directory traversal paths. This could be exploited by an attacker to access arbitrary directories and files on the IIS server. A successful attack could be used to read, or write documents outside of the web root, and possibly to execute arbitrarycommands. This vulnerability has commonly been exploited by CodeBlue worm.

NAME: Mozilla Firefox IFRAME Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a Cross Site Scripting vulnerability in Mozilla web browser and its derivatives. The flaw is caused by the execution of JavaScript code included in an "IFRAME" tag without sufficient checking of the site location context. A remote attacker may exploit this issue to execute arbitrary JavaScript code in the target's browser session in the context of an arbitrary site.

NAME: Microsoft MSXML DTD Cross-Domain Scripting Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: XML Core Services is prone to a code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted http response.The vulnerability is due to the way XML core services handles error checks in document type definitions (DTD) in the HTTP response, leading to an code execution.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML document. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Office Project Memory Validation Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Office is prone to an overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted project file.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the project file, leading to an exploitable overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted project file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer HTTP 1.1 and Compression Long URI Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability has been reportedly introduced into certain versions of Microsoft Internet Explorer with the introduction of a security update. The vulnerability exists in the processing of compressed data used with the HTTP 1.1 protocol. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service condition or possibly inject and execute arbitrary code on a vulnerable host.

NAME: GuestBook CGI Remote Command Execution
DESCRIPTION: Guestbook.pl CGI script is prone to a command injection vulnerability while handling certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability requires that HTML posting is enabled, and must have the Server-Side Include (SSI) script handler enabled for the '.html' file type. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper sanitization of user-supplied SSI commands. A successful attack could allow arbitrary command execution with the privileges of the web server.

NAME: Mozilla Firefox XUL Frame Tree Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists vulnerability in Mozilla Firefox. The vulnerability is due to insufficient validation when handling XUL frame tree. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to open a crafted web page. Successful exploitation would allow for arbitrary code injection and execution with the privileges of the currently logged on user.

NAME: Computer Associates Multiple Products Arclib.DLL Malformed CHM File Denial Of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Computer Associates Multiple Products is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted CHM files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on next chunk id in the CHM file.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted CHM file. A successful attack could lead to denial of service.

NAME: Mozilla Firefox PKCS11 Addmodule Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Mozilla Firefox before 3.0.14 is prone to arbitrary PKCS11 module installing or removing vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP responses. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP responses, leading to an exploitable vulnerability. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP responses. A successful attack could lead to arbitrary PKCS11 module installing or removing with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Outlook Object Security Bypass Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There is a vulnerability within Microsoft Outlook 2003 that can be triggered remotely through a maliciously crafted email message. This message could bypass Outlook 2003's "Restricted Zone" security setting and gain access to remote resources.

NAME: Multiple Web Browsers Window Injection Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in the way multiple browsers reference a popup window. A malicious web site can replace content of another site's popup window if the target name of the window is known. This can be used to spoof the content of a popup window opened from a trusted web site.

NAME: Microsoft Excel Malformed Palette Record Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Excel is prone to a heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing malformed Excel Sheets. The vulnerabilityis due to the improper handling of number of entries value in a PALETTE record of BIFF8 format Excel sheets. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by enticing a user to open a crafted excel sheet, hosted on a website, or sent through e-mail. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution in the context of the currently logged-in user, or lead to a denial-of-service condition.

NAME: BitDefender Online Scanner OScan.OCX ActiveX DoS Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: BitDefender Online Scanner OScan.OCX is prone to a Deny of Service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in initx method in the HTML file, leading to an exploitable Deny of Service vulnerability.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: test-cgi remote file listing vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: test-cgi is prone to a remote file listing vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP request.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP request, leading to an exploitable remote file listing.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote file listing with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Adobe Acrobat Plugin Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Adobe Acrobat Reader Plugin before 8.0.0 for the Firefox, Internet Explorer, and Opera web browsers is prone to a cross-sitescripting vulnerability while parsing a crafted URL. The vulnerability is due to lack of proper filters on the user input passedthrough URI parameters to a PDF document. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by passing script code, which couldsteal sensitive information, or could cause code execution on the victim machine.

NAME: Microsoft Windows GDI32 System Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft windows is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted EMF images.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on rendering polylines data in the EMF file,, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted EMF image. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: SMF Forum smf.php mosConfig_absolute_path Parameter PHP File Include Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: SMF Forum is prone to a PHP file include vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP requests, leading to an exploitable file include vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Mambo VideoDB Component Module Parameter PHP File Include Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Mambo VideoDB Component Module videodb.class.xml.php is prone to a PHP file include vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP requests, leading to an exploitable file include vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Mozilla Firefox CSS Letter-Spacing Heap Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a heap based buffer overflow vulnerability in Mozilla Firefox as well as other Mozilla products. The vulnerable is caused due to an integer overflow leading to an insufficient buffer allocation while rendering the CSS spacing. A malicious attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing a user to open a specially crafted web page, which may result in the injection and execution of arbitrary code on the target host.

NAME: MoviePlay LST File Handling Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: MoviePlay is prone to a stack buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted LST files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on FileName0 filed in the LST file, leading to an exploitable stack buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted LST file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: BadBlue MFCISAPICommand Parameter Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Working Resources BadBlue versions 2.55 and below are prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certaincrafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is present in ext.dll and is due to the lack of boundary checks while parsingthe mfcisapicommand parameter, leading to an overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by passing a craftedHTTP request to the BadBlue server, causing code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: osCommerce Online Merchant PHP Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: osCommerce Online Merchant is prone to a code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is present in the file_manager.php script and is due to the lack of proper checks on certain parameter values passed to the script. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to arbitrary PHP code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Microsoft IIS ISM.DLL HTR File Fragment Disclosure Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft IIS web server is prone to a file source disclosure vulnerability while handling certain crafted requests.The vulnerability is present in ISM.dll and is due to the improper handling of URI requests with a ".htr" preceded with numerous space characters appended to a URI path. Such as request could lead to the disclosure of the source of the file requested in the URL. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request to the server, which couldreveal sensitive information.

NAME: UltraISO Cue File Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: UltraISO is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted Cue files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the Cue file, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted cue file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft DirectX Pointer Validation Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft DirectX is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted MOV files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on STSC atom NumberOfEntries size in the MOV file, leading to an exploitable remote code execution.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted MOV file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer Security Zone Bypass and Address Spoofing Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a security zone bypass vulnerability while parsing certain crafted html page.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP response, leading to an exploitable security zone bypass. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to information leak with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: HP Discovery and Dependency Mapping Inventory Unauthorized Access Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: HP DDMI is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted SOAP requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on XML content in the SOAP request, leading to an exploitable remote code execution Vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted SOAP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: CA BrightStor ARCserve Backup Activex AddColumn Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: CA BrightStor ARCserve Backup is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability. This vulnerability is due to a boundary error within the "AddColumn()" method in the "ListCtrl" ActiveX control. Exploitation of this vulnerability may allow a remote attacker to cause a stack-based buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code.

NAME: Microsoft Help Workshop .CNT File Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Help Workshop product is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted CNT files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the CNT file, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted CNT file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Free File Hosting forgot_pass.php AD_BODY_TEMP Parameter PHP File Include Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Free File Hosting forgot_pass.php AD_BODY_TEMP Parameter is prone to a PHP file include vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP requests, leading to an exploitable file include vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Apple QuickTime RTSP URI Parsing Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Apple QuickTime 7.1.3 and lower is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted webpages. The vulnerabilityis due to the lack of boundary checks while parsing crafted long rtsp:// URIs, leading to an exploitable stack overflow. An attackercould exploit the vulnerability by crafting a webpage containing a long rtsp URI, or crafting a QTL file, and enticing a victim todownload the file or page. A successful attack could allow remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: VBScript Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Internet Explorer is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP responses.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP response, leading to an exploitable remote code execution.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP response. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Ipswitch WhatsUp Professional LOGIN.ASP SQL Injection Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a SQL injection vulnerability in Ipswitch WhatsUp Professional. The flaw is caused by insufficient validation of user supplied data submitted to the product's Web interface. The vulnerability can allow an attacker to execute arbitrary SQL statements in the WhatsUp database.

NAME: Altnet Download Manager ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Altnet Download Manager is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX control requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on "Install" method/property in the ADM4 ActiveX control  ActiveX control request, leading to a buffer overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Zenturi ProgramChecker ActiveX Control Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Zenturi ProgramChecker is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in DebugMsgLog and DownloadFile method in the HTML file, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow vulnerability.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Photo DVD Maker PDM Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Photo DVD Maker is prone to an overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted .pdm file.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the .pdm file, leading to an exploitable overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted .pdm file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Mozilla Firefox before 3.0.14 multiple unspecified vulnerabilities
DESCRIPTION: Mozilla Firefox before 3.0.14 is prone to multiple unspecified vulnerabilities while parsing certain crafted HTTP responses.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP responses, leading to multiple exploitable vulnerabilities.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP responses. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft DirectX Media DXTMSFT.DLL ActiveX Control DoS POC 2 Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft DirectX Media DXTMSFT.DLL is prone to a Deny of Service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in color property in the HTML file, leading to an exploitable Deny of Service vulnerability.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer Cross Frame Scripting Restriction Bypass
DESCRIPTION: There is a vulnerability in the way Internet Explorer, a web browser developed and maintained by Microsoft Corporation, handles interaction between frames within a web page. It is possible for a malicious server to bypass restrictions that prevent keystroke events from passing between domains, and thus, allow for the logging of user keystrokes.

NAME: Microsoft IE Script Action Handler Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability inmshtml.dll. The vulnerability happens when numerous script action handlers such asonclick, onmousemove, onmousedown etc., are used within a HTML tag. Such a web pagecould result in an exploitable buffer overflow, due to the lack of proper checks in Internet Explorer.An attacker can exploit the vulnerability by crafting a web page, and convincing the user to download the page.A successful attack might result in arbitrary code execution, or mightresult in a denial-of-service condition.

NAME: Algorithmic Research PrivateWire Online Registration Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Algorithmic Research PrivateWire VPN software up to 3.7 is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on  GET requests sent to the server. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending an overly long HTTP GET request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: F-Secure AntiVirus Library Heap Overflow
DESCRIPTION: F-Secure AntiVirus Library is used to parse different file formats to detect malware. Before archive decompression, the library does not properly check the length of certain fields. These fields are copied into a fixed sized heap buffer. As a result, when a file with an overly long filename is processed a heap overflow will occur.            This vulnerability can be triggered by an unauthenticated remote attacker, without user interaction, by sending an e-mail containing a crafted ARJ archive file to the target F-Secure AntiVirus Library on client, server, and gateway implementations. Additional attack vectors exist over other common protocols (e.g. HTTP, FTP, POP3), but some may require user interaction.

NAME: McAfee Subscription Manager ActiveX Control Stack Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: McAfee Subscription Manager ActiveX Control shipped with McAfee Home and Home Business products is prone to a stack overflow vulnerability.The vulnerability is present in the McSubMgr.dll and is due to the lack of boundary checks on the length of arguments passed to certain methods of the control. Since these arguments are later passed to vsprintf without any checks, it could lead to an exploitable stack overflow condition. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by crafting a webpage containing the control with a long argument to the method. A successful exploit could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft OLE Automation Library SubStringData Integer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft OLE Automation Library is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted webpages. The vulnerability isdue to the lack of boundary checks on the arguments passed to the SubStringData method of a TextNode object. This could leadto an integer overflow, which could in turn cause large amounts of data being copied to finite buffers, causing an exploitable memorycorruption. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by crafting a webpage, which when visited could lead to remote code executionwith the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Quiksoft EasyMail ActiveX Control Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: EasyMailSMTPObj ActiveX control in emsmtp.dll 6.0.1 in the Quiksoft EasyMail SMTP Object is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability. The vulnerability is due to the lack of boundary checks on parameters passed to the SubmitToExpress method. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by hosting a crafted webpage and enticing the victim to visit the page. A successful exploit could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft IIS WebDAV Propfind Server Restart Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Information Server (IIS) version 5.0 is prone to a denial of service vulnerable while parsing certain crafted WebDAV request. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the WebDAV request, leading to a denial of service vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted WEBDAV request. A successful attack could lead to server to restart automatically, which disconnects any active sessions.

NAME: Apple Safari for Windows Document.Location.Hash Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Apple Safari web browser is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted http webpage.The vulnerability is due to the lack of boundary protection while processing Document.Location.Hash in a webpage.A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to open a malicious web page, potentially causing denial of service of the user internet browser.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer Event Handling Cross Domain Security Bypass Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a cross domain information disclosure vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTML files.There is an error in the way that Internet Explorer calculates which document object to return to a caller who calls CPeerHolder::CPeerSite::QueryService() requesting an IID_IHTMLDocument2, when the correct document is in an iframe of a document in a different domain.  The function incorrectly returns the topmost document, which can lead the caller to think that it is in a different domain that it really is in.  This can result in an incorrect trust decision by the caller, giving an attacker the opportunity to act on the caller in the context of a different domain.

NAME: Mozilla Firefox 3.5 Tracemonkey Component Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Mozilla Firefox is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted JS html pages.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on innerHtml method in the Javascript, leading to an exploitable code execution vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML response page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: EFS Easy Address Book Web Server NTFS Information Disclosure
DESCRIPTION: Easy File Sharing (EFS) Easy Address Book 1.2, is prone to an arbitrary file disclosure vulnerability while handling certain crafted URI requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper filtering of URIs which contain "::$DATA" appended. This could result in the disclosure of arbitrary files on the NTFS file system. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request.

NAME: WinDVD7 IASystemInfo.DLL ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: WinDVD7 is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX control requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on "ApplicationType" method in the IASystemInfo.DLL ActiveX control request, leading to a buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: RARLAB WinRAR LHA Filename Handling Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: RARLAB WinRAR is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted LHA files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the LHA file, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted LHA file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Oracle Application Server 10g emagent Stack Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Oracle Application Server 10g is prone to a stack overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on certain HTTP parameters passed through the HTTP request, leading to an exploitable overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Mambo Cache_Lite Class mosConfig_absolute_path File Include Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Cache_Lite package in Mambo 4.6.4 and earlier is prone to a remote file include vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on parameters passed to the includes/Cache/Lite/Output.php script in a HTTP request. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: HTTP SonicWALL SSL VPN Client Remote Buffer Overflow

The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper boundary checks while parsing parameters passed to the NELaunchCtrl ActiveX control. Particularly, the vulnerability could be triggered by a long parameter passed to the AddRouteEntry method. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by enticing a user to visit a crafted webpage. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Adobe Reader JavaScript customDictionaryOpen Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Adobe Reader and Acrobat. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: BarracudaDrive Web Server Input Validation Vulnerability

NAME: Microsoft Excel DVAL Heap Corruption Vulnerability

NAME: Squid Proxy FTP URI Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability

NAME: GNU gzip LZH Decompression make_table Stack Modification

NAME: Microsoft GDI+ Library JPEG Segment Length Integer Underflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft GDI+ Component is prone to a  integer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted JPG files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the jpg file, leading to an exploitable code execution.
