NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer File Download Security Warning Bypass Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability has been reported to exist in Microsoft Internet Explorer 6 which allows malicious users to bypass security features in Microsoft Windows XP Service Pack 2. NAME: Microsoft Office XP URL Parsing Buffer Overflow

NAME: Microsoft Data Access Components RDS Buffer Overflow Vulnerability

NAME: Samba Web Administration Tool Base64 Decoder Buffer Overflow Vulnerability

NAME: Voodoo Chat index.php file_path Parameter PHP File Include Vulnerability

NAME: PHP Post File Upload Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
DESCRIPTION: Buffer overflows in (1) php_mime_split in PHP 4.1.0, 4.1.1, and 4.0.6and earlier, and (2) php3_mime_split in PHP 3.0.x allows remoteattackers to execute arbitrary code via a multipart/form-data HTTPPOST request when file_uploads is enabled.

NAME: Autodesk Maya Script Nodes Arbitrary Command Execution
DESCRIPTION: Autodesk Maya and Alias Wavefront Maya are prone to a command execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted MEL script files. NAME: Microsoft Windows Media File Format audio_conceal_none Buffer Overflow Vulnerability

An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted ASF file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of t

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer Uninitialized Object Remote Memory Corruption Vulnerability

NAME: Microsoft IIS Extended Unicode Improper Canonicalization Directory Traversal
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Information Server (IIS) versions 4.0 and 5.0 are prone to a directory traversal vulnerability while parsing certain URLs which use Unicode character sets. The vulnerability is due to improper canonicalization causing certain URI paths to be decoded to directory traversal paths. A successful attack could be used to read, or write documents outside of the web root, and possibly to execute arbitrarycommands. This vulnerability has commonly been exploited by CodeBlue worm.

NAME: Acunetix Web Vulnerability Scanner Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability

NAME: Internet Explorer Travel Log Cross Domain Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a cross-domain restriction bypass vulnerability, when parsing certain HTML tags such as frames, when combined with DHTML methods.The vulnerability lies in the way in which IE handles Travel Log Stack, which is the navigation stack used by IE to store browser history. The vulnerability enables attackers to access or execute arbitrary files inthe local machine zone security context, using a crafted HTML.This vulnerability could be combined with other vulnerabilities that dropmalicious files to a victim machine, in order to execute the dropped files and installmalicious applications.

NAME: E-Ark Ark_Inc.PHP Remote File Include Vulnerability

NAME: Mozilla Firefox IconURL Arbitrary JavaScript Execution

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Internet Explorer handles a memory object. NAME: Microsoft Publisher Arbitrary Memory Reference Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Publisher 2007 is prone to an arbitrary memory reference vulnerability while parsing malformed Publisher files. NAME: Internet Explorer XMLhttp request
DESCRIPTION: There is a vulnerability in Microsoft Outlook when Microsoft Word is enabled in Outlook as the default editor for email messages. NAME: Microsoft DirectX WAV and AVI File Parsing Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

NAME: Novell GroupWise Messenger Server Nmma.EXE Denial of Service Vulnerability

NAME: Microsoft Windows Vector Markup Language Buffer Overrun Vulnerability

NAME: NT IIS IISAPI Extension Enumerate Root Web Server Directory Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows IIS is prone to a information disclosure vulnerability while parsing certain crafted http requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on IISAPI-regstered extension in the http request. NAME: DOS Infinite Array Sort
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted web pages. The vulnerability is manifested when the browser performs an infinite JavaScript array sort operation.

NAME: ZIP File Overlong Filename Anomaly
DESCRIPTION: Many Programs are prone to buffer overflow or denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ZIP files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on filename length in the ZIP file, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow. NAME: Apple Safari for Windows and Internet Explorer Combined Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a cross application vulnerability in Apple Safari on Windows when residing on a system with Microsoft Internet Explorer installed. NAME: Macrovision ActiveX Control isusweb.dll Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

NAME: Citrix Presentation Server Client WFICA.OCX ActiveX Component Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability

An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer Script Error Handling Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Three spoofing vulnerabilities exist in Internet Explorer that could allow an attacker to display spoofed content in a browser window. The address bar and other parts of the trust UI has been navigated away from the attacker's Web site but the content of the window still contains the attacker's Web page.A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Internet Explorer due to an unhandled error in certain situations. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by constructing a specially crafted Web page. If a user viewed the Web page, the vulnerability could allow remote code execution. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the logged on user.

NAME: Microsoft IIS WebDAV Propfind Server Restart Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Information Server (IIS) version 5.0 is prone to a denial of service vulnerable while parsing certain crafted WebDAV request. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the WebDAV request, leading to a denial of service vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted WEBDAV request. NAME: phpSecurePages secure.php cfgProgDir Parameter PHP File Include Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: phpSecurePages secure.php cfgProgDir Parameter is prone to a PHP file include vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP requests, leading to an exploitable file include vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Windows EMF GpFont.SetData Off-by-two Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft GDIPLUS is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted EMF files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on emf plus record in the EMF file, maybe leading to an exploitable buffer overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted EMF file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Mozilla Firefox ConstructFrame With Floating First-letter Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A memory corruption vulnerability is reported in Mozilla Firefox web browser. The vulnerability is due to an implementation error when handling the first letter frame. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to open a malicious web page. In an attack scenario, where arbitrary code is injected and executed on the target system, the behaviour of the target is dependent on the intention of the malicious code. The injected code will be run with privileges of the currently logged on user. If such an attack is not executed successfully, the vulnerable application may terminate as a result of invalid memory access.

NAME: Apple QuickTime PSD Image Packed-bit Decoding Heap Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Apple Quikctime is prone to a heap overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted PSD images.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on packet-bit decoding data in the PSD files, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted PSD image. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Computer Associates iGateway debug mode HTTP GET request buffer overflow vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Computer Associates iGateway is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain craft HTTP request.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the http request, leading to an exploitable overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution within the context of the server process.

NAME: Generic HTTP Cross Site Scripting Attempt
DESCRIPTION: This signature detects suspected attempts to locate and/or exploit cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in a web application. XSS vulnerabilities are created by a lack of proper checks on HTTP requests. An attacker could exploit XSS vulnerabilities by sending a crafted HTTP request that executes arbitrary javascript in user's browser, leading to cookie theft and other data leakage. This signature specifically checks the HTTP request path for an attempted injection of javascript. This is commonly used to test URI paths for javascript injection vulnerabilities.

NAME: SafeNet SoftRemote Policy File Parsing Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: SafeNet softremote is prone to a stack overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted policy (spd) files. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on GROUPNAME field while parsing policy files. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by hosting a crafted spd file on a website and enticing the victim to download and import the file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Internet Explorer Long Hostname Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: IE is prone to a script execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted http responses.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the http response, leading to an memory corruption. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted http response. A successful attack could lead to remote script execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: AtomixMP3 Malformed PLS Playlist File Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: AtomixMP3 is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because the application fails to bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. An attacker could exploit this issue by enticing a victim to load a malicious PLS Playlist. If successful, the attacker can execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application

NAME: Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities in the browser engine in Mozilla Firefox
DESCRIPTION: Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities in the browser engine in Mozilla Firefox before 2.0.0.5 and Thunderbird before 2.0.0.5 allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via unspecified vectors that trigger memory corruption.

NAME: Novell SUSE Linux Enterprise Server Remote Manager Heap Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A heap based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in Novell SUSE Linux Enterprise Server Remote Manager. The vulnerability is caused by insufficient verification of parameters passed to the server in the context of an HTTP session. An unauthenticated attacker can exploit this flaw to inject and execute arbitrary code on the target system.

NAME: Cisco Collaboration Server ServletExec Unauthorized Access Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Cisco Collaboration Server (CCS) versions prior to 5.0 shipped with ServletExec versions prior to 3.0 are prone a privilegeescalation vulnerability. The vulnerability is because ServletExec allows upload of arbitrary files to the web server. An attackercould exploit the vulnerability by uploading executable files through direct calls to the UploadServlet URI, and executing the filesto gain control over the victim server.

NAME: GOM Player Activex Control OpenURL Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: GOM Player is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX control requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on "OpenURL" method in the GomWebCtrl.GomManager.1 ActiveX control request, leading to a buffer overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Wordcircle index.php password Parameter SQL Injection
DESCRIPTION: Wordcircle 2.17 is prone to a SQL injection vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is present in the login action to index.php script and is due to the lack of proper checks on password parameter. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request with SQL injection characters. A successful attack could lead to remote command execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer Data Stream Handling Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted html files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input field in the html file, leading to an exploitable memory corruption vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted htmlfile. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Agent Web Content Spoofing Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows is prone to a spoofing vulnerability, when parsing certainInternet content using Microsoft Agent elements. Microsoft Agent is a technology that enhances user interaction with the computer using certain graphic characters. However, the characters used in the agent technology enable an attacker to spoof any internet content by placing the characterson top of other windows, such as security alerts. Thus, an attacker could exploitthe issue by crafting a webpage, and enticing the victim to click on the webpage. A successful exploit could allow an attacker to install malicious content on a victim's machine,thereby taking complete control of the system.

NAME: Microsoft Word Array Data Handling Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the way Microsoft Word processes word documents. The vulnerability is the result of an infinite loop. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to open a crafted Word document, potentially causing arbitrary code to be injected and executed in the security context of the current user.

NAME: Microsoft Windows HSC DVD Driver Upgrade Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows is prone to a code execution vulnerability whileparsing a webpage containing a crafted URL.The vulnerability exists in Help and Support Center (HSC) while parsingHCP invocation URIs for DVD driver upgrades, and could be exploitedto bypass zone restrictions with a crafted HCP URI.An attacker can exploit the vulnerability by crafting a web page and enticing the user to downloadand click on the webpage.A successful attack might result in arbitrary code execution.

NAME: BaoFeng Activex Control OnBeforeVideoDownload Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A overflow vulnerabilities exist in BaoFeng Activex Control. The vulnerability are due to boundary error in OnBeforeVideoDownload method in mps.dll file. A remote attacker can exploit these vulnerability by enticing the user to open a crafted HTML file.

NAME: Microsoft Office Excel Record Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Office Excel is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted .xls files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the .xls file, leading to an exploitable remote code execution.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted .xls file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: MyNewsGroups myng_root Parameter PHP File Include
DESCRIPTION: PHP Layers Menu 2.3.5 package for MyNewsGroups is prone to a remote file include vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is present in the /lib/tree/layersmenu.inc.php and is due to the lack of proper sanitization of myng_root parameter. A successful attack could lead to arbitrary PHP code execution.

NAME: Avast! Antivirus Engine Remote LHA Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in the Avast! Antivirus engine. Specifically, the flaw occurs during the processing of level 1 LHA extended headers. The program does not properly impose string length limits on strings derived from the directory name and filename extended headers. During the processing of a combination of a directory and file name extended headers, the vulnerable program derives the two strings from the archive imposing length limits on them. The directory name may be a maximum of 1023 characters long, while the file name is limited to 255 characters. The program makes internal copies of these strings while properly imposing the aforementioned limits. However, after both strings are derived from the archive, a concatenation operation is attempted to construct a full path for the file. During this operation, a heap buffer of about 300 bytes is used as the destination, while no check is performed to verify that the two strings are able to fit into the allotted buffer when combined. The limits imposed on the individual strings are not sufficient to prevent the concatenation operation from overflowing the destination buffer. Hence, a heap buffer overflow may be triggered given overly long directory and file name strings in an LHA file header.

NAME: VideoLAN VLC Web Interface Format String Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: VLC Media Player's web interface, running by default on TCP port 8080 is prone to a format string vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on the connection header field in the HTTP request. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request with format specifiers in the connection header. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server, or crash the se

NAME: Microsoft Windows GDI+ TIFF Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows GDI+ system is prone to a heap overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted TIFF files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the TIFF file, leading to an exploitable heap overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted TIFF file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer IsComponentInstalled Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a memory corruption vulnerability in the Mozilla Firefox web browser. The vulnerable application incorrectly parses a series of crafted HTML tags, resulting in memory corruption. A malicious attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing a user to open a specially crafted web page, which may result in the injection and execution of arbitrary code on the target host.

NAME: Bit 5 Blog processlogin.php username Parameter SQL Injection
DESCRIPTION: Bit 5 Blog processlogin.php is prone to a SQL Injection vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP requests, leading to an exploitable SQL Injection. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP requests. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: BitTorrent Overly Long Created By Tag Parsing Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: BitTorrent 6.0.3 is prone to a stack overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted torrent files. The vulnerability is due to the lack of length checks on Created By field in a torrent file, leading to an exploitable overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by hosting a crafted file on a webpage and enticing the victim to visit the page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the user running bittorrent.

NAME: Alcatel OmniPCX Office MasterCGI user Parameter Command Execution
DESCRIPTION: Alcatel OmniPCX Office is prone to a arbitrary command execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is present in the MasterCGI script and is due to the lack of proper checks on user parameter. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request with shell metacharacters to the user parameter. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: HTTP JavaScript Obfuscation Detected
DESCRIPTION: The JavaScript Obfuscation code has been detected in the HTTP packet. There are two purposes to do JavaScript obfuscation, first one is good purpose to protect the JavaScript copyright by the original owner. The other purpose is used by attacker to hide the malicious JavaScript to avoid the IPS/IDS detection.

NAME: Internet Explorer DHTML Edit Control Cross Site Scripting
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability with the usageof DHTML Editing Component ActiveX Control. The control provides the ability to performtext and HTML editing functions, and had been marked "safe for scripting" prior to the patch.Hence, and attacker can exploit the cross-site scripting vulnerability through a web page, resultingin remote code execution or spoofing the content of a website.

NAME: SonicWALL Global VPN Client Format String Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: SonicWALL Global VPN Client is prone to a format string vulnerability while parsing a configuration file with a specially crafted "Connection" or "Hostname" tag. The vulnerability could be exploited by an attacker by hosting a malicious configuration file and enticing a victim to import it. A successful exploit could cause remote code execution or a denial of service condition.

NAME: Microsoft Windows HLP File Handling Heap Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in Microsoft Windows. The vulnerability is due to a boundary error while handling specially crafted Windows Help (HLP) files. Remote attackers can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to open a malicious HLP file that would trigger a heap-based buffer overflow condition. Successful exploitation may allow arbitrary code injection and execution with the privileges of the currently logged-in user.

NAME: EZMeeting Long HTTP Request Parsing Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: EZNet.exe is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability exists in the EZMeeting module, which fails to perform boundary checks on autologin parameter passed throughHTTP requests. Since this value is copied to finite stack buffers, it could lead to an exploitable stack overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by crafting a request which when directed to the server, could lead to code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Aurigma Image Uploader ActiveX Controls ExtractIptc/ExtractExif Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
DESCRIPTION: Aurigma Image Uploader is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActoveX requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on some method in the PhotoUploader ActiveX object request, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft SQL Server sqldmo.dll ActiveX Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft SQL Server Distributed Management Objects component is prone to a stack overflow vulnerability.The vulnerability is present in the sqldmo.dll and is due to the lack of boundary checks on the length of arguments passed to certainmethods of the DLL. Since these arguments are later copied to finite stack buffers, it could lead to an exploitablestack overflow condition. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by crafting a webpage containing the control with a longargument to the method. A successful exploit could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Office Excel Could Allow Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Office Excel is prone to an overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted xls file.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the xls file, leading to an exploitable overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted xls file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft IIS Alternate Data Streams ASP Source Disclosure
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft IIS web server is prone to an information disclosure vulnerability while handling certain crafted requests.The vulnerability is due to the improper handling of the various data streams that NTFS provides for a file, specificallyalternate data streams. Thus by appending a string "::$DATA" to a request URI, the contents of an ASP file could be retrievedinstead of executing it. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request to the server, which couldreveal sensitive information.

A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Excel is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted XLS files .The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the XLS file, leading to an exploitable remote code execution.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted XLS file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Abyss Web Server HTTP Request Parsing Heap Overrun Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Abyss web server, a free web server from Aprelium Technologies, version 1.1.2 and earlier is prone to a buffer overflowvulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is triggered when a HTTP request URI is appendedwith ":\" character. In this case, the path is copied to finite heap buffers, leading to an exploitable heap overflow vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by crafting a request which when directed to the server, could lead to codeexecution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Computer Associates eTrust Intrusion Detection CallCode ActiveX Control Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Symantec Backup Exec Scheduler ActiveX is prone to some buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the Activex method call , leading to an exploitable buffer overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Windows winhlp32 Phrase Integer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows winhlp32 is prone to an integer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain craft .hlpfile.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the certain .hlp file, leading to an exploitable overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted .hlp file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution within the context of the current logged-in user.

NAME: HAURI Anti-Virus ACE Archive Handling Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in HAURI Anti-Virus products. The flaw exists in the scanning of ACE archives containing compressed files with overly long names. A malicious user may exploit this vulnerability to bypass virus scanning, or execute arbitrary code on the affected system.

NAME: Microsoft SQL Server SQL Sentence Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft SQL server is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted Sql function parameters.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on sp_replwritetovarbin in the SQL sentence request, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted SQL sentence request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Mozilla BMP Parsing Integer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in the way several versions of the Mozilla web browser parses BMP images. The browser is not equipped to handle a BMP image with an overly large width value. This vulnerability may be leveraged by an attacker to execute arbitrary code on a target user's system or create a denial of service condition.

NAME: Microsoft Works File Converter Section Length Header Remote Heap Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Works File Converter is prone to a heap overflow vulnerability while parsing certaincrafted WPS files. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on section length header in the WPS file,leading to an exploitable heap overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted WPS file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Oracle Enterprise Manager beanID Parameter Directory Traversal Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Oracle Enterprise Manager 10.1.0.5 and 10.2.0.1 are prone to a directory traversal vulnerability while handling certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is present in the EmChartBean component is due to the lack of proper checks on the beanID parameter. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted request with directory traversal in beanID parameter. A successful exploit could allow arbitrary file access on the vulnerable machine.

NAME: HTTP OPTIONS Method
DESCRIPTION: The HTTP OPTIONS request (RFC 2616) provides a method for clients to request information relative to the resources or capabilities of a server. This can be used to check the functionality of a web server by requesting what methods are supported. The server will respond with typical content negotiation headers and a list of allowed request methods that can access the specified resource.The OPTIONS method enables an attacker to figure out which HTTP methods are supported by a web server, (depending on what methods are available) it potentially allows attackers to automatically probe servers for common vulnerabilities and even to launch a cross site scripting or cross site tracing attack.

NAME: NetProxy Security Restriction Bypass Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: NetProxy is prone to a security bypass vulnerability while handling certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper sanitization of HTTP URIs passed to the proxy. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a HTTP GET request to the proxy server without including "http://" in the URL. A successful attack could allow an attacker gain unauthorized access to view restricted websites.

NAME: Unspecified vulnerability in Mozilla Firefox and Thunderbird
DESCRIPTION: Unspecified vulnerability in Mozilla Firefox before 1.5.0.8, Thunderbird before 1.5.0.8, and SeaMonkey before 1.0.6 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary JavaScript bytecode via unspecified vectors involving modification of a Script object while it is executing.

NAME: Microsoft XMLHTTP ActiveX Control Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: MS XML is prone to a code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in setRequestHeader method in the HTML file, leading to an exploitable code execution vulnerability.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: GNU GV Postscript Parsing Stack Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: GNU gv 3.6.2 and earlier are prone to a stack overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted postscript (PS) files. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on certain headers such as DocumentMedia, leading to an exploitable overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by hosting a crafted PS file on a webpage and enticing the victim to visit the page. A successful exploit could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the user running the software.

NAME: Microsoft ASP.NET Path Validation Security Bypass Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft ASP.NET is prone to an information disclosure vulnerability while parsing certain malformedHTTP requests. The vulnerability is due to a failure of the application to properly impose security restrictionswhile parsing URI paths containing certain characters. The vulnerability would allow an attacker to gainunauthorized access to certain restricted files or directories on the server.

NAME: Apple QuickTime VR Track Header Atom Heap Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a heap buffer memory corruption vulnerability in Apple QuickTime. The vulnerability is due to a logic error while processing the "VR Track Header" atoms in QuickTime movie files. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to open a crafted QuickTime movie file. Successful exploitation may lead to arbitrary code execution in the security context of the logged in user.

NAME: HTTP Basic Authentication String Over Long
DESCRIPTION: HTTP packet with Basic Authentication String Overly Long has been detected which may cause buffer overflow or denial of service against your HTTP server.

DESCRIPTION: Apache mod_auth_pgsql module is prone to a format string vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the URI request of http request, leading to an exploitable code execution. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted http request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: ActivePDF WebGrabber ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow

The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on parameters passed to the GetStatus method, leading to an exploitable overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by hosting a crafted webpage and enticing the victim to visit the page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: 7-Zip ARJ File Buffer Overflow Vulnerability

An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted ARJ file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer Object.Microsoft.DXTFilter Denial Of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX objects.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on "Enabled" field in Object.Microsoft.DXTFilter ActiveX, leading to an denial of service vulnerability. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to denial of service.

NAME: Ultra Office ActiveX Control Remote Buffer Overflow Exploit
DESCRIPTION: Ultra Office is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX control requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on "HttpUpload" method/property in the Ultra Office ActiveX ActiveX control request, leading to a buffer overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Visual Studio ActiveX Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Heap-based buffer overflow in the MaskedEdit ActiveX control in Msmask32.ocx 6.0.81.69, and possibly other versions before 6.0.84.18, in Microsoft Visual Studio 6.0 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long Mask parameter, as exploited in the wild in August 2008.

NAME: Amaya Browser Input Tag Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Amaya browser version 11 is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP webpages. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper boundary checks on values passed in the type parameter of an input tag. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by hosting a crafted webpage and enticing a victim to visit the page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Internet Explorer Bitmap File Parsing Integer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to an integer overflow vulnerability when parsing malformed BMP (Bitmap) images. The vulnerability is due to the fact that IE uses a field from the BMP file as a signed integer for boundary checking, but is later used as an unsigned value for copying data from the BMP file to finite buffers. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the victim machine. The attacker could craft a .bmp file, which when downloaded, could lead to remote code execution or a denial of service.

NAME: BS Player bsl File Hostname Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: BS.Player (bsplayer) is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted bsl files. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on hostname values passed in a bsl file, leading to an exploitable stack overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by hosting a crafted bsl file on a webpage and enticing the victim to download and open the file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the user running the bsplayer.

NAME: ActSoft DVDTools.OCX ActiveX Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: ActSoft DVDTools.OCX is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in OpenDVD method in the HTML file, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow vulnerability.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Windows Media Player Script Injection Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in the way the Microsoft Windows Media Player ActiveX Control accesses local multimedia files. A script embedded in an HTML page could use the ActiveX control to disclose or update information on local media files. This vulnerability may be remotely leveraged by an attacker to obtain information on local multimedia files, or to inject content into local media files which can lead to arbitrary script execution.

NAME: IE RDS.DataControl ActiveX object DOS Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: IE RDS.DataControl is prone to a Deny of Service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Windows Internet Explorer XML SRC Parsing Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted XML  pages.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on SRC field in the XML file, leading to an exploitable remote code execution vulnerability..An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML page contained XML elements. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Youngzsoft CCProxy CONNECT Request Buffer Overflow Vulnerability

An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted http request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the application.

NAME: HTTP Apache Tomcat DefaultServlet File Disclosure Vulnerability

An attacker could then use this information to launch further attacks against the affected server.

NAME: Rediff Bol Downloader ActiveX Control Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to arbitrary SQL command execution.

NAME: Dart PowerTCP Service DartService.DLL ActiveX Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Dart PowerTCP Service DartService.DLL is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX method calls. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in QuickZip method in the HTML file, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow vulnerability.  An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Sun Java Web Start Splashscreen GIF Decoding Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a memory corruption vulnerability in Sun Microsystems' Java Web Start. The flaw is due to a boundary error when displaying a customized splashscreen GIF image. A remote attacker may exploit this vulnerability by enticing the target user to visit a malicious web page. Successful attack may allow for arbitrary code injection and execution with privileges of the target user.

NAME: PrecisionID Barcode ActiveX Arbitrary File Overwrite Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: PrecisionID Barcode is prone to a arbitrary file overwrite vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ActiveX control requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on parameters passed to the "SaveToFile" method in the PrecisionID Barcode ActiveX control request. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by enticing a victim to visit a crafted webpage. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Windows Media Player ASF File Parsing Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows Media Player 6.4 is prone to a code execution vulnerability while parsing certain malformed Advanced Systems Format (ASF) files. The vulnerability is due to the lack of boundary checks on certain fields in the ASF files. Since these valuesare later used for memory copy operations, it could be exploited to lead to an exploitable memory corruption. An attacker could exploitthe vulnerability by hosting a crafted ASF file on a webpage, which when downloaded could lead to code execution.

NAME: Microsoft Visual Basic VBP Project File Handling Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Visual Basic 6.0 is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted VBP (Visual Basic Project) files. The vulnerability is due to lack of proper checks while parsing Path or Description string in the Reference line of a VBP file. Since this string is copied to finite stack buffers, it could lead to an exploitable stack overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by enticing a user to download a crafted VBP file hosted on the web. A successful exploit could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user on the victim client.

NAME: Firefly Media Server Webserver.C Multiple Format String Vulnerabilities
DESCRIPTION: Firefly Media Server is prone to a format string vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on authorization field in the HTTP request, leading to an exploitable format string vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Apple CUPS Texttops Filter Integer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Common UNIX Printing System (CUPS) before 1.3.9 is prone to a integer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted CUPS requests. The vulnerability is present in the WriteProlog function in the texttops application and is due to the lack of proper checks while handling certain crafted postscript files. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted CUPS request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server application.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer HTML Component Handling Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A memory corrupt vulnerability exists in Microsoft Internet Explorer web browser. The vulnerability is due to the way Internet Explorer handles argument validation of a variant in specific situations. The attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute code in the context of the current logged-on user.

NAME: Cart32 Expdate Information Disclosure Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Cart32 is prone to a information disclosure vulnerability while parsing certain crafted http request.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in uri field in the http request, leading to an information disclosure. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by appending the string "/expdate" to a request for the cart32.exe CGI. A successful attack could allow a remote attacker to retrieve sensitive information about the server installation, including environment setting and other informations.

NAME: Adobe Acrobat/Reader File Name Handler Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in Adobe Acrobat's handling of a document's file name extension. When Acrobat opens a file with an overly long file name extension, a buffer overflow occurs. An attacker could use this vulnerability to remotely execute code on a system.

NAME: HTTP POST Request URI Path Too Long
DESCRIPTION: It has been observed that one HTTP POST request packet with URI path more than 1480 bytes sent to the server. It may cause some buffer overflow or denial of service to your web server.

NAME: RealNetworks RealPlayer Invalid Chunk Size Heap Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a vulnerability in RealNetworks RealPlayer. The vulnerability is created by the failure of the affected application to properly validate chunked content messages received from an HTTP server. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing a user to open a crafted RealMedia file or to click on a malicious link in a web browser, resulting in the injection and execution of arbitrary code.

NAME: Adobe Flash Player Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Adobe Flash Player is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted FLASH files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the FLASH file, leading to an exploitable remote code execution.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted FLASH file or PDF file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Windows showHelp Directory Traversal Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows is prone to a directory traversal vulnerability, when parsing a webpage containing malformed usage of showHelp function.The vulnerability enables attackers to access or execute arbitrary files inthe local machine zone security context, using a crafted path in the showHelpfunction. This vulnerability could be combined with other vulnerabilities that dropmalicious files to a victim machine, in order to execute the dropped files and installmalicious applications.An attacker can exploit the vulnerability by crafting a web page and enticing the user to downloadand click on the webpage.A successful attack might result in arbitrary code execution.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer Event Handling Cross Domain Security Bypass Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a cross-domain security-bypass vulnerability because the application fails to properly enforce the same-origin policy.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the HTML file, leading to an potential remote code execution on IE6.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTML file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user or lead information disclosure.

NAME: KAME IKE raccoon HASH

The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on ExObjRefAtom record data in the PPT file, leading to an exploitable remote code execution. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted PPT file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Excel XML Parsing NULL Pointer DoS
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Excel 2003 is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted XLS files. The vulnerability is due to the improper parsing of XML formatted files, leading to a NULL pointer deference. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted XLS file. A successful exploit could crash Excel application.

NAME: HP OpenView Network Node Manager OVwSelection Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: HP OpenView Network Node Manager is prone to a buffer overflow> vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP requests. The vulnerability is present in ovwebsnmpsrv.exe and is due to the lack of proper checks on arg and sel parameters passed in a HTTP request. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Microsoft HTML Object Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted html pages.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the html page, leading to an exploitable code execution.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Excel PtgExtraArray Data Memory Corruption Vulnerability

The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on PtgExtraArray data in the EXCEL file, leading to an exploitable memory corruption vulnerability. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted EXCEL file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft MDAC RDS.DataSpace ActiveX Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft MDAC RDS.Dataspace ActiveX control is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability. The vulnerability exists because this control method can be used to create other ActiveX controls in an unsafe manner. Thus the control could be used to bypass any security checks on the other unsafe controls to download arbitrary code and execute on the victim machine. The vulnerability could be exploited while visiting a malicious webpage. As a workaround, you can set the kill bit on this control as specified in the Microsoft advisory.

NAME: Adobe Flash File Detected in HTTP Chunk Gzip Response

Though this might be observed in normal traffic, it has also been used to evade IPS boxes. A successful evasion could allow the attack to pass through the IPS without detection.

A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the user running the player.

NAME: Php Generic MembreManager.PHP Remote File Include Vulnerability

The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on some field in the http request, leading to an exploitable file include condition. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted http request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Microsoft WordPad Converter Parsing Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft WordPad Converter is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability while parsing certain crafted .wri files. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the .wri file, leading to an exploitable memory corruption. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted .wri file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by hosting a crafted webpage and enticing the victim to visit the page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Windows AVI File Header Processing Memory Corruption
DESCRIPTION: A memory corruption vulnerability exists in Microsoft Windows AVI File API. The vulnerability is due to a boundary error when parsing crafted AVI files containing a truncated AVIH chunk. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by enticing a target user to open a malicious AVI file.              Successful exploitation can lead to injection and execution of arbitrary code in the security context of the currently logged in user. The behaviour of the target host is entirely dependent on the intended function of the injected code.              In an attack case where code injection is not successful, the affected application will terminate abnormally.

NAME: HTTP response data URI scheme evasion attempt
DESCRIPTION: The data URI scheme is a URI scheme that provides a way to include data in line in web pages  as if they were external resources. It tends to be simpler than other inclusion methods, such as MIME with cid or mid URIs. Data URIs are sometimes called Uniform Resource Locators, although they do not actually locate anything remote. The data URI scheme is defined in RFC 2397 of the Internet Engineering Task Force  (IETF).Some malicious web servers use this technique to bypass IPS detection.

This alert indicates the use of such a technique.

NAME: Adobe Shockwave Player Lnam Chunk Processing Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Adobe Shockwave Player is prone to a remote memory corruption vulnerability while parsing certain crafted .dir media file. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the .dir media file, leading to an exploitable remote memory corruption. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted .dir media file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Adobe Flash Player Remote Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Adobe Flash Player is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability while parsing certain crafted .swf files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the .swf file, leading to an exploitable memory corruption.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted .swf file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: AOL RTX File Handling Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: AOL 9.6 is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted Rich Text (rtx) Files. The vulnerability is present in rich.rct DLL and is due to the lack of proper checks on long user-supplied strings in an rtx file. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted rtx file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the user running AOL.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer Cross-Domain Information Disclosure Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a information disclosure vulnerability while parsing certain crafted html page.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the html page, leading to an information disclosure  vulnerability. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to leak sensitive information with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Adobe Shockwave Director pamm Chunk Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Adobe Shockwave Director is prone to a code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted Shockwave file. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted Shockwave file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Excel Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Microsoft Excel handles malformed Excel files. A successful attacker can take complete control of the affected system installing software, modifying data, or creating new local accounts with full privileges.

DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Word is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability while parsing certain crafted word files.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the word file, leading to an exploitable memory corruption.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted word file. NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer FTP Web View Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability

The vulnerability can be manifested on Windows 2000 when "Enable folder view for FTP sites" and "Enable Web content in folders" is selected. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by hosting a crafted webpage and enticing the victim to visit the page containing a maliious FTP URL. A successful exploit could allow attackers to inject arbitrary web script.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer CSS Parsing Heap Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A heap overflow vulnerability has been discovered in Internet Explorer. It is reported that the issue presents itself when a comment character sequence that is not terminated is encountered after a STYLE tag.This issue could be exploited by a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the client user. The attacker would likely create a malicious HTML page and host it on a site. The attacker would then attempt to entice a user to visit the malicious page to carry out a successful attack.

NAME: Microsoft Windows Vector Markup Language Buffer Overrun Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Remote exploitation of an integer overflow vulnerability in the Vector Markup Language (VML) support in multiple Microsoft products allows attackers to execute arbitrary code within the context of the user running the vulnerable application.This vulnerability exists due to insufficient input validation within vgx.dll. Two integer properties are multiplied together and no overflow check is performed. This could allow an attacker to force a memory allocation of a smaller amount of memory than is required. When copying user supplied data into the newly allocated memory, it is possible to overwrite a function pointer stored on the heap, which leads to the execution of arbitrary code.An integer overflow error in the Vector Markup Language (VML) implementation when processing recolorinfo sections can be exploited to cause a heap-based buffer overflow via e.g. a specially crafted web page or HTML e-mail.

NAME: UltraVNC VNCLog ReallyPrint Buffer Overflow

NAME: Generic HTTP Cross Site Scripting Attempt
DESCRIPTION: This signature detects suspected attempts to locate and/or exploit cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in a web application. XSS vulnerabilities are created by a lack of proper checks on HTTP requests. An attacker could exploit XSS vulnerabilities by sending a crafted HTTP request that executes arbitrary javascript in user's browser, leading to cookie theft and other data leakage. This signature specifically checks the HTTP body for methods commonly used by attackers to locate XSS vulnerabilities, such as frequently used obfuscation and encoding techniques and javascript alert dialogs in suspicious areas of an HTML document.

NAME: Microsoft Internet Explorer Generic Heap Spray Exploit Found

The heap sprays used in all these exploits were very similar, which showed its versatility and ease of use without need for major modifications between exploits. Many web browser exploits that use heap spraying consist only of a heap spray that is copy-pasted from a previous exploit combined with a small piece of script or HTML that triggers the vulnerability.

An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Flash Player Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Adobe flash player is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted flash files. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the flash file, leading to an exploitable remote code execution. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted flash file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: VMware Remote Console connect Method Remote Format String Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: VMware is prone to a format string vulnerability while parsing certain crafted html page. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on connect method in the html page, leading to an exploitable format string. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted html page. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Office FlashPix Image Converter Heap Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Office is prone to a memory heap corruption vulnerability while parsing certain crafted FlashPix image files. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in FlashPix image file, leading to an exploitable code execution. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted FlashPix image file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Adobe Flash Player Point Ojbects Remote Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Adobe Flash Player is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted flash files. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on Point objects in the flash file, leading to an exploitable remote code execution. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted flash file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft MPEG Layer-3 Codecs Stack Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft DirectShow is prone to an overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted wav file.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on certain fields passed in a wav audio stream. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted wav file. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Windows TCP/IP Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Windows TCP/IP is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted IPv6 requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the IPv6 request, leading to an exploitable remote code execution.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted IPv6 request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Windows TCP/IP Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Windows TCP/IP is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted IPv6 requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the IPv6 request, leading to an exploitable remote code execution.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted IPv6 request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: ICMP Echo Request Modem Command Execution DoS
DESCRIPTION: Several modems are prone to denial of service vulnerability when they do not implement guard time. The vulnerability is due to the improper handling of certain commands such as ATH, ATH0 prepended with a "+++" sequence. An attacker could send such a command to the modem and thus hangup the modem.

NAME: Macromedia Flash Media Server Administration Service Denial of Service
DESCRIPTION: There exists a denial of service vulnerability in Macromedia Flash Media Server. The vulnerability exists due to an error in the way that the affected server handles malformed data. An attacker can exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted message to the server, causing its termination thereby creating a denial of service condition.

NAME: CA BrightStor ARCServe Backup LGServer License Function Overflow
DESCRIPTION: There exist a buffer overflow vulnerability in the way CA BrightStor ARCServe Backup for Laptops and Desktops service handles incoming messages. Specifically the vulnerability is due to lack of boundary check when processing license function requests. By sending specially crafted request, an unauthenticated remote attacker can leverage these flaws to execute arbitrary code on the target host with System privileges.

NAME: Symantec Veritas NetBackup bpcd Command Chaining
DESCRIPTION: Symantec's VERITAS NetBackup is prone to a command injection vulnerability while handling certain crafted requests. The vulnerability is due to improper data validation of remotely received network messages. A remote authenticated attacker may exploit this vulnerability by appending malicious commands to a valid command, which could be executed on the target system with the SYSTEM level privileges.

NAME: CA License Software GETCONFIG Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: CA License Software is prone to a Buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing a getconfig ommand.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Arkeia Network Backup Client Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Arkeia Network Backup agent module is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while handling certain crafted requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of boundary checks, which could overrun a stack buffer in the vulnerable component and allow arbitrary code execution. Successful exploit can execute code with system privileges and take complete control of the target system.

NAME: Subversion svn Protocol String Parsing Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in the way Subversion handles svn protocol requests. A specially crafted svn request could cause svnserve, the daemon that handles svn protocol requests, to allocate insufficient heap memory and overflow the heap. It is possible for a malicious attacker to run arbitrary code on the Subversion server with the privilege of the account that runs svnserve daemon.

NAME: Squid WCCP Message Parsing Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: The WCCP message parsing code in Squid 2.5.STABLE7 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via malformed WCCP messages with source addresses that are spoofed to reference Squid's home router and invalid WCCP_I_SEE_YOU cache numbers.

NAME: RealFlex RealWin Tag Manipulation Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: RealFlex RealWin server is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted TCP packets. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the TCP request packet. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted TCP packet. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Computer Associates License GCR Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability has been reported in the CA License software of CA products. The CA License software is a license management tool that allows CA customers to register and manage their product licenses on a computer network. It is prone to a buffer overflow when receiving a crafted GCR message. The flaw may allow a malicious user to execute code on the vulnerable system with system or root level privileges.

NAME: HP Data Protector Backup Client Service GET_FILE Directory Traversal
DESCRIPTION: HP Data Protector Backup Client is prone to a directory traversal vulnerability while parsing certain crafted TCP requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on some fields in the TCP request. A successful attack could lead to directory traversal.

NAME: Novell Distributed Print Services Integer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: There exists an integer overflow vulnerability in Novell Distributed Print Services module in multiple Novell products. The vulnerability is caused due to lack of proper boundary checks prior to the calculation of the size of a memory buffer. An unauthenticated attacker may exploit this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary code in the context of the vulnerable application, Super User in the Netware systems.

NAME: CA Multiple Products Console Server Login Credentials Handling Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: A stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the Console Server shipped with multiple CA products. The vulnerability can be triggered by submitting overly long username or password to the authentication process. A remote unauthenticated attacker may leverage this flaw to inject and execute arbitrary code on the target system with the privileges of the affected service, which is System on Windows platforms.

NAME: VERITAS Backup Exec Registration Request Remote Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Veritas Backup Exec is prone to a stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability while handling certain crafted requests. The vulnerability exists in the function responsible for receiving and parsing registration requests. A long hostname in the registration request could overflow a stack buffer. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the Backup Exec Agent Browser (benetns.exe) process which is usually a domain administrative account.

NAME: CA ARCserve Backup for Laptops and Desktops NetBackup Arbitrary File Upload
DESCRIPTION: There exists a security bypass vulnerability in CA ARCserve Backup for Laptops and Desktops. Thevulnerability is due to NetBackup service not sanitizing malicious content in client request. As aresult, a remote unauthenticated attacker can upload arbitrary files to controllable location on theserver. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability can allow execution of arbitrary code with SYSTEM privileges.

NAME: VERITAS NetBackup vmd Shared Library Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: VERITAS NetBackup Enterprise Server is prone to a stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability while handling certain requests. The vulnerability is due to insufficient boundary checks when processing user supplied data. An unauthorized attacker may leverage this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary code on the target system.

NAME: RealFlex RealWin FC_SCRIPT_FCS_STARTPROG Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: RealFlex RealWin is vulnerable to a buffer overflow condition while parsing malformed TCP requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the in TCP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Symantec AntiVirus Remote Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Symantec AntiVirus is prone to buffer overflow  vulnerability while parsing certain crafted remote management protocol requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on the user input data in the remote management communicated protocol, leading to an exploitable overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted remote management communicated protocol  request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Microsoft SMS Remote Control Service DoS
DESCRIPTION: There exists a vulnerability in the Microsoft Systems Management Server (SMS) Remote Control Service that allows an attacker to cause a denial of service condition. By using a specially crafted TCP packet, an attacker can bypass the input verification procedure and cause an invalid memory read or write.            There exists a second denial of service condition in the Microsoft Systems Management Server (SMS) Remote Control Service. Any packet that is not in the context of a remote control session and can bypass the input verification procedure will cause the service to enter an infinite loop.

NAME: HP StorageWorks Storage Mirroring Double Take Service Code Execution Vulnerability

An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted TCP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: CA BrightStor ARCserve Backup Universal Agent Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability has been reported in a component of Computer Associates' ARCserve/Enterprise Backup server products. This flaw may allow a malicious user to remotely inject and execute code on the the vulnerable system with System level privileges.

NAME: CA License Software PUTOLF Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability has been reported in the CA License software of CA products. DESCRIPTION: EMC Retrospect Backup Agent is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted requests. The vulnerability is due to the improper handling of crafted requests. NAME: Symantec Antivirus Intel Alert Handler Service Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Symantec Antivirus is vulnerable to remote code execution while parsing malformed TCP requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the TCP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Computer Associates BrightStor ARCServe Backup LGServer Stack Overflow
DESCRIPTION: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in Computer Associates BrightStor ARCserve Backup for Laptops and Desktops. DESCRIPTION: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in Computer Associates BrightStor ARCserve Backup forLaptops and Desktops. The flaw is due to insufficient checks of user supplied data inside requests sent to the backup server. NAME: Mercury Mail Remote Mailbox Name Service Buffer Overflow Vulnerability

NAME: Novell ZENworks Remote Management Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: There exists a vulnerability in the authentication mechanism of the Novell ZENWorks suite. The flaw is caused by insufficient boundary checking of authentication data. NAME: IBM solidDB Logging Function Format String Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a Format String vulnerability in the IBM solidDB database server product. The vulnerability is specifically in creating new log entries without filtering format specifiers from the strings. An unauthenticated remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially crafted TCP packet to the target host. A successful exploitation of this vulnerability can allow for code execution in the security context of the logged-in user or cause a denial of service condition.

NAME: CA Products Message Queuing Server Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in the way CA Message Queuing Server handles incoming packets. The vulnerability is due to lack of boundary protection while processing packets. NAME: HP Data Protector Backup Client Service EXEC_SETUP Code Execution Vulnerability

NAME: Cisco CNS Network Registrar Denial of Service
DESCRIPTION: The lock manager in Cisco CNS Network Registrar 6.0 through 6.1.1.3allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (process crash)via a certain "unexpected packet sequence."

NAME: Cisco Voice Product IBM Director Agent Port Scan Denial Of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: IBM Director Agent is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted unknown tcp requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the tcp 14247 port, leading to a denial of service vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted message to 14247 port. A successful attack could lead to exhaust CPU usage.

NAME: RealFlex RealWin FC_RFUSER_FCS_LOGIN Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: RealFlex RealWin SCADA server is vulnerable to a buffer overflow condition while parsing malformed TCP packets. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the TCP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: HP OpenView Client Configuration Manager Radia Notify Daemon Code Execution
DESCRIPTION: An authentication weakness vulnerability exists in the Radia Notify Daemon component of HP OpenView Client Configuration Manager. The flaw is created by improper handling of user supplied data passed to the affected Radia Notify Daemon on TCP port 3465. By sending a crafted message, the attacker can execute commands within the security context of the of the Radia Notify Daemon, which is System by default.

NAME: Symantec VERITAS NetBackup Volume Manager Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in the Symantec VERITAS NetBackup products. An attacker may leverage this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the target host with System privileges.

NAME: eSignal 7.6 STREAMQUOTE Remote Buffer Overflow Vulerability
DESCRIPTION: Stack-based buffer overflow in WinSig.exe in eSignal 7.5 and 7.6 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long STREAMQUOTE tag.

NAME: HP OpenView Products OVTrace Service Stack Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in HP OVTrace server. The vulnerability is due to lack of boundary protection while processing the trace request. NAME: HP OpenView Network Node Manager Ovalarmsrv Service Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
