A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Microsoft SMB Pathname Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There is a remote authenticated vulnerability in the Windows SMB server implementation that may allow code execution. More specifically, the vulnerability occurs in an error path in the routine that processes the SMB COPY command where it does not properly validate buffer lengths before a memcpy(). An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted SMB request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with SYSTEM context.

NAME: DOS Sprite32
DESCRIPTION: By sending out-of-band data to port 139, an attacker can cause a Windows system to lose network capability and possibly crash.

NAME: Windows SMB Remote Heap Overwrite Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Windows SMB is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted SMB requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input field in the SMB request, leading to an exploitable remote code execution vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted SMB request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: DOS VzmNuker
DESCRIPTION: By sending out-of-band data to port 139, an attacker can cause a Windows system to lose network capability and possibly crash.

NAME: Microsoft Windows WRITE_ANDX SMB Processing Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows is prone to a  denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted SMB requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on offset value in the SMB request, leading to a system crash.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted SMB request. A successful attack could crash server, a blue screen appeared.

NAME: DOS Netbios Nuke
DESCRIPTION: By sending out-of-band data to port 139, an attacker can cause a Windows system to lose network capability and possibly crash.

NAME: Microsoft Windows System32 Write Access
DESCRIPTION: This alert indicates that an attempt to write a file to Windows System32 directory has been detected.

NAME: DOS WinNuke
DESCRIPTION: By sending out-of-band data to port 139, an attacker can cause a Windows system to lose network capability and possibly crash.

NAME: Microsoft Windows Server Service SMB Rename Code Execution
DESCRIPTION: There is a code execution vulnerability in the Server service in Microsoft Windows2000 SP4, Server 2003 SP1 and earlier, and XP SP2 and earlier allowsremote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted SMB Rename packet. Successfully exploit this vulnerabilitymay lead to arbitrary code execution on the system.

NAME: Samba Root File System Access Security Bypass
DESCRIPTION: Samba 3.2.0 through 3.2.6 is prone to a security bypass vulnerability while parsing certain crafted SMB requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper authentication checks while connecting to a share when share definition is enabled in registry. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted SMB request with an empty share name. A successful attack could allow read access to the root file system.

NAME: NetBIOS RFParalyze
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows is vulnerable to a denial of service attack while handling certain crafted netbios requests. The vulnerability can be manifested when handling a NetBIOS session with a NULL NetBIOS source name. A successful attack could allow a remote attacker to crash, reboot, or enter an unstable and unpredictable state.

NAME: Microsoft Windows WinReg Access Attempt
DESCRIPTION: This alert indicates an attempt to access winreg service has been detected.

NAME: CA BrightStor ARCServe Backup Mailslot Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: CA BrightStor ARCServe Backup is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted mailslot requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the mailslot request, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted mailslot request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Novell NetWare SMB Transaction Secondary Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Novell NetWare is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted SMB request. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on some field in the SMB request, leading to an dos condition. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted SMB request. A successful attack could lead to DOS against the target application.

NAME: Microsoft SMB NamePipe Write Evasion Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: The alert indicates that Microsoft SMB NamePipe Write Evasion is in your network.

NAME: Samba Wildcard Filename Matching DoS
DESCRIPTION: There is a vulnerability in the way Samba parses filenames containing wildcard characters. A specially crafted resource filename can cause the product to consume an increasing amount of CPU resources. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to create a denial of service condition which would affect all active users of a Samba server.

NAME: Microsoft SMB Client Memory Allocation Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There is a buffer overflow vulnerability in Windows client SMB implementation. The vulnerability occurs when a malicious SMB server sends a packet to the client saying that it has X bytes but actually sends more than that.The attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending client some special crafted SMB packet to cause denial of service condition against client machine.

NAME: Microsoft Windows SMB Buffer Underflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted SMB protocol requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on filename length passed in a SMB protocol request, leading to an exploitable overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted SMB request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Microsoft LSASS NTLM Response Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows Local Security Authority Subsystem Service (LSASS)  is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability while parsing certain crafted NTLM authentication packet. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on malformed packets during the NTLM authentication. An attacker could create specially crafted anonymous NTLM authentication requests that would cause a crash in the LSASS service and subsequently would restart the computer.

NAME: Microsoft Windows SMB Stack Exhaustion Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft windows SMB is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing crafted SMB compounded requests. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted SMB request. A successful attack could lead to denial of service vulnerability.

NAME: Samba receive_smb_raw SMB Packets Parsing Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in Samba. The vulnerability is due to a boundary error within the "receive_smb_raw()" function that is invoked when Samba parses SMB packets. A remote unauthenticated attacker may leverage this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary code on the target system in the security context of the logged in user.

NAME: Microsoft Windows SMB ShareEnum Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: There is a buffer overflow vulnerability in SMB (Server Message Block) protocol in MicrosoftWindows NT, Windows 2000, and Windows XP. This vulnerability allows attackers to cause adenial of service (crash) via a malformed MB_COM_TRANSACTION packet with arequest for the (1) NetShareEnum, (2) NetServerEnum2, or (3)NetServerEnum3.

NAME: Samba SID Parsing Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Samba is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted samba request. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on <field> in the samba request, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted samba request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Microsoft Vista SMB Negotiate Protocol DoS
DESCRIPTION: Windows Vista is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while handling certain crafted SMB requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper handling of long dialect requests in a negotiate request. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a long crafted SMB request, thus crashing the SMB service. A successful attack could disable the SMB service on the victim machine.

NAME: Windows SMB Remote Heap Overwrite Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Windows SMB is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted SMB requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input field in the SMB request, leading to an exploitable remote code execution vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted SMB request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: DOS F-edUP
DESCRIPTION: F-edUP is a simple program, which sends a Out-Of-Bandwidth Message (MSG_OBB) to a selected IP Address using port 139 (NetBIOS), thereby crashing old Win95 and NT computers.

NAME: Netbios SMB Tree connect andX Request admin$ access
DESCRIPTION: Connect to admin$ pipe through smb

NAME: Microsoft SMB Client Pool Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft is prone to a Pool corruption vulnerability while parsing certain crafted SMB responses.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on  in the Max Buff Size  in the SMB Negotiate response, leading to an exploitable condition.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted SMB response. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft Windows SMB Pool Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft windows SMB Trans2 is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted SMB requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on length in the SMB request, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted SMB Trans2 request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Windows SMB Null Pointer Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Windows SMB is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted SMB requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the SMB request, leading to a denial of service vulnerability. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted SMB request. A successful attack could lead to a system hang (denial of service) on the affected server.

NAME: Microsoft Windows 2000 SMB Malformed Data DoS
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows 2000 is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while handling certain crafted requests on port 445. The vulnerability is present in the LANMAN service when large malformed data such as a stream of NULLs are sent on microsoft-ds port 445. This would result in CPU/memory exhaustion thus crashing the service.

NAME: Microsoft Windows SMB Variable Validation Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft windows SMB is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted SMB requests.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted SMB request. A successful attack could lead to denial of service vulnerability.

NAME: Windows SMB Login Attempt
DESCRIPTION: This signature is trying to indicate a login attempt(using username and password)

NAME: NetBIOS null session
DESCRIPTION: A netbios NULL session is an unauthenticated connection to an NT/Win2K machine. Such a session is useful for attackers to gain information about the NT/Win2K machine. Attackers can call APIs and use Remote Procedure calls to enumerate information using NULL sessions.

NAME: Samba Unicode Filename Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability has been reported in the way Samba handles file information requests. A malformed request can trick the server into overflowing an incorrectly allocated buffer while generating a response. If certain conditions are met, an attacker can exploit this vulnerability to execute malicious code on the vulnerable server with the privileges of the the session user account.

NAME: DOS DivineIntervention
DESCRIPTION: DivineIntervention is a simple program, which sends a Out-Of-Bandwidth Message (MSG_OBB) to a selected IP Address using port 139 (NetBIOS), thereby crashing old Win95 and NT computers.

NAME: Novell Client NetIdentity Agent Arbitrary Pointer Dereference Code Execution
DESCRIPTION: Novell Client NetIdentity Agent is prone to a code execution vulnerability while handling certain crafted RPC requests. The vulnerability is due to lack of proper checks while dereferencing a pointer passed in an RPC request. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted RPC message to the victim server after connecting to the XTIERRPCPIPE named pipe. A successful exploit could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Samba Arbitrary File Access Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There is a vulnerability in the way Samba validates file paths presented by an SMB client. A specially crafted file path can allow a user to bypass Samba access restrictions when accessing files. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to retrieve files which are outside a valid share path.

NAME: DOS Blood Lust
DESCRIPTION: Blood Lust is a simple program, which sends a Out-Of-Bandwidth Message (MSG_OBB) to a selected IP Address using port 139 (NetBIOS), thereby crashing old Win95 and NT computers.

NAME: Samba smbd Uninitialized Variable Read Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Samba before 3.4.8 and 3.5.x before 3.5.2 is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while handling certain crafted requests. The vulnerability is due to improper handling of an uninitialized variable. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a Session Setup SMB request with a malformed security blob length value. A successful exploit could crash the service.

NAME: Microsoft Windows Print Spooler Service Impersonation Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the Windows Print Spooler service that could allow a remote, unauthenticated attacker to execute arbitrary code on an affected Windows XP system. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system. An attacker could then install programs; view, change, or delete data; or create new accounts. This is an elevation of privilege vulnerability on all other supported Microsoft Windows systems.

NAME: Samba Trans2Open Function Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Samba 2.2.x before 2.2.8a, 2.0.10 and earlier 2.0.x versions, and Samba-TNG before 0.3.2, are prone to a remote buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted SMB Transaction2 requests. The vulnerability is present in the call_trans2open function, and is due to the lack of boundary checks on the string length of pname variable, which is later copied to a finite buffer of size 1024. Thus, an attacker could craft a SMB Transaction2 request with pname variable string larger than 1024, to overflow the buffer. A successful exploit could cause remote code execution on the server, or crash the server.

NAME: Microsoft Windows SMB Credential Reflection Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted SMB authentication datas.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on auth-by-itself data in the SMB request, leading to an exploitable remote code execution.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a same request as same host, A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Microsoft Windows Server Service Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows Server Service is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability while parsingcertain malformed network messages. The vulnerability exists in the SRV.SYS driver, which is responsible for handling SMB traffic. SMB trans requests with certain non-null terminated strings could lead to the crash in the driver. An unauthenticated attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted SMB packet, which may result in a denial-of-service condition.

NAME: DOS VOOB
DESCRIPTION: By sending out-of-band data to port 139, an attacker can cause a Windows system to lose network capability and possibly crash.

NAME: Microsoft SMB Client Transaction Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft SMB is prone to transaction vulnerability while parsing certain crafted SMB responses.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the SMB response, leading to an exploitable condition.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted SMB response. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: DOS PNUKE
DESCRIPTION: By sending out-of-band data to port 139, an attacker can cause a Windows system to lose network capability and possibly crash.

NAME: SMB Data Segmented Across TCP Evasion Attack
DESCRIPTION: This alert indicates that SMB data may be segmented across several TCP segments. Attackers can use this technique to evade IPS devices.

NAME: Netbios Mailslot Interim Reply Request
DESCRIPTION: Try to get some information by sending a mailslot request SMB service.

NAME: DOS KILLWIN
DESCRIPTION: By sending out-of-band data to port 139, an attacker can cause a Windows system to lose network capability and possibly crash.

NAME: Pwdump Password Dump Toolkit
DESCRIPTION: This alert indicates that pwdump password dump toolkit has been found

NAME: Samba smbd Flags2 Header Parsing Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Samba before 3.4.8 and 3.5.x before 3.5.2 is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while handling certain crafted requests. The vulnerability is present in the chain_reply function in process.c in smbd and is due to a NULL pointer dereference. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a Negotiate SMB request followed by a Session Setup request with differing Flags2 field value. A successful exploit could crash the service.

NAME: Samba SMB Fragment Reassembly Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Samba versions before 2.2.8, and Samba-TNG before 0.3.1, are prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted SMB requests. The vulnerability is present in a SMB packet fragment re-assembly code, and is due to the lack of boundarychecks on a field length which is used in a memcpy operation. Thus, an attacker could craft a SMB request to overflow the bufferused in the memcpy operation. A successful exploit could lead to remote code execution on the server, or crash the server.

NAME: Microsoft Windows SMB Buffer Underflow Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted SMB protocol requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on SMB protocol request, leading to an exploitable overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted SMB request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Microsoft SRV.SYS Mailslot Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows Server driver contains an exploitable memory corruption vuknerability. The vulnerability exists in the SRV.SYS driver, which is responsible for handling SMB traffic.Crafted SMB trans requests sent to the server could corrupt kernel memory, which could becontrolled by the attacker.An unauthenticated attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted SMB packet, and execute remote code on the vulnerable machine.A successful attack may result in arbitrary code execution with SYSTEM privileges leading to a full compromise. Attack attempts may result in denial-of-service conditions as well.

NAME: Microsoft SMB Client Message Size Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft SMB is prone to message size vulnerability while parsing certain crafted SMB responses.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the SMB response, leading to an exploitable condition.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted SMB response. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Sourcefire Snort DCE-RPC Preprocessor Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: A stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in Sourcefire Snort Intrusion Detection System (IDS). The vulnerability is due to improper handling of DCE-RPC network packets in the Snort DCE-RPC preprocessor. By sending a specially crafted DCE-RPC packet, a remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability and execute arbitrary code with privileges of Snort binary, which is usually root or System.

NAME: Samba SMBv1 Packets Chaining Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Samba SMBv1 is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability while parsing certain crafted SMB requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on some fields in the SMB request, which can leading to memory corruption. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted SMB request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: DOS BitchSlap
DESCRIPTION: BitchSlap is a simple program, which sends a Out-Of-Bandwidth Message (MSG_OBB) to a selected IP Address using port 139 (NetBIOS), thereby crashing old Win95 and NT computers.

NAME: PostgreSQL Bit Substring Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: PostgreSQL 8.0.23, 8.1.11, and 8.3.8 is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted SQL requests. The vulnerability is present in the bitsubstr function and is due to the lack of proper handling of negative values in arguments passed to the function. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending crafted values to the substr function. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Postgres Database Login Failed
DESCRIPTION: This alert indicates a postgres database login authentication failed. A multiple failed authentication response means an attack is try to brute-force user name and password.

NAME: NetBIOS nbtstat query
DESCRIPTION: This alert indicates that NBTStat tool is being run in a network. NBTStat is a command-line tool designed to help troubleshoot NetBIOS name over TCP/IP resolution problems. When a network is functioning normally, NetBT resolves NetBIOS names to IP addresses. However, this can also be used by attackers to scan and windows machine, to launch further attacks. This alert might also indicate an administrator using the tool to resolve certain network issues.

NAME: Microsoft WINS Server WPAD Registration Attempt
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft WINS Server is prone to a WPAD Registration vulnerability if WPAD name is not registered in the WINS database.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on WINS query, leading to an WINS spoofing attack.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted WINS name registration query. A successful attack could lead to IP address spoofing attack if the victim's browser is configured to use WPAD to discover proxy server settings or attacker can setup proxy server to doing the man in the middle attack.

NAME: Samba NMBD_Packets.C NetBIOS Replies Stack-Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Samba is prone to a remote stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it to an insufficiently sized memory buffer.

NAME: Norton Internet Security NBNS Response Processing Stack Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Symantec Firewall product line is vulnerable to a stack buffer overflow attack in the processing of a speciallycrafted NetBIOS Name Service Response message. If an attacker is able to send a single UDP datagramwith a source port of 137 to a vulnerable host, and the victim allows the incoming UDP datagram, it ispossible for the attacker to run arbitrary code with kernel privileges.

NAME: Symantec Norton Firewall NBNS response Remote Heap Corruption
DESCRIPTION: Symantec firewall is prone to a a remote heap corruption vulnerability in SYMDNS.SYS, a driver that validates NetBIOS Name Service responses, which can lead to execution of arbitrary code for various Symantec products. Successful exploitation of this flaw yields remote kernel access to the system.

NAME: Microsoft WINS DoS
DESCRIPTION: The WINS (Windows Internet Naming Service) Service under Windows 2003 is vulnerable to a Denial of Service from a remote attacker. The vulnerability is due to the improper validation of NetBIOS names in a refresh request. An attacker could send a crafted Netbios Refresh Name request to the WINS server  and crash it, thus denying service to other legitimate users.

NAME: HP OpenView Storage Data Protector Cell Manager Heap Overflow
DESCRIPTION: HP OpenView Storage Data Protector 5.50 and 6.0 is prone to a heap overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted requests. The vulnerability is present in rds.exe in the Cell Manager Database Service in the Application Recovery Manager component and is due to the lack of proper checks on size value passed in a request. Since the data is copied to finite heap buffers, a crafted request could result in an exploitable heap overflow. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Cisco IOS HTTP Service HTML Injection Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: The vulnerability is caused due to the memory dump feature of the HTTP server not properly sanitising the data in received packets before displaying them to the user in a HTML formatted page when the user views the "/level/15/exec/-/buffers/assigned/dump" link. This can be exploited to execute arbitrary script code in a user's browser session when the user views a memory dump containing malicious Javascript/HTML code from a received packet.Successful exploitation may allow the attacker to perform certain actions that are accessible by the logon administrator. E.g. changing the "enable" password by injecting HTML code that requests for the "/level/15/configure/-/enable/secret/" link.The vulnerability has been reported in IOS versions 11.0 through 12.4 with the HTTP server enabled.

NAME: Metasploit Meterpreter Connection Attempt
DESCRIPTION: This alert indicates that a Metasploit Meterpreter Connection attempt has been founded in your network.

NAME: Microsoft QuickTime Downloads Malware Through Specially Crafted .MOV Files
DESCRIPTION: QuickTime has a feature that can open URLs while playing the .MOV files back. This feature exists in QuickTime for the purposes of interactivity and has the same level as the scripting controls in replaying the movie from the start, going to the end, skipping forward or back, or setting the movie volume. Malicious mov file may utilize this feature to download malware or spyware.

NAME: Symantec Veritas NetBackup Server bpcd Long Request Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Symantec VERITAS NetBackup Server is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability. The vulnerability is caused by incorrect processing of specially crafted BPCD messages. A remote attacker may exploit this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system within the security context of the affected service, normally System.

NAME: Subversion Date Parsing Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Subversion versions 1.0.2 and earlier are prone to a stack overflow vulnerability while handling certain crafted requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper boundary checks on the get-dated-rev command parameters. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted command to the vulnerable server. A successful exploit could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the subversion server.

NAME: D-Link DAP-1160 Unauthenticated Remote Configuration - Remote Reboot
DESCRIPTION: The D-Link DAP-1160 wireless access point (WAP) is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to bypass security restrictions, access certain administrative functions, alter configuration, or trigger a denial-of-service condition.D-Link DAP-1160 running firmware v120b06, v130b10, and v131b01 are vulnerable.

NAME: HP OpenView Data Protector Application Recovery Manager Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: HP OpenView Data Protector Application Recovery Manager is prone to an overflow vulnerability while parsing certain malformed requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the request, leading to an exploitable overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a malformed request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Measuresoft ScadaPro Remote Command Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Measuresoft ScadaPro 4.0.0 is prone to a remote command execution while parsing certain crafted requests. The vulnerability is present in service.exe, due to an insecure exposed method in the XF function. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted request to the service on port 11234. A successful exploit could allow execution of arbitrary DLL functions with the privileges of the server.

NAME: DistCC Daemon Command Execution
DESCRIPTION: DistCC is a program for compiling C and C++ programs over the network using commands issued by the client to the server. Thus,without proper network access control, any unauthenticated user could execute arbitrary commands on the server machine. An attackercould exploit the security weakness in distcc, by supplying command to the distcc server, causing arbitrary commands to be executed.

NAME: HP OpenView Network Node Manager ovalarmsrv Integer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: HP OpenView Network Node Manager is prone to an integer overflow vulnerability while handling certain crafted requests. The vulnerability is present in the ovalarmsrv component and is due to the lack of boundary checks on user-supplied values. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending an overly long value in a crafted request. A successful exploit could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server process.

NAME: Fujitsu SystemcastWizard Lite PXEService UDP Handling Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in Fujitsu SystemcastWizard Lite product. The vulnerability is due to improper bounds checking while handling overly large UDP packets. Remote unauthenticated attackers could exploit this vulnerability by sending maliciously crafted packets and execute arbitrary code on the target.

NAME: CA ARCserve LGServer SetDataFilter Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: There exist a buffer overflow vulnerability in the way CA ARCserve Backup for Laptops and Desktops service handles incoming messages. Specifically the vulnerability is due to lack of boundary check when processing setdatagrowthscheduleandfilter user request. By sending specially crafted request, an unauthenticated remote attacker can leverage these flaws to execute arbitrary code on the target host with System privileges.

NAME: NTP Daemon Autokey Stack Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: NTP (Network Time Protocol) daemon is prone to a stack overflow vulnerability while handling certain crafted packets. The vulnerability can be manifested in the autokey mode and is due to the failure of handling boundary conditions in user-supplied data. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a specially crafted packet to ntpd. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the daemon.

NAME: Squid Proxy HTCP Packet Processing Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Squid Proxy is prone to a DoS vulnerability while parsing certain crafted requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the request, leading to a denial of service. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted request. A successful attack could lead to denial of service the server.

NAME: Blue Coat Authentication and Authorization Agent Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Blue Coat Authentication and Authorization Agent (BCAAA) is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper boundary checks on input passed to the agent listening on port 16102. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted authentication request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Yahoo! Messenger File Transfer Filename Spoofing
DESCRIPTION: There is a vulnerability in the way Yahoo! Messenger displays file names in the file transfer dialog. The product displays only a portion of an overly long filename. An attacker can exploit this flaw to mislead a user into downloading a malicious executable program. For example, from the truncated filename, a user may believe that he is receiving an image when in fact it is a program.

NAME: BakBone NetVault Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in BakBone Software's NetVault, an enterprise class backup suite. The vulnerability is caused due to insufficient boundary checking in the communication handling code of both the client and server components. This vulnerability can be exploited remotely by unauthenticated users to execute arbitrary code.

NAME: RealVNC Remote Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: RealVNC 4.1.1, and other products that use RealVNC such as AdderLink IP and Cisco CallManager are prone to an authentication bypassvulnerability due an error in parsing authentication requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of checks on theauthentication methods that are acceptable from a VNC client. Thus, if a VNC client specifies an insecure security type such as"Type 1 - None", the vulnerability would allow the server to accept client authentication without further checks. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending crafted VNC authentication requests, bypassing authentication checks from the server.

NAME: Firebird Relational Database Attach Request Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Firebird Database Server is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on the filename field in an attach request. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted database request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Bopup Communications Server Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Bopup Communications Server is prone to an overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted crafted requests to TCP port 19810. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the crafted request to TCP port 19810, leading to an exploitable overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted request to TCP port 19810. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: BigAnt IM Server USV Request Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: BigAnt IM Server is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted USV requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the USV request, leading to an exploitable overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted USV request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Veritas Backup Exec Agent Error Status Denial of Service
DESCRIPTION: Veritas Backup Exec Agent for Windows is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while handling certain crafted requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of validation checks in certain user supplied input in a request, that could crash the server agent. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted request to the server, and thus crashing it.

NAME: Symantec Alert Management System Intel Alert Originator Service Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Symantec Alert Originator Service component shipped with Symantec Client Security software is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while handling certain crafted requests. The vulnerability is present in iao.exe and is due to the lack of boundary checks while copying user-provided data into memory. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted request to the service listening on port 38292. A successful attack could allow remote code execution with the privileges of the server service.

NAME: Asterisk chan_skinny CAPABILITIES_RES_MESSAGE Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Asterisk is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted chan_skinny requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on CAPABILITIES_RES_MESSAGE in the chan_skinny request, leading to an exploitable denial of service. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted chan_skinny request. A successful attack could lead to denial of service with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Cisco Skinny Malformed Capabilities Update Message Denial of Service
DESCRIPTION: Cisco CallManager Express Service is prone to a DoS vulnerability while parsing certain crafted SCCP requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the SCCP request, leading to an exploitable DoS. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted SCCP response. A successful attack could lead to server crash or hang up.

NAME: RSync Arbitrary File Overwrite
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in the way rsync handles remote client supplied paths. It is possible for a remote attacker to overwrite, create or delete arbitrary files on a remote rsync server.

NAME: Symantec System Center Alert Management System Command Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Symantec System Center Alert Management System is prone to a command exection vulnerability while parsing certain crafted saphostcontrol requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the saphostcontrol request, leading to an exploitable command exection.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted saphostcontrol request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Oracle Web Cache Heap Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Oracle Web Cache service is prone to a buffer overflow while handling certain crafted HTTP requests to the server. The buffer overflow occurs in the component that handles HTTP requests and does not require the attacker to have credentials for exploitation. The vulnerability could allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on vulnerable systems.

NAME: pcAnywhere Authentication Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a denial of service vulnerability in Symantec pcAnywhere. The vulnerability is dueto improper boundary checking and can be exploited to cause a buffer overflow prior to authentication. A remote unauthenticated attacker can exploit the vulnerability to terminate the application, causing a denial of service condition.

NAME: McAfee ePolicy Orchestrator Framework Services Log Handling Format String Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a Format String vulnerability in McAfee Framework Services used in McAfee ePolicy Orchestrator and other products. The vulnerability is specifically in creating new log entries without filtering format specifiers from the strings. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially crafted UDP packet to the target host. A successful exploitation of this vulnerability can allow for code execution with the privileges of the affected service, or cause a denial of s

NAME: Sun Java Web Console LibWebconsole_Services.SO Format String Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Sun Java Web Console 2.2.2 through 2.2.5 are prone to a format string vulnerability while parsing certain crafted login requests/responses. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on string in the login request, leading to an exploitable format string vulnerability. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted login request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Windows Command Reverse Shell Access
DESCRIPTION: This is try to indicate a reverse shell access after attack exploit the vulnerability system or client successfully.

NAME: CDE dtspcd Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: CDE (default X-Windows GUI environment) of Sun Solaris is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while handling certain crafted requests. The vulnerability is present in the connection negotiation routine and is due to the lack of proper boundary checks on user-supplied values. A remote attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted CDE client request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: HP OpenView Data Protector Application Recovery Manager Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: HP OpenView Data Protector Application Recovery Manager is prone to an overflow vulnerability while parsing certain malformed requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the request, leading to an exploitable overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a malformed request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Motorola Timbuktu Pro Directory Traversal Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Timbuktu Pro 8.6.5 for Windows, and 8.7 for Mac OS X is prone to a directory traversal vulnerability while handling certain crafted requests. The vulnerability is present in the Flash Notes feature and is due to the improper sanitization of slash characters in destination filenames. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted flash note to upload files to arbitrary locations via a crafted destination filename. A successful exploit could lead to uploading of files to arbitrary locations (possible to Startup folder), which could allow remote code execution with the privileges of the service.

NAME: DAQFactory NETB Packet Stack Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Azeotech DAQFactory 5.85 build 1853 and earlier is prone to a stack overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on NETB packets sent to UDP port 20034. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a long crafted request to UDP port 20034. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: CCProxy Ping Request Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: YoungZSoft CCProxy 6.2 and earlier is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while handling certain crafted requests to the telnet proxy service. The vulnerability is due to the lack of boundary checks on the address passed in a p (ping) command. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a long, crafted address in the ping command. A successful exploit could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: HP OpenView Storage Data Protector EXEC_CMD Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: HP OpenView Storage Data Protector is prone to a stack buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted unknown protocol requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on EXEC_CMD in the unknown protocol request, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted EXEC_CMD request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Oracle Secure Backup NDMP Packet Handling Multiple Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Multiple memory corruption vulnerabilities exists in Oracle Secure Backup. The flaws are due to insufficient input validation when processing NDMP requests sent to the service. Remote unauthenticated attackers can exploit these vulnerabilities by sending a specially crafted request to the affected server.

NAME: Windows Command Shell Access
DESCRIPTION: This is try to indicate a shell access after attack exploit the vulnerability system or client successfully.

NAME: Citrix Provisioning Services Streamprocess Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Citrix Provisioning Services 5.6 is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted requests. The vulnerability is present in streamprocess.exe and is due to the lack of proper checks on certain length values passed in a 0x40020010 type packet. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted request to the service listening on UDP port 6095. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: CA ARCserve LGServer LicGetSiteId Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: There exist a buffer overflow vulnerability in the way CA ARCserve Backup for Laptops and Desktops service handles incoming messages. Specifically the vulnerability is due to lack of boundary check when processing licgetsiteid user request. By sending specially crafted request, an unauthenticated remote attacker can leverage these flaws to execute arbitrary code on the target host with System privileges.

NAME: HP OpenView Storage Data Protector Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: HP OpenView Storage Data Protector is prone to a stack buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain malformed unknown protocol requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on MSG_PROTOCOL in the unknown protocol request, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager String Handling Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager Agent Client is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while handling certain crafted requests. The vulnerability is due to lack of boundary checks in generic string handling function when parsing strings from user-supplied request data. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the agent.

NAME: Squid Gopher Protocol Handling Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in the way Squid web proxy handles responses from Gopher servers. An overly long line in a Gopher response can overflow a fixed size buffer. This could create a denial of service condition for active transactions or could potentially allow an arbitrary code execution with permissions of an account running Squid web proxy.

NAME: Microsoft remote desktop connect initial attempt
DESCRIPTION: This event indicates that someone is tring to do initial connection to a remote desktop. It can be used in ms-rdp brute-force attack. An ms-rdp brute force attack is a method of defeating the cryptographic scheme by trying a large number of possible username and passwords.

NAME: UNIX rlogind Service Authentication Bypass
DESCRIPTION: Rlogin is prone to an authentication bypass vulnerability while handling certain crafted requests.The vulnerability allows root access when rlogin is given -froot parameter. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted rlogin request and thereby gain remote root access.

NAME: HP OpenView Network Node Manager ovw.dll Message Handling Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in HP OpenView Network Node Manager multiple Services. The flaw is due to a boundary error when processing user requests. A remote unauthenticated attacker can send a crafted request to the target host to exploit this vulnerability. Successful attack could allow for arbitrary code being injected and executed with the privileges of the affected service, which is normally System on Windows platforms.

NAME: VNC Client Connection Failed Response Parsing Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: UltraVNC and AT&T WinVNC clients are prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted VNC responses. The vulnerability is due to the lack of boundary checks on the length value passed in a authentication failed response. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a long authentication failed response that would overflow stack buffers. A successful exploit could lead to remote code execution in the context of the application.

NAME: Microsoft Windows Media Services Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows Media Services is vulnerable to an overflow condition while parsing malformed MSMMS requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the MSMMS request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: UNIX rlogind Service root Account Access
DESCRIPTION: This alert indicates an attempt to login using the rlogin root account without any password. The rlogin protocol allows setting up of trusted users and hosts who will be allowed to log on without the entry of a password.

NAME: Oracle Secure Backup NDMP CONECT_CLIENT_AUTH Command Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There is a buffer overflow vulnerability in Oracle Secure Backup. The flaw is due to insufficient boundary checking when processing NDMP requests sent to program obndmpd.exe. Remote unauthenticated attackers can exploit this vulnerability by sending specially crafted messages to the affected interface. A successful exploitation can lead to arbitrary code execution with System level privileges.

NAME: DATAC RealWin SCADA Server SCPC_INITIALIZE_RF Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: DATAC RealWin SCADA server is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on values passed in a SCP_INITIALIZE_RF packet. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted request to the server on port 912. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: NVIDIA RealityServer Web Services RTMP Server Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: NVIDIA RealityServer is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted requests. The vulnerability is present in the RTMP server which does not properly parse long crafted requests. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted request to the server listening on port 1935. A successful attack could crash the server.

NAME: ISS PAM Component ICQ Parsing Stack Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: ISS (Internet Security Systems) Protocol Analysis Module (PAM) component is prone to a stack overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ICQ messages.The vulnerability is present in the ICQ parsing routines, and is due to the lack of boundary checks on certain length values providedin a SRV_MULTI ICQ response, containing SRV_USER_ONLINE and SRV_META_USER responses. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability bysending a crafted ICQ response that would overflow stack buffers. A successful exploit could lead to remote code execution, or causea denial of service condition on the ISS component using the ICQ routines. This vulnerability has been famously exploited by theWitty Worm.

NAME: Quest Software Big Brother Arbitrary File Deletion and Overwriting Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Quest Software Big Brother is prone to a arbitrary file overwrite or delete vulnerability while parsing certain crafted TCP request. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on some field in the TCP request, leading to an arbitrary file overwrite or delete. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted TCP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Borland InterBase Remote Integer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Borland InterBase is prone to an overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted DB connection requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the DB connection request, leading to an exploitable overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted DB connection request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: CA BrightStor ARCserve Discovery Service SERVICEPC Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Discovery Service in BrightStor ARCserve Backup 9.0 through 11.1 is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while handling longpackets to TCP port 41523. The vulnerability is due to the lack of boundary checks while copying the contents of the packet tofinite stack buffers, leading to an exploitable stack overflow condition. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by passing a long packet on the SERVICEPC discovery port, causing remote code execution.

NAME: Symantec Alert Management System HNDLRSVC Arbitrary Command Execution
DESCRIPTION: Symantec Alert Management System is prone to a command execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted TCP request. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the TCP request, leading to a command execution. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted TCP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Siemens Tecnomatix FactoryLink vrn Opcode 9 Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Siemens Tecnomatix FactoryLink is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted requests. The vulnerability is present in vrn.exe and is due to the lack of proper checks on buffers supplied in an Opcode 9 request. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a long crafted request to the service listening on port 7579. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: CA BrightStor ARCServe Backup LGServer Arbitrary File Upload
DESCRIPTION: An arbitrary file upload vulnerability exists in CA BrightStor ARCServe Backup for Laptops and Desktops. The vulnerability is due to insufficient access control in the LGServer process while handling file uploads from remote users. A remote unauthenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to upload file to specified location on the target file system. Moreover, the attacker can facilitate other functionality of the affected server to load and execute the uploaded file with System privi

NAME: Safenet SoftRemote IKE Service Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Safenet SoftRemote IKE Service is prone to an overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted IKE requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the IKE request, leading to an exploitable overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted IKE request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: CA ARCserve Backup LGServer Handshake Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in the way CA ARCserve Backup for Laptops and Desktops service handles incoming messages. A remote unauthenticated attacker can send specially crafted message to the LGServer service to trigger the vulnerability, potentially execute arbitrary code on the target host with System privileges.

NAME: Best Software SalesLogix Database Credentials Disclosure Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Best Software SalesLogix Server is prone to a information disclosure vulnerability while parsing certain crafted requests. The vulnerability is present in the TCP server on port 1707 which accepts client commands without authentication. An attacker could issue a GetConnection command with proper parameters to retrieve database credentials required for SQL database access. A successful attack could arbitrary users to login to the server and access sensitive SQL database information.

NAME: IBM solidDB Packet Processing Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: IBM solidDB 6.5.0.3 and earlier is prone to a integer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted requests. The vulnerability is present in solid.exe listening on TCP port 1315 and is due to the lack of proper checks on certain integer values, which could lead to a exploitable null pointer dereference. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted request. A successful attack could crash the server thus leading to a denial of service situation.

NAME: Interactive Graphical SCADA System Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Interactive Graphical SCADA System is prone to an overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the request, leading to an exploitable overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Mod_rootme backdoor detection attempt
DESCRIPTION: Windows with BO installed is prone to a information leaking vulnerability while parsing certain crafted UDP requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the UDP request, leading to an exploitable information leaking.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted UDP request. A successful attack could lead to information leaking with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Novell eDirectory NDS Verb 0x01 Integer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Novell eDirectory 8.7.3.x before 8.7.3.10 ftf2 and 8.8.x before 8.8.5.2 is prone to an integer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper parsing of NDS 0x1 request which has a large integer value in the request. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Computer Associates Unicenter TNG Buffer overflow vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Computer Associates Unicenter TNG server is prone to a stack overflw vulnerability while handling certain crafted requests. The vulnerability is present in the awservices.exe service and is due to the lack of proper checks on user-supplied input. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted request to the service listening on port 9990. A successful exploit could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: CitectSCADA ODBC Server Remote Stack Overflow
DESCRIPTION: CitectSCADA is prone to a stack overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ODBC connection requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data from client request packet leading to an exploitable stack buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Snort Back Orifice Pre-Processor Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A buffer overflow condition exists in Snort. The flaw is caused by insufficient boundary checks in handling Back Orifice messages. An attacker may leverage this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code in the security context, normally root, of the affected product.

NAME: AppleFileServer AFP Request Parsing Stack Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: AppleFileServer for Mac OS X 10.3.3 and earlier is prone to stack overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted packets sentto the server. The vulnerability is due to the lack of boundary checks on the name type string in a LoginExt packet for a Cleartext Password User Authentication Method (UAM) request. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by crafting a LoginExt packetwith a long name type string that would overflow the stack buffer. A successful exploit could lead to remote code execution, or leadto a denial of service condition on the AppleFileServer.

NAME: Firebird Database Server Username Handling Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Firebird Database Server is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain craft database request.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the Username field in the database query, leading to an exploitable overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted database request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution within the context of the current logged-in user.

NAME: EMC AlphaStor Agent Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: EMC Alphastor is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while handling certain crafted requests. The vulnerability is present in the AlphaStor Command Line Interface process of the Server Agent. The vulnerability is due to the lack of boundary checks while handling crafted packets sent to the default port 41025. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the process.

NAME: LCDProc test_func_func Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: LCDProc 0.4.1 is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while handling certain crafted requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper length checks on argv command passed to the test_func_func function in a request. A successful exploit could allow remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Windows Command No-banner Shell Access
DESCRIPTION: This is try to indicate a shell access after attack exploit the vulnerability system or client successfully.

NAME: UnrealIRCd Backdoor Unauthorized Access Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: UnrealIRCd 3.2.8 is prone to an unauthorized-access vulnerability due to the presence of a backdoor. An unauthorized attacker could login through the backdoor account and execute arbitrary system commands in the context of the user running the application.

NAME: RealWin SCADA Server DATAC Login Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: RealWin SCADA is prone to a stack overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on username field passed to the On_FC_CONNECT_FCS_LOGIN packet. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted request to the server on port 910. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: SAP MaxDB Remote Command Injection Exploit
DESCRIPTION: SAP MaxDB is prone to a remote command-injection vulnerability while parsing the user-supplied input.Successfully exploiting this issue allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary shell commands with the privileges of the database server.

NAME: CA BrightStor ARCserve LGServer Multiple Commands Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: LGServer component of CA (Computer Associates) BrightStor ARCserve Backup for Laptops and Desktops r11.1 is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on arguments passed to certain commands in a request. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted request to the server listening on port 1900. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: CA ARCserve LGServer GetBackupLog Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: There exist a buffer overflow vulnerability in the way CA ARCserve Backup for Laptops and Desktops service handles incoming messages. Specifically the vulnerability is due to lack of boundary check when processing getbackuplog user request. By sending specially crafted request, an unauthenticated remote attacker can leverage these flaws to execute arbitrary code on the target host with System privileges.

NAME: Novell ZENworks Asset Management MSG.DLL Remote Integer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Novell ZENworks Asset Management is prone to an integer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly validate user-supplied data.An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. A successful attack could result in the complete compromise of the computer. Failed attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions.

NAME: Snort Back Orifice Pre-Processor Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A buffer overflow exists in Snort product. The flaw is caused by insufficient boundary checks in the handling of Back Orifice messages. An attacker may leverage this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code in the security context of the affected product, normally <italic>root</italic>.

NAME: PoPToP Negative Read Argument Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: PoPToP PPTP server before 1.1.4-b3 is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted PPTP requests. The vulnerability is due to the improper handling of 0 or 1 length value. Such a length value is treated as negative and is later used as a large unsigned value for memory copy operation. Thus, this leads to an exploitable integer overflow vulnerability. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Unreal Tournament 2004 Secure Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Unreal Tournament 2004 game is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while handling certain crafted requests. The vulnerability is present in the engine and is due to lack of boundary checks while handling crafted "secure" query requests. A successful exploit could allow attackers to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system in the context of the affected process.

NAME: HP Data Protector OmniInet Multiple Opcode Packet Parsing Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: HP OpenView Storage Data Protector 6.00 through 6.20 is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on packets for several opcodes, sent to the server listening on port 5555. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: IAX2 Asterisk Remote Denial of Service
DESCRIPTION: Multiple vulnerabilities have been identified in various Asterisk products, which could be exploited by remote attackers to cause a denial of service or take complete control of an affected system.The first issue is caused by a buffer overflow error in the "iax_frame_wrap()" function within the IAX2 channel driver (chan_iax2) when processing a voice or video frame with a data payload larger than 4 kB, which could be exploited by remote attackers to execute arbitrary code by sending a specially crafted RTP frame to an affected application.The second vulnerability is caused by a NULL pointer dereference error in the IAX2 channel driver (chan_iax2) when processing specially crafted "LAGRQ" or "LAGRP" frames, which could be exploited by attackers to crash an affected application.The third issue is caused by an error in the Skinny channel driver (chan_skinny) when processing specially crafted packets, which could be exploited by attackers to crash an affected application.The fourth vulnerability is caused by an error in the STUN implementation when processing malformed packets, which could be exploited by attackers to crash an affected application.

NAME: Digium Asterisk IAX2 Call Number Denial Of Service
DESCRIPTION: The IAX2 protocol implementation in Asterisk is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while handling certain crafted IAX2 requests. The vulnerability is because the server fails to check the number of connections with unique call numbers (15-bit value), which leads to call number exhaustion. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending number requests that would exhaust the call number space on the server. A successful exploit could deny further connections from the server leading to a denial of service condition.

NAME: HP Mercury Multiple Products Agent Command Processing Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exist a buffer overflow vulnerability in multiple HP Mercury products. The flaw is due to improper handling of user supplied data sent to the LoadRunner Agent service on TCP port 54345. Successful exploitation of this issue allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code with privileges of the LoadRunner Agent service. Depending on the installation method, the affected service may run with the System account or as the currently logged on user.

NAME: RealNetworks Helix Server AgentX Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: RealNetworks Helix Server is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted requests. The vulnerability is present in AgentX and is due to the lack of proper checks on user-supplied data. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted request to the server listening on port 705. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: IBM Director Agent Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: IBM Director Agent is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted TCP request. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks some field in the TCP request, leading to a DOS. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted TCP request. A successful attack could lead to DOS against the target server.

NAME: Computer Associates License Client GETCONFIG Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Computer Associates License client is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted responses. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper boundary checks on GETCONFIG response. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by starting a fake license server and sending a long GETCONFIG response to the client request. A successful exploit could allow remote code execution with the privileges of the user running the software.

NAME: Interactive Graphical SCADA System Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Interactive Graphical SCADA System is prone to an overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the request, leading to an exploitable overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager Agent Client Generic String Handling Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in IBM Tivoli Storage Manager Agent Client. The vulnerability is due to a boundary error in a generic string handling function when parsing strings from request packets. This vulnerability can be exploited to cause stack-based buffer overflow. Successful exploitation allows execution of arbitrary code.            In an attack case where code injection is successful, the behaviour of the target is entirely dependent on the intended function of the injected code. The code in such a case would execute within the security context of the affected process.            In an attack case where code injection is not successful, the affected process will terminate abnormally.

NAME: Microsoft DNS Resolution Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that the DNS client service handles malformed LLMNR queries. A successful attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of the NetworkService account. The attacker could then install programs, modify data, or create new accounts with full user privileges.

NAME: HP OpenView Omniback Remote Command Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: HP OpenView Omniback is prone to an arbitrary remote command execution vulnerability. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper filtering of user-supplied data. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted request containing commands to be executed on the victim machine. A successful attack could lead to arbitrary command execution and thereby help gain superuser privileges on a vulnerable system.

NAME: RealVNC VNC Server ClientCutText Message Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: RealVNC VNC Server is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability while parsing certain malformed VNC requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on some fields in the VNC request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Sun Solaris in.rwhod Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists within the in.rwhod daemon component of Sun Solaris. The vulnerability is due to the lack of boundary checks on certain values passed to the server in a who request. This vulnerability may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable host within the security context of the root user.

NAME: UNIX rlogind Service nobody Access
DESCRIPTION: This indicates a nobody access of UNIX rlogind service.

NAME: Firebird SQL Username Remote Buffer Overflow Exploit
DESCRIPTION: Firebird Database Server is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain craft database request.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the Username field in the database query, leading to an exploitable overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted database request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution within the context of the current logged-in user.

NAME: LANDesk Management Suite Alert Service Stack Overflow
DESCRIPTION: LANDesk Management Suite is prone to a stack overflow vulnerability while parsing certaincrafted udp requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on udp data length in the request packet, leading to an exploitable stack overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted udp request. Asuccessful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Sielco Sistemi Winlog Pro Opcode 2 Parsing Stack Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Sielco Sistemi Winlog Pro 2.07.00 is prone to a stack overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on string values passed in an opcode 2 request. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted request on TCP port 46823. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: SpamAssassin Spamd Vpopmail And Paranoid Options Code Execution
DESCRIPTION: A code execution vulnerability exists in the SpamAssassin spamd daemon. The vulnerability exists in the virtual pop mechanism when processing the username passed to it when the vpopmail mechanism is enabled. An unauthenticated remote attacker may leverage the vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands in the security context of the running spamd daemon process.

NAME: HP Openview Trace Remote Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: HP Openview is prone to an overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ita-agent requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the ita-agent request, leading to an exploitable overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted ita-agent request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Computer Associates Products Discovery Service Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Multiple Computer Associates products are prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while handling certain crafted requests. The vulnerability is present in the discovery service component which is contained in the affected products. An unauthenticated attacker may attempt to leverage this flaw in order to divert the flow of the vulnerable process.

NAME: Wireshark SigComp UDVM Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Wireshark SigComp UDVM is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted PCAP file. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on soem field in the PCAP file, leading to an exploitable code execution. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by craftinga request with the known creadentials and gain remote access to the files on the backup server.

NAME: HP Data Protector OmniInet Opcode 11 Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: HP OpenView Storage Data Protector 6.00 through 6.20 is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on opcode 11 packet sent to the server listening on port 5555. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Asterisk Skinny Channel Driver get_input Function Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Integer overflow in the get_input function in the Skinny channel driver (chan_skinny.c) in Asterisk 1.0.x before 1.0.12 and 1.2.x before 1.2.13, as used by Cisco SCCP phones, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a certain dlen value that passes a signed integer comparison and leads to a heap-based buffer overflow.

NAME: CA License Software Invalid Command Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: CA License Software is prone to a Buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing an invalid command.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: EMC RepliStor Server Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: EMC Replistor Server is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted requests. The vulnerability is present in the rep_serv.exe listening on TCP port 7144 and is due to the lack of proper checks on user-supplied data. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted request that could crash the service.

NAME: Iconics GENESIS32 Opcode 0x4b0 Integer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Iconics Genesis is prone to an integer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on number of elements field passed in opcode 0x4b0. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted request to the service listening on port 38080. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Novell NetMail NMAP STOR Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of Novell NetMail.
