DESCRIPTION: There exists a directory traversal vulnerability in Qualcomm WorldMail IMAP server. The vulnerability is caused by insufficient validation of the user provided data. An authenticated remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to gain access to other user's mailboxes as well as files and folders on the target system.

NAME: MailEnable IMAP Server Long Tag  anomaly
DESCRIPTION: This attack gets triggered when an overlong parameter is passed as the imap TAG.  There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in the way mail Server handles IMAP requests. The vulnerability is due to lack of boundary protection while processing IMAP commands. A remote authenticated attacker may exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service condition or inject and execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system within the security context of the affected service, normally System.

NAME: IMAP overlong CLOSE Command anomaly
DESCRIPTION: This attack gets triggered when an overlong parameter is passed to the imap close command.  There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in the way mail Server handles IMAP requests. The vulnerability is due to lack of boundary protection while processing IMAP commands. A remote authenticated attacker may exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service condition or inject and execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system within the security context of the affected service, normall

NAME: Novell NetMail IMAP STATUS Command Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Novell Netmail IMAP Server is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted IMAP requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on STATUS command in the IMAP request, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted IMAP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: IMAP overlong EXPUNGE Command anomaly
DESCRIPTION: Some mail Servers like Ipswitch Imail server is prone to buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing long parameters passed to the imap expunge command. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in some fields in IMAP requests, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted IMAP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: IMAP Overlong Subscribe Command anomaly
DESCRIPTION: This attack gets triggered when an overlong parameter is passed to the subscribe command.  There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in the way some mail Server handles IMAP requests. The vulnerability is due to lack of boundary protection while processing IMAP subscribe command. A remote authenticated attacker may exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service condition or inject and execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system within the security context of the affected se

NAME: Novell Netmail IMAP SUBSCRIBE Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Novell Netmail IMAP Server is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted IMAP requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on SUBSCRIBE command in the IMAP request, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted IMAP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: IRC: Sdbot Spreading Activity
DESCRIPTION: This Alert detected Sdbot IRC activity in the network.

NAME: Dana IRC Client Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Dana IRC client 1.3 is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while handling crafted IRC responses. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper length checks on the IRC responses sent from the server. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by hosting a malicious IRC server and sending crafted responses. A successful exploit could allow remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: IRC: Sdbot Downloading Activity
DESCRIPTION: This Alert detected Sdbot IRC activity in the network.

NAME: Colloquy IRC Channel Invite Format String DoS
DESCRIPTION: Colloquy 2.1 and earlier is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while handling certain crafted IRC channel requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper filters when handling format string specifiers in the channel name of INVITE requests. A successful attack could lead to a crash, creating a denial of service condition.

NAME: IRC: Agobot Spreading Activity
DESCRIPTION: This Alert detected Agobot IRC activity in the network.

NAME: IRC: Agotbot Downloading Activity
DESCRIPTION: This Alert detected Agobot IRC activity in the network.

NAME: IRC: Agobot DDOS Activity
DESCRIPTION: This Alert detected Agobot IRC activity in the network.

NAME: IRC PRIVMSG Message Processing Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Several IRC products including mIRC and Talkative IRC are prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing crafted IRC responses. The flaw is due to insufficient input validation when processing PRIVMSG IRC messages. A remote attacker may exploit this vulnerability by persuading the target user to connect to a malicious IRC server. Successful attack could allow for arbitrary code injection and execution with privileges of the currently logged on user.

NAME: IRC: Sdbot DDOS Activity
DESCRIPTION: This Alert detected SDbot IRC activity in the network.

NAME: MPlayer Real Demuxer stream_read Heap Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a heap overflow vulnerability in MPlayer. The flaw is due to insufficient input validation when processing Real Media files. A remote attacker may exploit this vulnerability by persuading the target user to open a malicious Real Media file. Successful attack could allow for arbitrary code injection and execution with privileges of the currently logged on user. In case code execution is not achieved, the application will terminate abnormally causing a denial of service condition.

NAME: IRC: UrXbot DDOS Activity
DESCRIPTION: This Alert detected UrXbot IRC activity in the network.

NAME: MySQL Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: MySQL  is prone to a authentication bypass vulnerability while parsing certain auth request.The vulnerability is due to design error in password string checking, leading to an authentication bypass vulnerability.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted mysql auth request. A successful attack could lead to authentication bypass vulnerability.

NAME: Sun MySQL Database PROCEDURE ANALYSE Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Mysql is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted Mysql requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on ANALYSE call in the Mysql request, leading to a denial of service. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted Mysql request. A successful attack could lead to server crash.

NAME: MySQL with yassl ssl certificate handling remote stack buffer overflow vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: MySQL is prone to an overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted SSL requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the SSL request, leading to an exploitable overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted SSL request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: MySQL Password Handler Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: MySQL is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted mysql request.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in get_salt_from_password from sql_acl.cc, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted mysql request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: MySQL COM_TABLE_DUMP Function Stack Overflow
DESCRIPTION: MySQL is prone to a code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted mysql request.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in OM_TABLE_DUMP packets with invalid length values, leading to an exploitable code execution. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted mysql request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Oracle MySQL Database Unique SET Column Join Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Oracle MySQL Database is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted MYSQL requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the MYSQL request, leading to a denial of service. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause the affected service to stop processing requests, denying service to legitimate users.

NAME: Sun MySQL Database SELECT Subquery Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Sun MySQL Database is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted Mysql requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on subquery parameters in the Mysql request, leading to a denial of service. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted Mysql request. A successful attack could lead to server crash

NAME: MySQL Server Date_Format Function Format String Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: MySQL is prone to a format string vulnerability while parsing certain crafted mysql request.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in DATE_FORMAT packet with format string attack string, leading to an exploitable code execution. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted mysql request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Sun MySQL Database SELECT Subquery Denial of Service
DESCRIPTION: MySQL 5.0.x before 5.0.88 and 5.1.x before 5.1.41 are prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted MySQL requests. The vulnerability is due to the improper handling of SELECT statements with subqueries. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted MySQL SELECT query to the vulnerable server. A successful attack could crash the server and thus lead to a denial of service condition.

NAME: Oracle MySQL Database IN and CASE NULL Argument Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Oracle MySQL Database is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain malformed SQL requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on some field in the SQL query. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a malformed SQL request. A successful attack could lead to denial of service against the target server.

NAME: Sun MySQL Database Format String Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Sun Microsystems MySQL database server is prone to a format string vulnerability while handling certain crafted requests. The vulnerability is due to insufficient input validation when processing create and drop database commands. Remote authenticated attackers could exploit this vulnerability by sending malformed data to the MySQL process. A successful exploit could crash the server, creating a denial of service condition.

NAME: MySQL Database COM_FIELD_LIST Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: MySQL Database is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while handling certain crafted requests. The vulnerability is due to the improper handling of long table name passed in a COM_FIELD_LIST command. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted MySQL request. A successful exploit could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: MySQL CREATE FUNCTION mysql.func Arbitrary Library Injection
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in the user-defined function (UDF) implementation in MySQL due to insufficient policy enforcement. A remote authenticated user with INSERT privileges on the MySQL administrative database can exploit this vulnerability to bypass UDF library path restrictions. This may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code, with the privileges of mysql, by calling functions in arbitrary shared libraries.

NAME: MySQL Create Function Buffer Overflow Vunerability
DESCRIPTION: MySQL is prone to a vulnerability that allow a malicious user to load arbitrary librariesThe vulnerability is triggered when an authenticated user with INSERT and DELETE privileges use the CREATE FUNCTION command to specify and load an arbitrary custom library.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted mysql request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: MySQL Login Attempt
DESCRIPTION: This alert indicates a MySQL login Attempt. If there are too many authentication requests against the target host which may mean an brute-force attack is underway.

NAME: Oracle MySQL Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Oracle MySQL is prone to a code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted MySQL request. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on some field in the MySQL request, leading to an exploitable code execution. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted MySQL request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: MySQL XML Functions Scalar XPath Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in MySQL database engine. The vulnerability is due to insufficient input validation of XML functions used in SQL statements. A remote authenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability by sending crafted requests to the target host. Successful exploitation would be a denial of service (DoS) condition of MySQL database services on the target host.

NAME: MySQL yaSSL Exploit
DESCRIPTION: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in MySQL. The flaw is due to boundary error when handlingcrafted client Hello message when using yaSSL for secure connection. A remote unauthenticatedattacker may exploit the vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary code on the target with privileges of MySQL service.

NAME: MySQL Login Handshake Information Disclosure
DESCRIPTION: MySQL is prone to a vulnerability that allow a malicious user to allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive informationThe vulnerability is due to a flaw in the server component responsible for the login handshake procedure and allows an attacker with anonymous access to the database to read sensitive data stored in the memory of the server.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted mysql request. A successful attack could lead to sensitive information disclosure

NAME: Mysql Create Function libc Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: MySQL is prone to a vulnerability that allow a malicious user to load arbitrary librariesThe vulnerability is triggered when an authenticated user with INSERT and DELETE privileges use the CREATE FUNCTION command to specify and load an arbitrary custom library.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted mysql request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Mysql Create Function libc Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: MySQL is prone to a vulnerability that allow a malicious user to load arbitrary librariesThe vulnerability is triggered when an authenticated user with INSERT and DELETE privileges use the CREATE FUNCTION command to specify and load an arbitrary custom library.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted mysql request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Microsoft MSN Messenger Video Conversation Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft MSN Messenger 7.x and Live Messenger before 8.1 are prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain craftedWebcam (video) session conversations. The vulnerability is due to the improper handling of certain webcam messages which could lead to an exploitable heap overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending crafted webcam messages, after establishing awebcam session. Thus, a successful exploit requires user interaction as the victim needs to accept webcam invitation sent bythe attacker. A successful exploit could lead to remote code execution in the context of the user logged-in to the victim machine.

NAME: Pidgin MSN Integer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Pidgin is prone to a integer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted MSN protocol messages.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on message header in the MSN protocol , leading to an exploitable overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted MSN response. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Samba Send_mailslot Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Samba is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted netbios request.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the netbios request, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted netbios request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Microsoft Windows Browser Protocol Election Servername Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted browser protocol requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on servername in the browser protocol request, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted browser request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Squid WCCP Message Receive Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in the way the Squid web proxy/cache processes Web Cache Communication Protocol (WCCP) messages. A overly long UDP datagram can trigger a buffer overflow. This flaw can be exploited to terminate the vulnerable product, creating a denial of service condition, or it can be exploited for code execution.

NAME: RealNetworks Helix Server Content-Length Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: RealNetworks Helix Server is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted RTSP requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on negative content-length values in an RTSP request. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted RTSP POST request. A successful attack could crash the server, leading to a denial of service condition.

NAME: Helix DNA Server Describe Request LoadTestPassword Heap Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Helix DNA Server 11.0 and 11.1 is prone to a heap overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted Describe RTSP requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on the value passed through LoadTestPassword header, which could lead to theoverflow of a heap buffer. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by passing a crafted Describe request that could allow codeexecution with the privileges of the server, typically root.

NAME: RealNetworks Helix Universal Server RTSP Describe Request URI Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: RealNetworks Helix Universal Server 9.0 (9.0.2.768) is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted RTSPrequests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of boundary checks on the length of a URI passed to a DESCRIBE request. An attackercould exploit the vulnerability by passing a long DESCRIBE URI request, overflowing the buffer. A successful exploit could lead toremote code execution, or lead to a denial of service condition on the server.

NAME: Microsoft Media Player Network Sharing Service Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Media Player Network Share Service is prone to remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks the RTSP request, leading to an exploitable overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted RTSP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current application.

NAME: RealNetworks Helix Server RTSP SET_PARAMETERS Request Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a denial of service vulnerability in RealNetworks Helix Server. The vulnerability is due to a logic error in the way RealNetworks Helix Server and Helix Mobile Server handle RTSP requests. Remote unauthenticated attackers can exploit this vulnerability by sending a crafted RTSP  SET_PARAMETER  request to the affected server.

NAME: RealNetworks Helix DNA Server Remote Heap Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: RealNetworks Helix DNA Server is prone to an overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted RTSP requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the RTSP request, leading to an exploitable overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted RTSP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: RealNetworks Helix DNA Server RTSP Request Require Header Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: RealNetworks Helix DNS Server version before 11.1.4 is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted RTSPrequests. The vulnerability is due to the improper allocation of heap buffers when multiple Require headers are passed in a requestto the server. When the Require header data is copied to the insufficient heap buffers, it could lead to an exploitable heapoverflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by passing a multiple Require headers in an RTSP request, overflowing the buffer. A successful exploit could lead to remote code execution, or lead to a denial of service condition on the server.

NAME: Apple QuickTime RTSP Response Content-Type Parsing Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Apple QuickTime is prone to a stack overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted RTSP response. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on Content-Type field in the RTSP response header, leading to an exploitable stack overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted RTSP response. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: RealNetworks Helix Server SET_PARAMETER Heap Overflow
DESCRIPTION: RealNetworks Helix Server is prone to a heap overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted RTSP requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on input supplied in a SET_PARAMETER request, leading to an exploitable overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted RTSP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: RealNetworks Helix Server RTSP SETUP Request Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A denial of service vulnerability exists in RealNetworks Helix Server. The vulnerability is due to an error in the way RealNetworks Helix Server handles SETUP requests. Remote unauthenticated attackers can exploit this flaw by sending a crafted SETUP request to an affected server.

NAME: RealNetworks Helix Server RTSP SETUP Stack Overflow
DESCRIPTION: RealNetworks Helix Server is prone to a stack overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted RTSP requests. The vulnerability is due to the improper handling of SETUP requests, leading to an exploitable overflow. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Microsoft Media Player Audio Sampling Rate Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Windows Media Player is prone to a stack overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted RTSP response. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the RTSP response content, leading to an exploitable memory corruption. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted RTSP response. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: RealNetworks HELIX Server DESCRIBE DoS Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: RealNetworks HELIX Server is prone to a denial of service vulnerbility while parsing certain crafted RTSP request. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on some field in RTSP request. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted RTSP request. A successful attack could lead to denial of service against the target server.

NAME: Microsoft Media Player Audio Sampling Rate Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Windows Media Player is prone to a stack overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted RTSP response. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the RTSP response content, leading to an exploitable memory corruption. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted RTSP response. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Real Networks Helix Universal Server Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: RealNetworks Helix Universal Server is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted RTSP requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on URI data in the RTSP request, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted RTSP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: RealNetworks Helix Server Transport Header Overflow
DESCRIPTION: RealNetworks Helix Universal Server 9.0 (9.0.2.768) is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted RTSP requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of boundary checks on the length of a TRANSPORT header in a request. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted request, overflowing the buffer. A successful exploit could lead to remote code execution, or lead to a denial of service condition on the server.

NAME: IBM Tivoli Provisioning Manager for OS Deployment HTTP Server Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: IBM Tivoli Provisioning Manager is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted HTTP request.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the HTTP request, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Oracle BEA WebLogic Server Plug-ins Certificate Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in BEA WebLogic Server Plugins. The vulnerability is due to a boundary error while parsing SSL certificates. A remote unauthenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability by sending a crafted certificate to the target host. In an attack case where code injection is successful, the behaviour of the target is entirely dependent on the intended function of the injected code. In an attack case where code injection is not successful, the affected process will terminate abnormally.

NAME: Mozilla Network Security Services SSLv2 Server Stack Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Mozilla Network Security Services (NSS) is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted SSLv2 requestmessages. The NSS services are used by several products such as Firefox, Thunderbird and Seamonkey and hence are prone to the vulnerability. The vulnerability is due to improper parsing of the master key while negotiating an SSLv2 session. An attacker couldexploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted SSLv2 request to the server. A successful exploit could lead to remote codeexecution on the vulnerable system in the context of the affected application.

NAME: OpenSSL SSL_Get_Shared_Ciphers Off By One Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: OpenSSL 0.9.7m and 0.9.8e and earlier, are prone to an off-by-one buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain craftedSSL messages. The vulnerability has been introduced as a result of an earlier security fix as described in CVE-2006-3738. The vulnerability is present in the SSL_Get_Shared_Ciphers function and is due the lack of proper boundary checks before copyinguser-supplied SSL data to finite buffers, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit thevulnerability by sending a crafted SSL message with long Cipher Specs data. A successful exploit could lead toremote code execution with the privileges of the vulnerable service. OpenSSL implementation is used by many products toprovide SSL services such as  Apache, Sendmail, Bind etc.

NAME: Mozilla Network Security Services Regexp Heap Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A code execution vulnerability exists within Mozilla Network Security Services, a library of functionality used by applications such as Mozilla FireFox, Mozilla Thunderbird and others. The vulnerability is due to a heap buffer overflow present within its regular expression functionality. An remote attacker can exploit this flaw by sending a malicious certificate containing a crafted Common Name.

NAME: OpenSSL ssl3_get_key_exchange Use-After-Free Memory Corruption
DESCRIPTION: Openssl Library is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ssl responses. The vulnerability is due to a double free on ssl3I_get_key_exchange function, leading to an exploitable remote code execution. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted ssl key exchange response. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Microsoft IIS Server SChannel Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft nternet Information Services is prone to a DoS vulnerability while parsing certain crafted SSL requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on client certificate in the SChannel.An attacker could send a specially crafted network packet to the affected system that would cause the LSASS service to stop responding and the system to restart.

NAME: Microsoft CryptoAPI SSL Integer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft CryptoAPI is prone to a integer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ssl certificate response.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on OID in the SSL cerfiticate, leading to an exploitable integer overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted certificate. A successful attack could lead to spoof the certificate.

NAME: OpenSSL SSL_get_shared_ciphers Function Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: There exits a buffer overflow vulnerability in the OpenSSL library. The flaw is due to improper handling of overly long cipher lists supplied by the peer. A remote attacker may exploit this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary code on the target system.

NAME: Netscape NSS Library SSLv2 Record Parsing Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Netscape Network Security Services (NSS)library is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted SSL messages.The vulnerability is due the lack of proper validation on the length of challenge field in an SSLv2 negotiation message. Since this field value is used for heap memory copy operations, it could lead to an exploitable heap overflow. An attacker could exploit thevulnerability by sending a crafted SSLv2 message with a long challenge field. A successful exploit could lead to remote codeexecution with the privileges of the vulnerable service. The library is used by many commercial and open-source products to provide SSL services. Affected applications include the Netscape Enterprise web server, the SunONE web, directory, and mail servers, and a large number of open-source application servers.

NAME: Microsoft Windows Private Communications Transport Protocol Buffer Overrun Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability, when parsing malformed messages related to Private Communications Transport (PCT) protocol. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on hello message in the PCT request, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted PCT request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: OpenSSL TLS Connection Record Handling Denial of Service
DESCRIPTION: OpenSSL 0.9.8f through 0.9.8m is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted SSL requests. The vulnerability is present in the ssl3_get_record function and is due to a NULL pointer dereference while parsing certain malformed TLS records. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted SSL request. A successful attack could crash the SSL service.

NAME: BEA WebLogic Server And WebLogic Express Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: BEA WebLogic Server and WebLogic Express is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted ssl certificate.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on certificate data in the ssl response, leading to denial of service vulnerability. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted ssl response. A successful attack could lead to server network port consumption.

NAME: Symantec Backup Exec System Recovery Manager Unauthorized File Upload
DESCRIPTION: A file upload vulnerability exists in the Symantec Backup Exec System Recovery Manager. The vulnerability is due to design weakness in the Tomcat service and can be exploited by remote attackers to upload arbitrary files into the system, potentially compromising the vulnerable system.

NAME: SSL Certificate null byte poisoning
DESCRIPTION: SSL is prone to a certificate null byte poisoning vulnerability while SSL certificate issued for a domain name contains a null byte, which could be used to spoof any address on the Web.

NAME: Dell OpenManage 3.x Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in the way BEA System's WebLogic products handle user access constraints. A misinterpretation of an access control policy option allows a remote user to bypass the "role" policy, leading to unauthorized access to sensitive data and services.

NAME: Apache 2 mod_ssl Connection Abort Denial of Service
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in the Apache HTTP server SSL module, mod_ssl. This module, which is responsible for managing encrypted communications, can be forced into an infinite loop by the unexpected termination of connection. This vulnerability may be exploited by an attacker to cause a denial of service condition.

NAME: OpenSSL SSLv2 Malformed Client Key Parsing Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: OpenSSL 0.9.6d and earlier, are prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted SSLv2 messages. The vulnerability is due the lack of proper validation on the key argument length field in an SSLv2 message. Since this field value is used for memory copy operations, it could lead to an exploitable buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit thevulnerability by sending a crafted SSLv2 message with a long key argument. A successful exploit could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the vulnerable service. OpenSSL implementation is used by many products toprovide SSL services such as  Apache, Sendmail, Bind etc. This vulnerability has been famously exploited by Apache Slapper worm.

NAME: Mozilla Network Security Services SSLv2 Client Integer Underflow
DESCRIPTION: There exists a heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability in Mozilla Network Security Services (NSS). The vulnerability is due to a design error in the processing of malformed SSLv2 server messages. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system in the context of the affected application.

NAME: Comodo Fraudulent Digital Certificates
DESCRIPTION: Nine fraudulent digital certificates issued by Comodo, a certification authority present in the Trusted Root Certification Authorities Store on all supported versions of Microsoft Windows. Comodo advised Microsoft on March 16, 2011 that nine certificates had been signed on behalf of a third party without sufficiently validating its identity. These certificates may be used to spoof content, perform phishing attacks, or perform man-in-the-middle attacks against all Web browser users including users of Internet Explorer.

NAME: SSL Renegotiation Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: SSL is vulnerable to a denial of service condition while parsing specially crafted SSL requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on renegotiate data in the SSL request. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending multiple similar SSL requests thereby exhausting server memory.

NAME: SSL client certificate abnormally long
DESCRIPTION: This attack get triggered when an overly long client certificate is passed during ssl handshake. A malicious attacker may use this to trigger a denial of service attack without a crafted client certificate signed by a trusted CA (Certificate Authority).

NAME: OpenSSL ASN.1 Parsing Double-Free Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Double-free vulnerability in OpenSSL 0.9.7 allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service (crash) and possibly execute arbitrary codevia an SSL client certificate with a certain invalid ASN.1 encoding.

NAME: Microsoft Windows SChannel Malformed Certificate Request Remote Code Execution
DESCRIPTION: There is a remote code execution vulnerability in Microsoft Windows SChannel when it validates a certificate request message sent by the server on a client. An attacker could host a specially crafted Web site that is designed to exploit these vulnerabilities through an Internet Web browser and then convince a user to view the Web site.

NAME: OpenSSL Handshake Cipher Two More Times Changed  Anormaly
DESCRIPTION: Many software and hardware products use the OpenSSL library for SSL/TLS support. These include all Cisco products, Nortel/Alteon products, Juniper products, the Apache web server, and a very large number of other hardware and software products (see below). A vulnerability exists in the OpenSSL library's handling of ChangeCipherSpec messages within the SSL protocol. This vulnerability may allow remote attackers to cause applications using OpenSSL to terminate.

NAME: Removal of DigiNotar Certificate Authority
DESCRIPTION: This bug adds a signature to alert on all SSL certificates issued by DigiNotar, and adds an action in the post-install script to remove DigiNotar from the list of trusted CAs in PAN OS. DigiNotar is a compromised CA that is no longer trusted.

NAME: Microsoft SChannel Package Digital Signature Parsing Heap Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Windows Schannel Security Package for Microsoft Windows 2000 SP4, XP SP2, and Server 2003 SP1 and SP2, is prone to a code executionvulnerability while parsing certain crafted server-sent digital signatures. The vulnerability is an off-by-one heap overwrite which is caused due to insufficient checks on certain fields in the signature, which is later used for heap allocation. An attacker could hosta SSL enabled website, and entice a user to visit the website and thus overwrite the heap buffers. A successful exploit could lead toremote code execution, or lead to a denial of server condition on the victim machine.

NAME: SSL Double Client Hello Cipher Suite Length Mismatch
DESCRIPTION: Some Vendor SSL handlers may were prone to a denial of service vulnerability while handling certain crafted SSL requests. The vulnerability is due to the improper handling of crafted client hello requests, leading to a crash. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted SSL hello request. A successful exploit could crash the SSL service, leading to a denial of service condition.

NAME: SGI IRIX lpsched Shell Metacharacter Remote Command Execution
DESCRIPTION: Printer daemon (lpsched) on IRIX 6.5.13f and ealier is prone to command execution vulnerability while parsing certaincrafted LPD commands. The vulnerability is due to the lack of sanitization of LPD commands.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted LPD request containing commands that couldbe executed on the vulnerable server.

NAME: NIPrint LPD Server Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Printer daemon (lpd) on Network Instrument's NIPrint server version 4.10, is prone to buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certaincrafted LPD commands. The vulnerability is due to the lack of boundary checks on the LPD requests parsed by the server.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a long, crafted LPD request that could lead to remote code execution, or leadto a denial of service condition on the server.

NAME: WinComLPD Server Authentication Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: WinComLPD Server is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted LPD requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on certain authentication requests, leading to an exploitable overflow. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Sun Solaris Cachefsd Mount File Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Sun Solaris cachefsd in versions 2.6, 7 and 8 of the operating system is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing craftedmount requests. Cachefsd caches requests for operations on remote file systems mounted via NFS protocol. The vulnerability isa stack overflow which can be manifested by mounting a crafted long local file. However, the vulnerability can be exploited remotelyby uploading the file through lpd, which can later be mounted to exploit the overflow in cachefsd. A successful exploit could leadto remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Hummingbird InetD LPD Component Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Hummingbird InetD LPD is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted LPD requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the LPD request/response, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted LPD request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Sun Solaris Lpd Arbitrary Command Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Solaris LPD service is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted LPD requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the LPD request, leading to an exploitable code execution.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted lpd request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: HP-UX LPD Arbitrary Command Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Printer daemon (lpd) on HP-UX 10.20 through 11.11 (11i) is prone to command execution vulnerability while parsing certaincrafted LPD commands. The vulnerability is due to the lack of sanitization of the parameters passed to certain LPD commands.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted LPD request with parameters containing commands that couldbe executed on the vulnerable server.

NAME: Sun Solaris Lpd Arbitrary Command Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Solaris LPD service is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted LPD requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the LPD request, leading to an exploitable code execution.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted lpd request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: SAP GUI SAPLPD Unspecified Command Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: SAP GUI SAPLPD is prone to an overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted printer requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the printer request, leading to an exploitable overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted printer request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Sun Solaris Printd Arbitrary File Deletion Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Printer daemon (lpd) in Solaris 7 through 10 is prone to a arbitrary file deletion vulnerability while parsing certain crafted LPD commands. The vulnerability is due to the lack of sanitization on the filename parameter passed to Unlink command in a LPDrequest. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending an LPD request that would unlink or delete sensitives files on the affected server.

NAME: SAP GUI SAPLPD Command Parsing Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: SAP GUI SAPLPD is prone to an buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted printer requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in the printer request, leading to an exploitable overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted printer request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Sun Solaris Print Service Unspecified Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Sun Solaris Print Service is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability while parsing certain crafted lpd requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user input data in the LPD request, leading to an exploitable remote code execution.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted lpd request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Winlpd 1.2 Build 1076 Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Stack-based buffer overflow in Winlpd 1.26 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long string in a request to TCP port 515. Successfully exploit this bug could take full control of remote computer.

NAME: Rlpr msg Function Format String Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Format string vulnerability in the msg function for rlpr daemon(rlprd) 2.0.4 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code viaformat string specifiers in a buffer that can not be resolved, whichis provided to the syslog function.

NAME: WinComLPD Server Authentication Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: WinComLPD Server is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted LPD requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on certain authentication requests, leading to an exploitable overflow. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Sybase Open Server Null Byte Stack Memory Corruption Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Sybase Open Server is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability while parsing certain craft login request. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in login packets, leading to an exploitable memory corruption. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted login packets. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution within the context of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Sybase Open Server Function Pointer Array Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Sybase Open Server is prone to a code execution vulnerability while parsing certain craft login request. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks in login packets, leading to an exploitable code execution. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted login packets. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution within the context of the current logged-in user.

NAME: Sybase SQL Anywhere MobiLink Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in the MobiLink component of Sybase SQL Anywhere. The flaw is due to boundary error when processing overly long strings in received network messages. A remote unauthenticated attacker can leverage this vulnerability to create a denial of service condition to the affected server, or inject and execute arbitrary code with privileges of currently logged-in user.

NAME: Sybase Database Login Failed
DESCRIPTION: This alert indicates a Sybase database login authentication failed. A multiple failed authentication response means an attack is try to brute-force user name and password.

NAME: Root User Information Retrieval using Fingerd
DESCRIPTION: Finger is a simple protocol which provides an interface to a remote user information program. Since, Finger discloses information about users which may be considered sensitive. This alert indicates that an attacker is trying to retrieve information about the root user. Sites that are security conscious should not run Finger.

NAME: Zkfingerd Format String Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Zkfingerd, an implementation of finger protocol, is prone to a format string vulnerability while handling certain crafted requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of format string specifiers in a user argument value. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted request to the vulnerable server. A successful exploit could overwrite arbitrary memory locations, thus allowing the attacker to take control of the system.

NAME: Cisco Secure ACS EAP-TLS Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in the certificate validation mechanism of the Cisco Secure Access Control Server (ACS) when the authentication method used is EAP-TLS. In the authentication process, if ACS receives any correctly formed certificate with a valid username, it fails to further verify the certificate validity. Therefore, an attacker can use an invalid but cryptographically correct certificate to bypass the authentication mechanism.

NAME: FreeRADIUS Unspecified Denial of Service
DESCRIPTION: A vulnerability exists in the way the FreeRADIUS software package handles out of sequence messages. When a RADIUS authentication or accounting request is sent out-of-order to a vulnerable FreeRADIUS, a memory exception occurs. This vulnerability may be leveraged by a remote attacker to deny service to the FreeRADIUS server.\n'

NAME: Microsoft Internet Authentication Service MS-CHAP Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft IAS is prone to a privilege elevation vulnerability while parsing certain crafted MS-CHAP responses.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on MS-CHAP response, leading to an elevation of privilege.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted MS-CHAP response. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: GNU Radius SQL Accounting Format String Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a format string vulnerability in the GNU Radius suite. The flaw may be exploited by sending a malicious request message to the Radius daemon. Successful exploitation may allow an attacker to inject and execute arbitrary code on the target host within the privileges of the Radius process.

NAME: FreeRADIUS Server rad_decode Remote Denial of Service
DESCRIPTION: FreeRADIUS before 1.1.8 is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted radius requests. The vulnerability is present in the rad_decode function and is due to the improper parsing of zero-length Tunnel password values in a request. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted radius request. A successful attack could crash the server leading to a denial of service condition.

NAME: Microsoft Windows Server Service Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows Server service on Windows 2000, XP, 2003 is prone to a remote buffer overflow vulnerability.The vulnerability is caused due to a boundary error in the "CanonicalizePathName()" function in netapi32.dll and can be exploited to cause a stack-based buffer overflow with an overly long path name to the Server Service.A successful attack may result in arbitrary code execution with SYSTEM privileges leading to a full compromise. Attack attempts may result in denial-of-service conditions as well.

NAME: Microsoft Windows RPC Fragment Evasion Attempt
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows supports RPC fragmentation. The attack may use this technique to bypass IDS detection.

NAME: CA ARCserve Backup DB Engine Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a denial of service vulnerability in CA BrightStor ARCserve Backup DB Engine.  The vulnerability is due to insufficient memory initialization.  A remote unauthenticated attacker may exploit this vulnerability by sending a crafted message to the target server. Successful attack could create a denial of service condition to the DBEng.exe service.

NAME: Microsoft Windows NetDDE Service Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Network Dynamic Data Exchange (NetDDE) services for Microsoft Windows 98, Windows NT 4.0, Windows 2000, Windows XP, and Windows Server 2003 is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted requests to the service. The vulnerability is due to the lack of boundary checks on parameters passed to NDdeSetTrustedShare() function, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted request to the service over NETBIOS or SMB. A successful attack couldlead to remote code execution, or cause a denial of service condition on the server.

NAME: Microsoft Windows RPC NTLMSSP Authentication Denial of Service
DESCRIPTION: There is an integer underflow vulnerability exists in the Microsoft Windows Remote Procedure Call (RPC) service.The vulnerability is due to improper communication between the NTLM authentication componentand the RPC engine. A remote un-authenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability by sending specially crafted RPC requests using the NTLMSSP authentication method to terminate the RPC service on the target system. Successful attack could raise a denial of service condition on the target system, where the target system becomes non-responsive and restarts as the result of the attack.

NAME: CA BrightStor ARCserve Backup Tape Engine RPC Code Execution
DESCRIPTION: CA BrightStor ARCserve Backup Tape Engine is prone to code execution vulnerability while handling certain crafted RPC requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper validation checks on the supplied data when processing stub data of an RPC call made to the Tape Engine with opnum 0xBF. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted RPC request to the server. A successful exploit could allow code execution in the context of the affected application, commonly System.

NAME: Microsoft Windows RPC Service Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft RPC component in Windows 2000, Windows NT 4.0, and Windows XP is prone to a denial of service vulnerability while parsinga malformed RPC packet. The vulnerability is due to the lack of validation on the input provided through a crafted RPC packet,which could cause a null pointer dereference. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by passing a crafted RPC packet, which coulddisable the RPC service, and certain COM functions on the victim machine.

NAME: CA BrightStor ARCserve Backup Tape Engine RPC Opcode 207 Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Computer Associates (CA) BrightStor ARCserve Backup 9.01 through 11.5, Enterprise Backup 10.5 is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted MSRPC requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on certain fields in the data for procedure corresponding to opnum 207 in an RPC request. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted RPC request to the server. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Microsoft RPC Locator Service Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: RPC Locator service for Microsoft Windows NT 4.0, Windows NT 4.0 Terminal Server Edition, Windows 2000, and Windows XP is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing crafted RPC requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of boundary checkson parameters passed to certain functions of the Locator Service. Since these user-supplied parameters are copied to finitestack buffers, it could lead to an exploitable stack overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted RPC request, which could lead to the overflow and subsequent remote code execution with SYSTEM privileges.

NAME: Novell Client nwspool.dll EnumPrinters Function Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in the way Novel Client for Windows handles RPC requests. The vulnerability is due to lack of boundary protection while processing RPC requests. A remote unauthenticated attacker may exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service condition or inject and execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable host with System-level privileges.

NAME: CA BrightStor ARCServe BackUp Privileged Function Exposure Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: The Message Engine RPC service in CA BrightStor ARCServe BackUp v9.01 through R11.5, and Enterprise Backup r10.5, is prone to an unauthorized system access vulnerability. The vulnerability is due to the exposure of certain insecure methods, which can be called by an unauthorized user. This could allow an attacker to modify file system and registry, allowing for complete system compromise. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted RPC request to the server.

NAME: Trend Micro ServerProtect EarthAgent.exe Stack Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Trend Micro ServerProtect 5.58 before Security Patch 2 Build 1174 is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certaincrafted RPC requests to the service. The vulnerability is present in EarthAgent.exe,and is due to the lack of proper checks on certain user-supplied parameters passed to an RPC function. Since the parameter valueis later used for memory copy to finite stack buffers, it could lead to an exploitable overflow. An attacker could exploit thevulnerability by sending a crafted RPC request to the service. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution, or cause adenial of service condition on the server.

NAME: Microsoft Windows RPC Encrypted Data Detected
DESCRIPTION: This signature indicates that encrypted MSRPC data is seen. Though, encrypted traffic is sometimes used, it is also seen in cases of evasion. Attackers could use the technique to evade IPS boxes and thus sneak MSRPC exploits.

NAME: CA BrightStor ARCserve Backup Message Engine Opcode 117 Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Computer Associates (CA) BrightStor ARCserve Backup 9.01 through 11.5, Enterprise Backup 10.5 is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted MSRPC requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on certain fields in the data for procedure corresponding to opnum 117 in an RPC request. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted RPC request to the server. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Samba LSARPC trans_names Request Handling Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Samba is prone to a heap overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted MSRPC requests.The vulnerability is due to the improper handling of lsa_io_trans_names field in a LsaLookupSids request. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted MSRPC request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: CA ARCserve Backup Engine Command Injection Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: CA ARCserve Backup Engine is prone to a command injection vulnerability while parsing certain crafted RPC requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on parameters passed to certain RPC functions which could execute arbitrary commands. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted RPC request via directory traversal characters in the RPC call. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Trend Micro ServerProtect CreateBinding MSRPC Stack Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Trend Micro ServerProtect 5.58 before Security Patch 2 Build 1174 is prone to a stack overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted MSRPC requests. The vulnerability is present in the CAgRpcClient::CreateBinding function in the AgRpcCln.dll library in SpntSvc.exe, and is due to the lack of boundary checks on user supplied input in MSRPC data. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted MSRPC request to the service running on TCP port 5168. A successful attack could al

NAME: Trend Micro ServerProtect Eng50.dll Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Trend Micro ServerProtect for Windows before Security Patch 4 is prone to multiple buffer overflow vulnerabilities while parsing certain crafted requests to the service. The vulnerability is present in Eng50.dll in the ENG_TakeActionOnAFile and RPCFN_ENG_AddTaskExportLogItemfunctions, and is due to the lack of proper checks on certain user-supplied parameters passed to the function. Since the parameter value is later used for memory copy to finite buffers, it could lead to an exploitable overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted RPC request to the service. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution, or cause a denial of service condition on the server.

NAME: Trend Micro ServerProtect RPCFN CopyAUSrc Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Trend Micro ServerProtect for Windows before Security Patch 4 is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerabilities while parsing certain crafted requests to the service. The vulnerability is present in the RPCFN_CopyAUSrcfunction, and is due to the lack of proper checks on certain user-supplied parameters passed to the function. Since the parameter value is later used for memory copy to finite buffers, it could lead to an exploitable overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted RPC request to the service. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution, or cause a denial of service condition on the server.

NAME: Microsoft RPC Endpoint Mapper
DESCRIPTION: The RPC endpoint mapper allows RPC clients to determine the port number currently assigned to a particular RPC service.  This alert may be triggered by network administrator's remote access to the client machine or scanning activity, or triggered by a remote attacker which is trying to gather information for future attacks.

NAME: Microsoft WorkStation Service Logging Function Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Windows Workstation Service (WKSSVC.DLL) is prone to a stack overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted RPC requests. Thevulnerability is present in a logging function which is called from several service functions such as NetValidateName, NetJoinDomain etc.Since these functions pass certain user specified arguments to the logging function, which fails to perform boundary checks, an exploitablestack overflow is present. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by passing a crafted RPC request to the service. A successfulexploit could lead to remote code execution, or a denial of service condition on the server.

NAME: Trend Micro ServerProtect RPC Call ActiveUpdate and ActiveRollback Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Trend Micro ServerProtect is prone to a stack overflow vulnerability while handling certain crafted MSRPC requests. The vulnerability is due to the improper boundary checks on crafted RPC requests within the SpntSvc service. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted RPC request to the server. A remote unauthenticated attacker may leverage this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary code on the target host with System level privileges.

NAME: Microsoft Workstation Service Double Free vulnerablity
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Workstation Service is prone to a double free heap overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on the payload in the MSRPC request, leading to a double free vulnerability.An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could run arbitrary code with elevated privileges.

NAME: Microsoft Windows Print Spooler  Load Library Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: This is an elevation of privilege vulnerability. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could execute arbitrary code and take complete control of an affected system. An attacker could then install programs; view, change, or delete data; or create new accounts with full user rights.

NAME: Trend Micro ServerProtect Remote Insecure Method Exposure Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Trend Micro ServerProtect 5.58 for Windows, before Security Patch 4, is prone to a arbitrary file access vulnerability while handling certain crafted MSRPC requests. The vulnerability is present in SpntSvc.exe daemon as it exposes dangerous sub-functions from StRpcSrv.dll in the MSRPC interface. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending crafted MSRPC requests. A successful attack could allow remote attackers to obtain full file system access and execute arbitrary code.

NAME: Windows Local Security Architect LsarQueryInformationPolicy
DESCRIPTION: Windows NT Local Security Authority is the center of the Windows NT security subsystem. The LSA is a user-mode process used to maintain security information of a system known as the Local Security Policy. LsarQueryInformationPolicy is trying to query the information for a policy. This alert may be triggered by a network administrator's remote access to the client machine or scanning activity, or triggered by a remote attacker which is trying to gather information for future attacks.

NAME: Microsoft Windows Server Service Remote Stack Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows is prone to a stack overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted RPC requests.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on pathname in the RPC request, leading to an exploitable stack overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted RPC request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: CA ARCserve Backup Message Engine RPC Opcode 59 Denial of Service Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A denial of service vulnerability exists in CA ARCserve Backup Message Engine. The vulnerability is due to insufficient data validation. A remote unauthenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a crafted message to the target server. A successful attack would create a denial of service condition to the Message Engine service.

NAME: Microsoft LSASS NTLM Response Denial of Servic
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows Local Security Authority Subsystem Service (LSASS)  is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability while parsing certain crafted NTLM authentication packet.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on malformed packets during the NTLM authentication. An attacker could create specially crafted anonymous NTLM authentication requests that would cause a crash in the LSASS service and subsequently would restart the computer.

NAME: CA Brightstor ARCServe Backup Tape Engine Opcode 0x8A Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: CA Brightstor ARCServe Backup is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted MSRPC requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on user-supplied input to 0x8a opcode data. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted MSRPC request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Microsoft Windows Print Spooler Service Impersonation Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the Windows Print Spooler service that could allow a remote, unauthenticated attacker to execute arbitrary code on an affected Windows XP system. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take complete control of an affected system. An attacker could then install programs; view, change, or delete data; or create new accounts. This is an elevation of privilege vulnerability on all other supported Microsoft Windows systems.

NAME: Microsoft Windows Print Spooler Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows Print Spooler service (Spoolsv.exe) is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing craftedRPC requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of boundary checkson parameters passed to certain functions of the Spooler RPC Interface, leading to an exploitable bufferoverflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted RPC request, which could leadto the overflow and subsequent remote code execution with SYSTEM privileges.

NAME: Microsoft Client Service For Netware Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Client Service for NetWare (CSNW) on Microsoft Windows 2000 SP4, XP SP1 and Sp2, and Server 2003 SP1 and earlier, is proneto a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted network messages. The vulnerability is due to the lack of boundarychecks while parsing arguments to certain RPC functions of the CSNW interface. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by craftingan RPC packet that could overflow certain buffers, and thereby cause remote code execution.

NAME: Microsoft Windows SMB Fragmentation RPC Request Attempt
DESCRIPTION: This signature is indicated a SMB session using fragmentation technique to send a RPC request.We won't see it normally.

NAME: Novell Client NWSPOOL.DLL Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Novell Netware Client 4.91 through 4.91 SP2 are prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted RPC requests. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on parameters passed to the OpenPrinter function in the RPC request, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted RPC request to the server overflowing finite buffers. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: VERITAS Backup Exec Server Remote Registry Access Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: VERITAS Backup Exec Server  9.0 through 10.0 for Windows is prone to remote registry access vulnerability. The vulnerability is due tothe lack of user access validation checks while accessing the registry using the backup server RPC interface. Thus, anunauthenticated attacker could pass a crafted RPC request to the interface to arbitrarily read, write and delete regitrykeys with admin privileges. A successful attack could leverage the creation of registry keys that point to malicious files, in turn causing code execution on the victim machine.

NAME: Microsoft Windows Routing and Remote Access Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows RRAS (Routing and Remote Access) is prone to two remote buffer overflowvulnerabilities. The vulnerabilities are due to the lack of boundary checks when handling certainRPC requests, which can lead to an exploitable buffer overrun.An unauthenticated attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a craftedRPC packet, and execute remote code on the vulnerable machine.A successful attack may result in arbitrary code execution with SYSTEM privileges leading to a full compromise. Attack attempts may result in denial-of-service conditions as well.

NAME: Microsoft Windows Message Queuing Service String Buffer Overflow
DESCRIPTION: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in the way Microsoft Windows Message Queing Service handles incoming messages. The vulnerability is due to insufficient boundary checking on the strings within the messages that are received by the vulnerable interface. Remote unauthenticated attackers can exploit this vulnerability by sending specially crafted messages to the affected interface. Successful exploitation may lead to arbitrary code execution with system level privileges.

NAME: Microsoft Windows Routing and Remote Access Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in Microsoft Routing and Remote Access Service. The vulnerability is caused by a failure to perform proper bounds checking on a buffer prior to a copy operation. A remote attacker may leverage this vulnerability by sending a crafted request to the problematic service, which can result in the possible injection and execution of arbitrary code on the target system. Any code execution will occur within the privileges of the vulnerable service, which is normally the <italic>System</italic> user.

NAME: Novell NetWare LSASS CIFS.NLM Driver Stack Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Novell Netware is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted MSRPC requests. The vulnerability is present in the CIFS.NLM driver and is due to the lack of proper checks on user-supplied data. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted MSRPC request. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: Microsoft IIS IPP Service Remote Integer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Microsft IIS IPP service is prone to a remote buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted RPC responses.The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on pcbNeed data size in the Enumjobs response, leading to an exploitable buffer overflow.An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted RPC response. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution with the privileges of the server.

NAME: DCOM RPC Interface Stack Overflow Exploit
DESCRIPTION: There is a vulnerability in the part of RPC that deals with message exchange over TCP/IP. The failure results because of incorrect handling of malformed messages. This particular vulnerability affects a Distributed Component Object Model (DCOM) interface with RPC, which listens on RPC enabled ports. This interface handles DCOM object activation requests that are sent by client machines to the server. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability would be able to run code with Local System privileges on an affected system. The attacker would be able to take any action on the system, including installing programs, viewing changing or deleting data, or creating new accounts with full privileges. To exploit this vulnerability, an attacker would need to send a specially formed request to the remote computer on specific RPC ports.

NAME: Microsoft Windows Computer Browser Service BrowserrServerEnum
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows Computer Browser Service provice service for Browing computer on the network. This alert may be triggered by network administrator's remote access to the client machine or scanning activity, or triggered by a remote attacker which is trying to gather information for future attacks.

NAME: Microsoft Windows WorkStation Service NetpManageIPCConnect Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows LSASS (Local Security Authority Subsystem Service) is prone to a remotely exploitable buffer overflow vulnerability. The vulnerability exists in the LSASRV.DLL component. An unauthenticated attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a craftedRPC packet, and execute remote code on the vulnerable machine.A successful attack may result in arbitrary code execution with SYSTEM privileges leading to a full compromise. Attack attempts may result in denial-of-service conditions as well.

NAME: Samba SRVSVC RPC Request Handling Heap Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Samba is prone to a heap overflow vulnerability while handling certain crafted RPC requests. The vulnerability is due to lack of boundary checks while performing specific RPC operations. Remote authenticated attackers can exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted RPC request to the SRVSVC RPC interface. A successful exploit could allow attackers to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system in the context of the affected process.

NAME: Microsoft Windows DNS Service RPC Interface Stack Overflow
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows DNS Service is prone to a stack overflow vulnerability while parsing craftedRPC requests to the DNS service RPC Interface. The vulnerability is due to the lack of boundary checkson parameters passed to certain functions of the DNS RPC Interface, leading to an exploitable stackoverflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted RPC request, which could lead to the overflow and subsequent remote code execution with SYSTEM privileges.

NAME: Microsoft Windows srvsvc Memory Allocation Denial of Service
DESCRIPTION: There exists a denial of service vulnerability in the Microsoft Windows Server service (srvsvc). A remote attacker can trigger this flaw by sending crafted RPC requests to the problematic service. This may potentially result in the affected service allocating extensive amounts of memory and processor resources, leading to a denial of service condition.

NAME: Trend Micro ServerProtect RPCFN_SYNC_TASK Integer Overflow Vulnerability
DESCRIPTION: Trend Micro ServerProtect for Windows before Security Patch 4 is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability while parsing certain crafted requests to the service. The vulnerability is present in the RPCFN_SYNC_TASK function in StRpcSrv.dll, and is due to thelack of proper checks on certain user-supplied parameters passed to the function. Since the parameter value is later used for memorycopy to heap buffers, it could lead to an exploitable heap overflow. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by sending a crafted RPC request to the service. A successful attack could lead to remote code execution, or cause a denial of service condition on the server.

NAME: Microsoft Windows RPC UPnP Memory Allocation Denial of Service
DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Windows 2000 SP4 and earlier, and possibly Windows XP SP1 and earlier, are proneto a denial of service vulnerability while parsing certain crafted RPC requests. Thevulnerability is present in PNP_GetDeviceList (upnp_getdevicelist) in UPnP (UniversalPlug n Play) component and is due to memory corruption when parsing a DCE RPC requestthat specifies a large output buffer size. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability bysending a crafted RPC request to the service. A successful exploit could lead to a denialof service condition on the server machine.

NAME: Windows Local Security Architect lsardelete access
